name: The Abyssal Constrictor
description: A snake thick enough to crush a galleon, with scales as black as the deep sea. It coils around stalagmites or ships, crushing the life out of its prey with slow, inevitable pressure.

attacks.name: Crushing Coils
attacks.effect: Deals 3d6+6 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is automatically Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Constrictor has Advantage on Attack DC against Hidden enemies (heat sense). It cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Squeeze
abilities.effect: All creatures currently Grappled by the Constrictor automatically take 10 Bludgeoning Damage (no save).

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.effect: The Constrictor uncoils violently. All creatures adjacent to it must make a Reflex Save (DC 20). Fail: They take 10 Damage and are pushed 20 feet away, knocking them Prone.

loot: Titanic Snake Hide (500g), Venom Sac (100g), Ancient Fang (50g).

name: The Abyssal Mind
description: A tall, gaunt figure with an octopus-like head and four tentacles around its mouth. It wears opulent, alien robes. It projects an overwhelming sense of superiority.

attacks.name: Psionic Blast
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Psychic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Abyssal Mind has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Gaze of Entropy (Stun)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Effect: The target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage halved) for 1 minute as their nervous system misfires.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.effect: The Abyssal Mind invades a player's thoughts. Target one creature. Effect: The target must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a Fail, the target is Charmed and immediately uses their Reaction to make a single attack against an ally of the Abyssal Mind's choice.

name: The Acid Spitter
description: A conical mound of green sludge that pulses rhythmically. It acts like a mortar, heaving globs of digestive enzymes over the heads of its brute kin to melt the backline.

attacks.name: Caustic Glob
attacks.effect: Range 60ft. Deals 1d8+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Pass, half damage. On a Fail, full damage and their Armor Score is reduced by 1.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Sticky Climber
abilities.effect: The Spitter can hang from ceilings to fire downward, ignoring cover provided by other creatures.

abilities.name: Glue Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: No damage. The target is Slowed (Speed Halved) and cannot Dash until they take an Action to scrape the goo off.

abilities.name: Acid Spray (Barrage)
abilities.effect: The Spitter spins, spraying acid in a wide arc. 30ft Cone. All creatures take 2d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save DC 17 for half).

name: The Acid-Tongue Wyrmling
description: A small, sleek dragon no larger than a wolf, with black scales and dripping green saliva. It darts around the battlefield, spitting acid to melt armor before closing in for the kill.

attacks.name: Caustic Spittle
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (melting).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Acid)
abilities.effect: Immune to Acid. Vulnerable to Lightning.

abilities.name: Reactive Tail
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves into a space adjacent to the Wyrmling, it can use its Reaction to make a melee attack immediately.

abilities.name: Elemental Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Ignores Armor Score. Damage: 1d6+2 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: The Wyrmling exhales a spray of acid. 15ft Cone. Effect: All creatures take 4d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save DC 16 for half).

name: The Alchemist Grenadier
description: A manic figure in a stained leather apron, bandoliers clinking with glass vials. They don't aim; they chuck explosives with frightening enthusiasm.

attacks.name: Explosive Flasks
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+3 Fire Damage. Effect: Players must make a Reflex Save. On a Fail, they take full damage and gain the Burning condition. On a Pass, they take half damage.

abilities.name: Volatile Load
abilities.effect: If the Grenadier takes Fire damage or is hit by a Critical Hit, one of their flasks explodes, dealing 2d6 Fire Damage to them and anyone adjacent.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.effect: The Grenadier smashes a flask at their feet. A 20ft Radius cloud of smoke erupts. The Grenadier becomes Hidden instantly, and the area is Heavily Obscured (Block Line of Sight) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Grenadier marks a player with a flare. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

loot: 25 gold pieces, 1 Alchemist's Fire, and 1 Acid Flask.

name: The Alley-Runner
description: A hooded figure in ragged leathers, spinning a pair of knives. They never stand still, vaulting over crates and ducking under swings with annoying ease.

attacks.name: Jagged Daggers
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. Effect: Deals an additional +1d6 damage if the Alley-Runner has Advantage.

abilities.name: Evasive Footwork
abilities.effect: This enemy does not provoke Counter-Attacks (Opportunity Attacks) when moving out of a player's reach.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.effect: The Alley-Runner throws a glass vial at their feet. They become Hidden instantly. Players cannot target them without an AoE attack or a successful Scrutiny Check.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.effect: The Runner throws a device. All players within 20 ft must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be Stunned for 1 round.

loot: 1d4 silver pieces, a lucky rabbit's foot, and a half-empty vial of smoke powder.

name: The Alpha Raptor
description: A prehistoric nightmare of feathers and claws. It moves with a bobbing, bird-like intellect, testing defenses and coordinating with its packmates to isolate the weak.

attacks.name: Sickle Claw
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the Raptor moves 5 feet (no counter-attacks), repositioning for a flank.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Raptor has +1 Attack DC (Total 20) if an ally is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. If the target is already injured (below Max HP), they gain the Bleeding condition (1d4 damage/turn).

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.effect: Trigger: Reduced to 20 HP or less. The Raptor screeches, clearing all negative conditions (Stunned, Blinded, etc.) and immediately takes an extra Standard Action.

loot: Sickle Claw (10g), Raptor Plumes (15g), Prehistoric Heart (50g).

name: The Amber Jelly
description: A translucent, orange blob that smells of pine resin and rot. It doesn't crush its prey; it sticks to them, gumming up weapons and pinning feet to the floor. It is often found in forests or wooden ruins.

attacks.name: Resin Lash
attacks.effect: Reach 10ft. Deals 1d6+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) or must drop their weapon (which sticks to the Jelly).

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Sticky Climber
abilities.effect: The Jelly has Spider Climb. It can drop from ceilings. It has Advantage on checks to maintain a Grapple.

abilities.name: Slime Shot (Glue)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: No damage. The target is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on attacks). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 13) to break free.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption (Web)
abilities.effect: The Jelly explodes outward in sticky strands. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). Fail: They are Restrained and stuck to the floor/walls.

loot: Jar of Universal Solvent (15g), Preserved Insect.

name: The Angry Mob
description: Peasants with pitchforks, torches, and misplaced anger. Individually weak, but dangerous when they surround you.

attacks.name: Farm Tools
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Mob has +1 Attack DC (Total 14) if an ally is adjacent to their target.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Minions attack the same target in a round, that target is Grappled (Speed 0) unless they succeed on a Strength Save (DC 13).

loot: 1d4 copper pieces, a torch, or a bottle of bad wine.

name: The Animated Armor
description: An empty suit of rusted chainmail and plate, held together by a binding spirit or telekinetic script. It creaks as it marches, raising a rusted halberd.

attacks.name: Rusted Halberd
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. Can attack targets up to 10ft away.

abilities.name: Immutable Form
abilities.effect: The Armor is immune to Polymorph/Petrification. Critical Hits against it are treated as Normal Hits (Players gain no Bonus Effect or Luck).

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.effect: The Armor spins its torso 360 degrees. It makes one Attack Check against the Defense DC of every adjacent enemy.

abilities.name: Repair Protocol
abilities.effect: The scattered pieces of armor magnetically snap back together. The Construct regains 10 HP and ends any Prone condition.

name: The Arcane Prism
description: A geometric entity resembling a floating diamond or icosahedron, with a central eye trapped inside the crystal structure. It acts as a living prism, refracting light into deadly lasers.

attacks.name: Disintegration Ray
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Force Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (matter dissolved).

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Prism (Player fails Casting Check), the spell bounces back at the caster. The caster must roll Defense against their own Spell DC.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Prism spins rapidly. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 20). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm
abilities.effect: The Prism unleashes a barrage of light. It fires 4 Random Rays (Roll d8 for each) at random targets within 60 feet. It cannot target the same creature twice.

name: The Armored Overseer
description: A massive, fleshy sphere fully encased in plate armor, leaving only the eye stalks exposed. It floats through slave pits or prison blocks, using telekinesis to crush rebellions before they start.

attacks.name: Telekinetic Grip
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Effect: Target must make a Strength Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Restrained (held in the air) and take 1d10+4 Force Damage.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Cone
abilities.effect: The Overseer's central eye emits a 30 ft cone of suppression. Inside this cone, no magic functions. The Overseer rotates this cone at the start of its turn to cover the most dangerous caster.

abilities.name: Bite (Crunch)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Restrained target. On Hit: 2d10+4 Damage.

abilities.name: Reality Shift
abilities.effect: The Overseer rearranges the battlefield. Up to 3 creatures or objects within 60 ft are instantly telekinetically moved 20 ft to new locations (e.g., into a pit, into melee range). No Save.

name: The Ash-Creep
description: A small, humanoid shape made of drifting soot and cooling embers. It hides in the smoke of campfires or torches, waiting for a moment of distraction to slit a throat with a shard of obsidian.

attacks.name: Cinder Shiv
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Fire Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Ash-Creep has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Hiding), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Body
abilities.effect: Any creature Grappling the Ash-Creep or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Blink Strike (Smoke Step)
abilities.effect: The Ash-Creep teleports 15 feet through the air immediately before making its attack, appearing in a cloud of ash to strike with Advantage.

abilities.name: Nova (Choke)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Ash-Creep dissipates into a thick cloud. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14) or be Blinded for 1 round.

name: The Bandit Cutthroat
description: Desperate men and women in leather scraps, smelling of fear and cheap ale. They act as meat-shields for their leaders.

attacks.name: Rusty Scimitar
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Shield Wall
abilities.effect: If the Cutthroat is adjacent to an ally wielding a shield (like a Soldier or Brute), their Defense DC increases to 13.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: Instead of dealing damage, the Cutthroat throws sand or dirt. The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14) or be Blinded for 1 round.

loot: 1d6 silver pieces, a set of bone dice, and a rusty knife.

name: The Bandit King
description: A massive man clad in patchwork plate armor made from the gear of dead knights. He wields a maul that looks like a tombstone on a stick. He laughs when he is hit.

attacks.name: Tombstone Maul
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score (AS) is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter.

abilities.name: Aura of Menace
abilities.effect: Players have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against the King's abilities while within 10 feet.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: The King throws a tankard, kicks dirt, or headbutts. The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Reinforcements
abilities.effect: The King bellows a command. 1d4 Bandits (Minion 1) enter the fight from the edges of the room.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 150 gold pieces, a heavy golden chain (50g), and a Ring of Protection (+1 Defense DC).

name: The Banshee
description: A floating, translucent spirit of a grieving elven woman. Her face is twisted into a permanent mask of sorrow and rage. Her very presence chills the air.

attacks.name: Grave Touch
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+3 Cold Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Banshee can move through solid objects and creatures. She has Resistance (Half Damage) to all non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Terrifying Glare (Scream)
abilities.effect: Ranged (30ft). The Banshee shrieks at a specific target. Effect: The player must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a fail, they take 1d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Wail of the Damned
abilities.effect: The Banshee unleashes a lethal keen. All living enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They take 2d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened. If a player has 5 HP or less, they drop to 0 HP immediately.

name: The Barbarian Champion
description: Standing nearly seven feet tall, covered in ritual scars and woad paint. They wield an axe made of blackened iron and wear the pelt of a winter wolf. They fight with a silent, terrifying intensity.

attacks.name: Heavy Greataxe
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score (AS) is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter.

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.effect: If an ally within 30 feet is killed, players have Disadvantage on Defense Checks against the Champion's next attack.

abilities.name: Trip / Shove
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Half Damage (1d8+2), and the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone or pushed 10 feet.

abilities.name: Desperate Fury
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The Champion does not die immediately. They remain at 1 HP, take an immediate Standard Action, and then die.

loot: 3d10 gold pieces, a heavy gold armband (20g), and a trophy necklace of ears.

name: The Barrow King
description: An ancient warrior-king clad in green-bronze armor, sitting upon a throne of skulls. He fights with a heavy, rhythmic brutality, draining the stamina of those who dare cross blades with him.

attacks.name: Ancient Greatsword
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Necrotic/Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Life Sense
abilities.effect: The Barrow King knows the location of all living creatures within 60ft, even if Hidden or Invisible.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Deals normal damage. Effect: The Barrow King heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Grave-Bind
abilities.effect: The King slams his sword into the earth. Spectral hands burst from the ground in a 20ft Radius. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Any creature standing there is Restrained (Strength Save DC 14 to escape).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 200 gold pieces, a Gem of True Seeing (set in an eye socket), and a Masterwork Greatsword.

name: The Basilisk Spawn
description: A six-legged lizard the size of a dog. Its eyes glow with a pale green light. It hasn't fully developed the lethal gaze of its parent, but it can still stiffen joints with a look.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Calcifying Glare
abilities.effect: Ranged (30ft). Target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15). On a fail, they are Slowed (Speed Halved) for 1 round as their skin hardens.

abilities.name: Stone Glare (Flash)
abilities.effect: The Spawn hisses and flares its eyes. One target within 10ft must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be Restrained (turning to stone) for 1 round.

name: The Behir
description: A massive, twelve-legged serpentine horror with blue scales. It looks like a dragon, but it is something older and stranger. It crawls rapidly across walls, crackling with electrical energy. It hates dragons and eats them when it can.

attacks.name: Lightning Maw
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Lightning/Physical Damage. On a hit, the target takes an extra 1d6 Lightning Damage at the start of their next turn (residual charge).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Spiked Hide (Static)
abilities.effect: Any creature Grappling the Behir or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Lightning Damage.

abilities.name: Bear Hug (Constrict)
abilities.effect: Target must be Grappled. The Behir wraps its many legs around the victim. Automatic 2d8+5 Crushing Damage at the start of the Behir's turn. The target is Restrained.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Lightning)
abilities.effect: The Behir exhales a line of lightning. 30ft Line. Effect: 3d6 Lightning Damage (Reflex Save DC 19 for half).

name: The Black Pudding
description: A pool of undulating darkness that smells of sulfur and burning iron. It is a weapon-eater, a monster that punishes martial classes by dissolving their gear. It surges forward like a tide of tar.

attacks.name: Corrosive Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Acid/Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 permanently (until repaired).

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Corrosive Body
abilities.effect: Any creature that touches the Pudding or hits it with a Melee Attack takes 1d4 Acid Damage. Non-magical weapons take a 1 Penalty to damage each time they hit.

abilities.name: Corrode Armor
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: 2d6+4 Acid Damage. The target's armor hisses and melts. Their Armor Score is reduced by 2.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption
abilities.effect: The Pudding pulses. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: Take 4d6 Acid Damage and be covered in slime (Blinded until an Action is used to wipe it off).

name: The Bladed Mannequin
description: A porcelain or wooden doll the size of a human, but with sword-blades fused into its forearms and shins. It moves with a jerky, unnerving balletic grace.

attacks.name: Buzzsaw Limbs
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Slashing Damage. On a hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (1d4/turn).

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The Mannequin is covered in spinning blades and sharp edges. Any creature Grappling it or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Slashing Damage.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.effect: The Mannequin spins its torso 360 degrees while sprinting. It makes one Attack Check against the Defense DC of every adjacent enemy it passes during its move.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: The Mannequin acts with a burst of supernatural speed. It immediately takes an Extra Standard Action (usually to Attack again or Dash away). Cost: It takes 1d10 Damage at the end of the turn as its joints fracture.

name: The Bloated Spitter
description: A corpse distended with pressurized gas and corrosive fluids. It stays back, heaving and retching streams of black ichor at the heroes.

attacks.name: Necrotic Bile
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 2d6+3 Acid/Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). On a Pass, they take half damage. On a Fail, they take full damage and gain the Poisoned condition (1d6/turn).

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: Any living creature starting its turn within 10 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage halved) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Rotting Spray
abilities.effect: Range 15ft Cone. All players in the area must roll Defense (Dodge) vs. DC 19. On a fail, they take 2d6 Necrotic Damage.

abilities.name: Corpse Explosion
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed or at will. The Spitter ruptures. All creatures within 10 feet take 4d6 Necrotic Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Blood Hawk
description: Birds of prey with crimson feathers and hook-beaks. They dive from the sun, aiming for eyes and unarmored limbs.

attacks.name: Raking Talons
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Hawk cannot be Surprised and detects Hidden enemies automatically if they are not under total cover.

abilities.name: Swoop (Pounce)
abilities.effect: The Hawk moves 20ft and attacks. The player must make a Reflex Save (DC 14). Fail: The player takes damage and is Blinded (feathers/claws in face) until the start of their next turn.

name: The Blood-Dryad
description: A female form fused into the bark of a dead tree. She is not beautiful; her skin is grey bark, her hair is dead vines, and sap like black blood weeps from her eyes. She commands the roots of the forest to strangle intruders.

attacks.name: Briar Whip
attacks.effect: Melee Attack (15ft). Deals 2d6+3 Slashing Damage. On a hit, the target is pulled 10 feet closer to the Dryad.

abilities.name: Grasping Ground
abilities.effect: The ground within 20 ft of the Dryad is Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Wall of Thorns
abilities.effect: The Dryad gestures. A wall of brambles springs up (20ft long, 5ft thick). Blocks line of sight. Passing through deals 2d6 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: Roots erupt in a 20 ft radius. All creatures must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Restrained (Speed 0) until they break free (Strength DC 13).

name: The Bombardier Beetle
description: A pulsating, heavy-shelled insect the size of a horse. Its abdomen glows with unstable heat. It turns its back to enemies to unleash a boiling chemical spray.

attacks.name: Caustic Spray
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 2d6+3 Fire/Acid Damage. Players must make a Reflex Save. On a Fail, they take full damage and their Armor Score is reduced by 1 (melting). On a Pass, they take half damage.

abilities.name: Volatile Biology
abilities.effect: If the Beetle takes Fire damage or is hit by a Critical Hit, it explodes. All adjacent creatures take 2d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half).

abilities.name: Steam Vent
abilities.effect: The Beetle vents superheated steam. A 20ft Radius cloud erupts. The area is Heavily Obscured (Block Line of Sight) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.effect: The Beetle releases a blinding chemical flare. All players within 20 ft must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be Stunned for 1 round.

name: The Bone Colossus
description: A fused mass of hundreds of skeletons forming a single, giant avatar of death. It wields a tombstone the size of a door as a weapon. It moves with the creaking sound of a thousand fractures.

attacks.name: Massive Tombstone
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Colossus is dense with necromancy. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Terrifying Glare
abilities.effect: The Colossus turns its many skulls toward a player. The player must make a Will Save (DC 19). On Fail: They take 1d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Wail of the Damned
abilities.effect: The Colossus opens a hundred mouths to scream. All living enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 2d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened. If a player has 5 HP or less, they drop to 0 HP immediately.

loot: Grave Dust (50g), Skull of a Saint (100g, found embedded in the chest).

name: The Brain-Kite
description: A pulsating, translucent jellyfish-like creature that floats through the air. Its trailing tentacles twitch with psychic static. It prefers to hover out of reach, drilling into minds.

attacks.name: Mind-Whip
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Psychic Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Will Save (DC 16) or be Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Kite absorbs ambient mana. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Psychic Bore
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell Attack (60ft). On Hit: The player takes 1d8 Psychic Damage (Ignores Armor). Effect: If the player is concentrating on a spell or holding a prepared Action/Reaction, they lose it immediately.

abilities.name: Mind Blast
abilities.effect: The Kite pulses violently. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: 3d6 Psychic Damage and Stunned for 1 round.

name: The Brain-Pulsar
description: A hovering, exposed brain encrusted with crystals and levitation spines. It emits a low, headache-inducing thrum. It does not have eye-stalks, but senses through psychic waves and blasts enemies with mental static.

attacks.name: Psychic Bore
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d6+3 Psychic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Pulsar has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Mind-Whip (Daze)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On a hit, the player takes no damage but must make a Will Save (DC 19) or be Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Focus Fire (Psychic Lock)
abilities.effect: The Pulsar marks a player telepathically. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

name: The Bramble-Jack (Twig Blight)
description: A small, nasty creature made of dry sticks and roots bound together by hate. They look like piles of firewood until they stand up and rake at your eyes.

attacks.name: Thorny Scratch
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it looks like a pile of dead sticks. Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Trip (Snag)
abilities.effect: Instead of dealing damage, the Bramble-Jack wraps around a leg. The target must make a Reflex Save (DC 13) or fall Prone.

abilities.name: Dry Tinder (Ignite)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed by Fire. The Bramble-Jack flares up instantly. All creatures within 5 feet take 2 Fire Damage (No Save).

name: The Briar-Shot
description: A fey creature made of twisted wood and thorns, wielding a bow that grows its own ammunition. It laughs as it pins its enemies to the ground with arrows that bloom into roses.

attacks.name: Thorn Bow
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d6+3 Piercing Damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron/Fire.

abilities.name: Glamour
abilities.effect: Players have Disadvantage on Attack Checks against the Briar-Shot unless they succeed on a Will Save (DC 19) at the start of the encounter.

abilities.name: Charm (Distraction)
abilities.effect: Ranged (60ft). The Briar-Shot whispers a command. Target must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Charmed and cannot attack the Briar-Shot for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.effect: The Briar-Shot fires a special pollen-arrow. Target player must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They are turned into a harmless rabbit for 1 round. While transformed, they are Stunned, have 1 HP, and 0 Armor Score.

name: The Bronze Centurion
description: A clockwork soldier with a stylized faceplate and a piston-driven spear. It marches with mechanical perfection, never slowing, never stopping.

attacks.name: Piston Spear
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score.

abilities.name: Heavy Plating
abilities.effect: The Centurion's base AS is increased by +1 (included in stats).

abilities.name: Capture (Net)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: No damage. The target is Restrained (manacles or net). They must use an Action to make a Dexterity Check (DC 15) to escape.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.effect: The Centurion slams its shield into the ground. A magical barrier (Wall of Force) appears, blocking a 10ft passage or trapping a target in a corner. The wall has 20 HP.

name: The Bulette
description: A heavily armored, shark-like quadruped that burrows through the earth like water. It bursts from the ground to crush prey, its dorsal fin slicing through the soil. It eats anything, including armor.

attacks.name: Tremor-Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Bludgeoning/Slashing Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.effect: If the Bulette moves at least 20 ft (often surfacing from a burrow) and hits with an attack, the target is automatically knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: The Bulette attacks wildly. It makes Two Attacks (Bite and Claws). If both hit the same target, the target takes an extra 1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb (Breach)
abilities.effect: The Bulette leaps high into the air and crashes down. Effect: All creatures within 10 feet take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and are knocked Prone (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Catoblepas
description: A legendary beast with the body of a buffalo, the neck of a giraffe, and the head of a warthog. It drags its heavy head on the ground until it lifts it to unleash a gaze of pure death. It radiates a miasma of rot.

attacks.name: Wither-Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20). On a failure, they are Weakened (Half Damage) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: Any living creature starting its turn within 10 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15). On a failure, they are Poisoned (Nauseated) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Death Ray (Focus)
abilities.effect: The Catoblepas lifts its heavy eyelids. Target one creature within 60ft. Effect: Target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20). Fail: Target takes 6d8 Necrotic Damage. If this reduces them to 0 HP, they die instantly. Pass: Half Damage.

abilities.name: Terrifying Screech (Moo)
abilities.effect: The beast lows a sound from the grave. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round and drop whatever they are holding.

name: The Cave Bear
description: A towering mass of scarred muscle and matted fur, smelling of old blood and damp earth. It rises on its hind legs, eclipsing the light, and roars.

attacks.name: Crushing Hug
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player is squeezed so hard their armor buckles. Their Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Bear has Advantage on Attack DC against Hidden enemies and cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Knockdown
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Half Damage, and the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The Bear roars, clearing all negative conditions and immediately takes an extra Standard Action.

name: The Cave Troll
description: Smaller and leaner than a river troll, this hunched horror scuttles across cavern walls with disturbing speed. Its skin is rubbery and grey, blending with the stone. It regenerates wounds as it runs.

attacks.name: Rending Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Slashing Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Troll regains 10 HP at the start of its turn. Weakness: This trait stops if it took Fire or Acid damage.

abilities.name: Fling Victim
abilities.effect: The Troll grabs a creature (Grapple check or auto if Grappled). Effect: It throws them 30 feet at a wall or down a hole. Target takes 2d6 Falling Damage and lands Prone.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.effect: The Troll shrieks. For 1 minute, it deals +1d6 Damage, but its Defense DC drops to 15. It immediately moves up to its speed toward the nearest source of Fire damage (to kill it first).

name: The Cave-Stalker
description: A hunched, albino giant-kin standing 8 feet tall. Its eyes are milky and blind, but its ears twitch at a heartbeat. It clings to stalactites, waiting to hook prey with a rusted gaff.

attacks.name: Rusted Gaff
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled and pulled adjacent to the Stalker.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Stalker has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Ceiling), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed (Wall Crawler)
abilities.effect: The Stalker can climb difficult surfaces without checking. It ignores difficult terrain (rubble).

abilities.name: Capture (Net/Sack)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: No damage. The target is Restrained (stuffed in a sack). Escape DC 14 (Strength).

abilities.name: Grab & Squeeze (Choke)
abilities.effect: The Stalker wraps a massive hand around a target's throat. Target is Grappled (no check) and Silenced (cannot speak/cast verbal spells). They take 2 Automatic Damage.

loot: A sack containing dungeon rats (snacks) and a stolen adventurer's backpack (random gear).

name: The Chaos Orb
description: A sphere of shifting, prismatic colors. It is not biological; it is a hole in reality that leaked out of Limbo. It spins wildly, spraying magic in every direction. Fighting it is like fighting a firework display.

attacks.name: Prismatic Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 2d6+4 Fire/Radiant Damage. On a hit, the target is Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 20 feet of the Chaos Orb loses 1d4 Mana Points (MP). The Orb glows brighter as it feeds.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Orb spins in a blur. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm
abilities.effect: The Orb unleashes a barrage. It fires 4 Random Rays at random targets within 60 feet. (Roll d8 for each ray).

name: The Chimera
description: A chaotic fusion of a lion, a goat, and a dragon. Three heads snap and roar in unison. It breathes fire, gores with horns, and shreds with claws. It is the embodiment of magical disaster.

attacks.name: Tri-Attack
attacks.effect: The Chimera makes Three Attacks. Lion Bite (1d10+5), Dragon Bite (1d10+5 Fire), and Goat Horns (1d10+5, push 10ft).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses (Three Heads)
abilities.effect: The Chimera cannot be Surprised and has Advantage on Perception checks. It can make Opportunity Attacks against every enemy that leaves its reach (not just one).

abilities.name: Ram (Goat)
abilities.effect: The Chimera charges. Target must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: Take 2d8+5 Damage and be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
abilities.effect: The Dragon head exhales. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures take 4d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save DC 18 for half).

abilities.name: Feral Rage
abilities.effect: The Lion head roars. For 1 minute, the Chimera deals an additional +1d6 Damage on all attacks, but its Defense DC drops to 12.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 500 gold pieces, a Chimera Heart (Rare Reagent), and a Shield of Fire Resistance.

name: The Chitinous Sentinel
description: A bulky, insectoid nightmare standing on four legs, guarding the entrance to a hive or rift. Its blood is a hissing acid, and its pincers can snap steel.

attacks.name: Crushing Pincers
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (melting/crushing).

abilities.name: Caustic Blood
abilities.effect: Whenever a creature hits the Sentinel with a Melee Attack, that creature takes 1d4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Engulf (Absorb)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Grappled or Prone target. Effect: The Sentinel moves into the target's space. The target is Restrained (Speed 0) and takes automatic 1d8+3 Acid Damage at the start of the Sentinel's turns.

abilities.name: Mind Blast
abilities.effect: The Sentinel emits a psychic shriek. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: 3d6 Psychic Damage and Stunned for 1 round.

name: The Choker Runt
description: A small, rubbery humanoid with mottled grey skin and arms far too long for its body. It squeezes into cracks in the cavern wall, lashing out with telescoping limbs to strangle passerby.

attacks.name: Strangling Grip
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled and pulled adjacent to the Choker.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Choker has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Wall), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.effect: The Choker can squeeze through 1-inch gaps. It has Advantage to maintain a Grapple.

abilities.name: Bear Hug (Choke)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Grappled target. Effect: The target takes 1d6+2 Automatic Damage and is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) until they escape.

abilities.name: Phase Shift (Scuttle)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When missed by an attack. The Choker slithers 15 feet up a wall or into a crack, becoming Hidden.

name: The Cinder-Kin
description: A small, grinning humanoid made of jagged obsidian and living magma. It flits about the battlefield like a ember caught in an updraft, cackling as it burns.

attacks.name: Magma Claw
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Fire Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable (Double Damage) to Cold/Water.

abilities.name: Elemental Body
abilities.effect: Intense heat. Any creature Grappling the Cinder-Kin or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Scorch)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Ignores Armor Score. On Hit: Deals 1d6+2 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Nova (Death Burst)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Cinder-Kin explodes. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Cinder-Scale
description: A dragon the size of a carriage, with scales the color of cooling iron and a maw dripping with liquid fire. It is young, arrogant, and eager to start its hoard by melting the partys armor.

attacks.name: Searing Fangs
attacks.effect: The Cinder-Scale makes Two Attacks. Roll twice vs Defense DC. Each hit deals 1d10+4 Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The dragon's hide is tougher than steel. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (Total 4, included above).

abilities.name: Tail Sweep
abilities.effect: The dragon spins. All enemies in a 10ft rear arc must make a Defense Check (Dodge) vs DC 16. Fail: They take 1d10+4 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: The Cinder-Scale exhales a cone of fire. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area take 4d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save DC 14 for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: The Hoard: Roll 3 times on the Loot Tables. Includes a Fire Gland (50g).

name: The City Guard
description: A bored but sturdy watchman in a padded jack and kettle helm, leaning on a spear. They are brave enough to hold a gate, but smart enough to blow a whistle for help.

attacks.name: Iron Spear
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. The Guard can attack players up to 10ft away.

abilities.name: Shield Wall
abilities.effect: If the Guard is adjacent to an ally wielding a shield, their Defense DC increases to 15.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Half Damage, and the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 15) or be pushed 10 feet.

abilities.name: Get Them!
abilities.effect: All allies within 30 ft immediately use their Reaction to move up to their Speed toward a specific player.

loot: 2d10 copper pieces, a half-eaten apple, and a set of bone dice.

name: The Clay Golem
description: A crude, lumbering shape of animated mud and pottery, inscribed with a single command word on its forehead. It moves with a sloshing, heavy gait.

attacks.name: Heavy Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Golem ignores non-magical Difficult Terrain and cannot be Slowed by physical means (caltrops, mud, grease).

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled (Speed 0). If the target starts their turn Grappled, they automatically take 3 Crushing Damage.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The Golems clay shell ruptures. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d6 Bludgeoning/Force Damage (Reflex Save for half) as heavy shards fly everywhere.

name: The Clay Man
description: A roughly shaped humanoid of unbaked clay. It has no face, only a single rune carved into its forehead. They trudge forward relentlessly, absorbing blows with wet thuds.

attacks.name: Heavy Fists
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Clay Man ignores non-magical Difficult Terrain (like mud or caltrops) and cannot be Slowed.

abilities.name: Dogpile
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Clay Men attack the same target, the target is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Defense) unless they succeed on a Strength Save (DC 13).

abilities.name: Self-Destruct (Mud Burst)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Clay Man liquefies violently. The space it occupied becomes Difficult Terrain (slippery mud). Any creature adjacent to it must make a Reflex Save (DC 11) or fall Prone.

name: The Cloaker
description: A terrifying, intelligent ray that resembles a heavy leather cloak or tapestry. It haunts deep caverns, manipulating shadows and emitting a subsonic moan that induces panic. It wraps itself around victims, biting into their spine.

attacks.name: Spine-Tail
attacks.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). Deals 2d8+4 Piercing Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of Armor Score.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Displacement
abilities.effect: The Cloaker shifts and blurs. Attack Checks against it have Disadvantage. Note: If the Cloaker has a victim Engulfed, attacks that miss the Cloaker hit the victim instead.

abilities.name: Sonic Screech (Moan)
abilities.effect: 30ft Radius. All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 17). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round. If they were already Frightened, they are Stunned.

abilities.name: Devour (Smother)
abilities.effect: The Cloaker wraps fully around a target it has Grappled. Effect: The target is Restrained and Blinded. They take Double Damage (Automatic) at the start of the Cloaker's turn. The Cloaker heals for half the damage dealt.

name: The Clockwork Dragon
description: A masterwork of brass gears and alchemical fire, built in the mockery of a true dragon. It leaks oil and emits a deafening ticking sound.

attacks.name: Razor Wings
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (1d6/turn).

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The Dragon is covered in spinning gears and heat. Any creature Grappling it or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Fire/Slashing Damage.

abilities.name: Vent Fire Breath
abilities.effect: 30ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: They take 3d6 Fire Damage and gain the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: The Dragon's engines roar. It immediately takes an Extra Standard Action (usually to Fly and Breath again). Cost: It takes 1d10 Damage at the end of the turn.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: Pristine Brass Plating (100g), Alchemical Fuel Tank (50g).

name: The Clockwork Overseer
description: A tall, multi-limbed automaton resembling a conductor or taskmaster. It speaks in a monotone, grinding voice, calculating probabilities and issuing directives to lesser machines.

attacks.name: Shock Prod
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+4 Lightning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or be Dazed until the start of their next turn.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Overseer ignores non-magical Difficult Terrain and cannot be Slowed or Paralyzed by physical means.

abilities.name: Vent Neurotoxin Gas
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). Fail: Take 2d6 Poison Damage and be Weakened (Half Damage dealt) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.effect: The Overseer slams a staff into the ground. Iron bars or walls of stone shoot up from the floor, creating a Cage around one target or sealing a hallway. The barrier has 20 HP and AS 2.

name: The Clockwork Scarab
description: A fist-sized beetle made of brass and copper. It ticks loudly. Hundreds of them pour out of vents or statues to devour intruders.

attacks.name: Pincers
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Immutable Form
abilities.effect: Critical Hits against the Scarab are treated as Normal Hits.

abilities.name: Vent Steam
abilities.effect: If a Scarab hits a player, it releases a puff of superheated steam. The player is Blinded for 1 round unless they pass a Fortitude Save (DC 17).

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The mainspring snaps. All creatures within 5 feet take 4 Fire Damage (No Save).

name: The Clockwork Spider
description: A brass arachnid the size of a large dog, powered by a whirring mainspring. It scuttles across walls and ceilings, leaking hot oil.

attacks.name: Shock Prod
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Lightning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Dazed (1 Action only) next turn.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Spider ignores non-magical Difficult Terrain and cannot be Slowed by physical means. It can climb vertical surfaces without a check.

abilities.name: Vent Steam
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). Fail: Take 2d6 Fire Damage (Scalding Steam).

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The mainspring snaps violently. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d6 Fire/Piercing Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Cloud Giant Noble
description: A giant of immense refinement, skin the color of morning mist, wearing silks that cost a kingdom's ransom. They levitate above the battlefield, using telekinesis to hurl marble statues and furniture at the 'vermin' below.

attacks.name: Telekinetic Debris
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Force/Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the target takes damage. All adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save (DC 20) or take Half Damage.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed (Levitation)
abilities.effect: The Giant floats. It ignores ground-based difficult terrain and cannot be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Fling Victim
abilities.effect: The Giant gestures. A creature within 30ft must make a Strength Save (DC 20). Fail: They are thrown 30 feet through the air, taking 3d6 Damage and landing Prone.

abilities.name: War Cry (Thunderclap)
abilities.effect: The Giant claps their hands. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20). Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Fog Cloud)
abilities.effect: The Giant creates a cloud of solid fog. 20ft Radius. Effect: The area is Heavily Obscured (Blindness) and counts as Difficult Terrain for everyone except the Giant.

loot: A golden harp (100g), a bag of magic beans (Curio), a necklace of shields (Scrap).

name: The Cobra Lily
description: A beautiful, tall flower with a hood resembling a snake. It sways hypnotically before striking with a proboscis that drains blood. It moves by slithering on a root-ball.

attacks.name: Feeding Tube
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the Lily Heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Lily has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores
abilities.effect: Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the Lily must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15). On a failure, they are Poisoned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Pollen
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (30ft Cloud). Target must make a Will Save (DC 15). Fail: Target is Dazed (hallucinating beauty) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Lily constricts a Grappled target. Effect: The target takes Double Damage (Automatic). The Lily heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

name: The Cockatrice
description: A larger, more hideous cousin to the runt. It resembles a plucked turkey with bat wings and a tail like a lizard. It flutters frantically, crowing a sound that turns joints stiff and grey.

attacks.name: Calcifying Peck
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the target is Restrained (Speed 0) as the wound turns to stone for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Cockatrice has Advantage on Initiative.

abilities.name: Sonic Screech (Crow)
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area take 1d6 Thunder Damage and must make a Will Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Deafened and Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Stone Glare (Petrify)
abilities.effect: The Cockatrice focuses its milky eyes. One target within 30ft must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). Fail: They are Stunned (partially petrified) for 1 minute. They can repeat the save at the end of their turns to end the effect.

name: The Cockatrice Runt
description: An ugly fusion of a rooster, a bat, and a lizard, the size of a large turkey. It moves with a frantic, jerky speed, flapping leathery wings to hop over frontlines and peck at exposed flesh.

attacks.name: Stone Beak
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Restrained (skin hardening) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Cockatrice is paranoid and alert. It cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: The Cockatrice pecks wildly. It makes Two Attacks against the same target. If both hit, the target takes an extra +1d4 Damage.

abilities.name: Stone Glare (Petrify)
abilities.effect: The Cockatrice crows. One target within 30ft must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). Fail: They are Stunned (partially petrified) for 1 minute or until they take damage (which cracks the stone shell).

name: The Corpse-Flower
description: A massive, bulbous plant with purple petals and a central maw dripping with nectar that smells of rotting meat. It sits in a pile of bones, lashing out with vines to drag food into its gullet.

attacks.name: Vine Lash
attacks.effect: Melee Attack (20ft). Deals 1d10+4 Slashing Damage. On a hit, the target is pulled 15 feet closer to the Flower.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.effect: Melee Attack (5ft). Deals 1d10+4 Piercing Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 ft of the Flower must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14). On a failure, they are Poisoned (Nauseated) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: The Flower swallows a Grappled target. Effect: The target is Restrained, Blinded, and Suffocating. They take 2d6+4 Acid Damage at the start of the Flower's turn.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Flower constricts an Engulfed target. Effect: The target takes Double Damage (Automatic). The Flower heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: A suit of +1 Chainmail (acid-etched), 300 gold pieces, and a Wand of Entangle (Inside the Gullet).

name: The Crawling Claw
description: A severed hand, animated by dark magic. It scuttles on its fingers like a spider, leaping for the throat. It is surprisingly strong and hard to hit.

attacks.name: Grip of Death
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Claw has Advantage on the attack (e.g., attacking from Hiding or Flanking), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Bone Pile
abilities.effect: The Claw can lie dormant. It is indistinguishable from a normal severed body part until it attacks (Ambush), granting Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Strangle
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: No damage, but the target is Grappled (Speed 0). If the target starts their turn Grappled, they take 1d4 automatic damage and are Silenced (cannot speak).

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The hand knits itself back together or another one crawls out of a sleeve. It returns with 7 HP (Half).

name: The Cryo-Hydra
description: A reptilian nightmare with five writhing heads, each exhaling a fog of freezing mist. It does not fly; it claims a frozen lake or cavern as its domain, snapping at anything warm that enters.

attacks.name: Many Fangs
attacks.effect: The Hydra attacks with a frenzy of heads. Mechanic: The Hydra makes Three Attacks. Each deals 1d10+5 Damage.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Cold)
abilities.effect: Immune to Cold. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Multi-Headed
abilities.effect: The Hydra has Advantage on initiative and perception checks. It makes one extra attack per round (included above). Regeneration: If it takes 15+ damage in a single hit, one head 'dies' (Attack DC drops by 1). If it takes Fire damage, the head cannot regenerate.

abilities.name: Elemental Bite (Freeze)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Tag: Ignores Armor Score. On Hit: 2d6+5 Cold Damage. Target's Speed is halved.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Barrage)
abilities.effect: All active heads exhale at once. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures take 4d6 Cold Damage (Reflex Save DC 18 for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: The Hoard: Roll 3 times on the Loot Tables. Includes Regenerating Blood (100g).

name: The Crypt Stalker
description: A lean, long-limbed ghoul with pale, rubbery skin. It moves with unnatural silence, tracking the warmth of living blood. It prefers to paralyze victims and drag them into the dark.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Stalker has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Life Sense
abilities.effect: The Stalker automatically detects living creatures within 60 feet, even if they are Hidden or Invisible. You cannot hide from it.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Touch
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be Stunned (Paralyzed) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Horde Instinct
abilities.effect: The Stalker shrieks. All Unliving Minions (Ghouls) within 30 feet immediately move their full speed toward the nearest player.

name: The Crypt Whisperer
description: A skeleton draped in ceremonial robes, clutching a staff of vertebrae. It chants in a dry, clicking tongue, weaving necrotic magic to sap the strength of intruders.

attacks.name: Life Siphon
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the Whisperer heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Bone Pile
abilities.effect: The Whisperer can lie dormant as a heap of bones. It is indistinguishable from a dead body until it attacks (Ambush), granting it Advantage on its first attack or spell.

abilities.name: Necrotic Bolt
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). On Hit: The player takes 1d8+2 Force/Necrotic Damage. This damage ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The bones rattle and knit back together. The Whisperer returns with 8 HP (Half) at the start of the next round.

name: The Crystal Behemoth
description: A wingless dragon the size of a cottage, covered in jagged, conductive crystals instead of scales. It burrows through solid rock, eating precious ores. It hums with a deep, bone-shaking vibration.

attacks.name: Crystal Maw
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Physical/Lightning Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Thunder/Sonic.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Behemoth's crystal hide adds +1 Armor Score (included in stats).

abilities.name: Swallow Whole
abilities.effect: Target must be Grappled. The Behemoth makes a Bite attack. On Hit: The target is swallowed (Removed from board). They take Automatic 2d8 Lightning Damage at the start of the Behemoth's turns. They are Restrained and Blinded. (Must deal 20 damage to stomach AC 2 to escape).

abilities.name: Roar of the Ancients
abilities.effect: The Behemoth resonates. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They drop whatever they are holding and are Frightened for 1 round.

name: The Crystal Hunter
description: A sleek, floating construct made of geometric crystal shards and silence. It hums with anti-magic resonance. It is built to chase down wizards.

attacks.name: Pneumatic Pincer
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Force Damage. On a hit, the target takes no damage but is Restrained (encased in crystal force). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 15) to escape.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Hunter is built to withstand sorcery. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Trample (Overrun)
abilities.effect: The Hunter surges forward up to 40ft in a straight line. Any enemy it moves through must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 2d6+4 Force Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Analyze Pattern
abilities.effect: The Hunter scans a specific player (usually the Caster). For the rest of the combat, the Hunter has Advantage on all Attack Checks against that player.

name: The Crystal Ooze
description: A transparent jelly filled with jagged, growing quartz crystals. It vibrates, shattering its own internal structure to launch razor-sharp shards at high velocity.

attacks.name: Shard Volley
attacks.effect: Range 120ft. Deals 2d6+3 Piercing Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it looks like a cluster of harmless crystals. Advantage on its first attack (Ambush).

abilities.name: Pinning Spike
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The Ooze fires a heavy crystal spike coated in glue. On Hit: 1d8 Damage and the target is Restrained (pinned to wall/floor). Strength Check DC 14 to escape.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption (Shrapnel)
abilities.effect: The Ooze detonates its outer shell. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d6 Piercing Damage (Reflex Save for half). The Ooze creates a cloud of crystal dust (Blindness) in the area for 1 round.

name: The Crystal Sentinel (Turret)
description: A floating obelisk of geometric crystal, humming with an unnerving resonance. It does not move; it rotates to track targets, firing pulses of binding energy.

attacks.name: Resonance Beam
attacks.effect: Range 60ft. On Hit: No damage. The target is Restrained (encased in crystal or held by gravity). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 18) to escape.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Sentinel has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects (Total AS 2).

abilities.name: Vent Psychic Static
abilities.effect: 15ft Radius. All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They take 2d6 Psychic Damage and are Confused for 1 round.

abilities.name: Analyze Pattern
abilities.effect: The Sentinel scans a specific player. For the rest of the combat, the Sentinel has Advantage on all Attack Checks against that player.

name: The Cult Acolyte
description: A fanatic in blood-stained robes, chanting verses from a book bound in suspicious leather. They hide behind the muscle, using dark magic to drain the life from intruders.

attacks.name: Ritual Dagger
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Ward
abilities.effect: The Acolyte has a shimmering aura of protection. They gain +2 Armor Score (AS) against damage from Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Dark Prayer
abilities.effect: The Acolyte targets one player. The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On Fail: The player takes 2d6 Necrotic Damage, and the Acolyte heals for that amount.

abilities.name: Reinforcements
abilities.effect: The Acolyte blows a bone whistle. 1d4 Minions (Cult Initiates) arrive from the shadows at the end of the round.

loot: 1d10 silver pieces, a blasphemous tract, and a curved sacrificial dagger (2g).

name: The Cult Assassin
description: Wearing the robes of a priest but moving with the silence of a ghost. Their blade drips with a black, viscous fluid. They target the party healer or wizard first.

attacks.name: Poisoned Dagger
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. Effect: On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or take 2d6 Poison Damage (Half on success).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Assassin has Advantage, they deal Double Damage.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Assassin has +1 Attack DC (Total 17) if an ally (like a Cult Brute) is adjacent to their target.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage, and the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be Blinded (sand/poison mist) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Get Them!
abilities.effect: All allies within 30 ft immediately use their Reaction to move up to their Speed toward a specific player to set up a Flank.

loot: 25 gold pieces, a vial of Basic Toxin, and a blasphemous icon.

name: The Cult Zealot
description: Robed figures with branded skin, chanting in unison. They do not fear death; they welcome it as a service to their dark master.

attacks.name: Sacrificial Kris
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Fanaticism
abilities.effect: The Zealot is Immune to the Frightened and Charmed conditions.

abilities.name: Desperate Fury
abilities.effect: When a Zealot is killed, they do not drop quietly. The player who killed them must immediately make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or take 2 Fire Damage as the Zealot's lantern/potion smashes and burns them.

loot: 1d4 gold pieces, a silver unholy symbol (10g), and a vial of volatile oil.

name: The Cursed Spirit
description: A fragment of a soul, torn from the afterlife and bound to a location. It looks like a swirling mist with a screaming face. It passes through shields and armor as if they weren't there.

attacks.name: Chilling Touch
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Spirit can move through solid objects and creatures. It has Resistance (Half Damage) to non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Terrorize
abilities.effect: Instead of attacking, the Spirit flies through a player. The player must make a Will Save (DC 16) or be Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Spectral Burst
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Spirit dissipates with a violent psychic shriek. The player who killed it takes 2 Psychic Damage (no save).

name: The Cutpurse
description: A street rat in dark grey rags, holding a rusted but razor-sharp shank. They don't fight fair; they wait until you are busy with the Brute, then stab you in the kidney.

attacks.name: Rusty Shank
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. Effect: Deals an additional +1d6 damage if the Cutpurse has Advantage.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Cutpurse has Advantage on the attack (e.g., Flanking or Hidden), they deal Double Damage.

abilities.name: Evasive Footwork
abilities.effect: This enemy does not provoke Counter-Attacks when moving out of a player's reach.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.effect: The Cutpurse smashes a clay pot. They become Hidden instantly.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.effect: The Cutpurse throws a powder packet. All players within 20 ft must make a Reflex Save (DC 14) or be Stunned for 1 round.

loot: 1d6 copper pieces, a lockpick, and a stolen locket.

name: The Cyclops Shepherd
description: A one-eyed giant carrying a massive basket of rocks on its back. It possesses crude depth perception issues but makes up for it with terrifying strength and the ability to 'see' magic or fate with its singular eye.

attacks.name: Jagged Rock
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d6+3 Piercing/Bludgeoning Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Thick Skull
abilities.effect: The Cyclops is stubborn. It has Advantage on Saves against Psychic damage and the Stunned condition.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.effect: The Cyclops slams a foot down. All creatures within 5 ft must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 3 Damage (STR Mod) and have their Speed halved for 1 round (pinned).

abilities.name: Batter (Home Run)
abilities.effect: The Cyclops swings a club or fist at a projectile or enemy. Target makes a Reflex Save. Fail: Take Double Damage and be pushed 30 feet away.

loot: A sheepskin cloak (10g), a massive singular lens or monocle (25g).

name: The Darkmantle
description: A squid-like creature with a shell that perfectly resembles a stalactite. It hangs motionless on the ceiling until it drops, wrapping its webbed tentacles around a victim's head to blind and suffocate them.

attacks.name: Crushing Tentacles
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Darkmantle attacks a Surprised target, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, indistinguishable from a stalactite. Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Darkness Aura
abilities.effect: The Darkmantle creates a 15ft Radius of magical darkness. Effect: The area is Heavily Obscured. The Darkmantle (and other monsters with Darkvision) can see through it; players without Darkvision are Blinded.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb (Engulf)
abilities.effect: The Darkmantle drops onto a target. Effect: Target rolls Defense DC 16. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating). The Darkmantle occupies the target's head.

name: The Death-Kiss
description: A terrifying variation where the eye-stalks are replaced by blood-sucking tentacles ending in toothy maws. It does not shoot rays; it feeds. It glows with a pale, electrical aura.

attacks.name: Tentacle Maw
attacks.effect: The Death-Kiss attacks with Two Tentacles. Damage: 1d8+4 Piercing/Lightning Damage each. On a hit, the target is Grappled.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Electric Skin
abilities.effect: If a melee attack hits the Death-Kiss, the attacker takes 1d6 Lightning Damage.

abilities.name: Bite (Drain)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Grappled target. On Hit: 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. Effect: The Death-Kiss regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Tyrant's Command (Magnetic Pull)
abilities.effect: The Death-Kiss creates a magnetic vortex. All creatures wearing metal armor within 30 feet are pulled 15 feet toward the monster and knocked Prone (Strength Save DC 18 negates).

name: The Deep Hybrid
description: A humanoid shape, but wrong. Scale-patches, gills, webbed hands, and eyes that don't blink. They fight with rusted hooks and a terrifying, silent coordination.

attacks.name: Rusted Hook
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Regeneration (Resilience)
abilities.effect: Even as Minions, they are tough. If a Hybrid is killed by non-Fire/non-Acid damage, roll a d6. On a 6, it doesn't die.

abilities.name: Engulf (Mob)
abilities.effect: If 2 or more Hybrids attack the same target, that target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Void Shield
abilities.effect: The Hybrid manifests a flickering aura. It gains 1 Temporary HP (effectively requiring 2 hits to kill) and Resistance to Magic for 1 round.

name: The Deep Sovereign
description: A massive, three-eyed leviathan that floats in the air as if it were water, surrounded by a haze of mucous. Its tentacles are long and translucent. It speaks telepathically, its voice dripping with ancient malice.

attacks.name: Tentacle Lash
attacks.effect: Reach 15ft. Deals 2d6+5 Acid Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). On a fail, they contract Slime Rot (Skin becomes translucent, they take 1d6 damage if they end their turn not submerged in water).

abilities.name: Aura of Madness
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 feet of the Sovereign must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Enslave
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Target must make a Will Save (DC 18). Effect: On a failure, they are Charmed and consider the Sovereign their master. They will use their movement to intercept attacks meant for the Sovereign. (Save ends if target takes damage).

abilities.name: Psychic Crush
abilities.effect: The Sovereign targets up to 3 creatures it can see. They take 3d6 Psychic Damage (Will Save for Half).

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Sovereign rips a hole in the world. A 20ft Radius zone becomes Zero-Gravity. All creatures in the zone float and have Disadvantage on Attacks.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 500 gold pieces, a Vial of Ancient Memory (Consumable: Gain 1 Skill Level), and a map to a sunken city.

name: The Deep Titan
description: A massive entity from the lightless depths, part crustacean, part cephalopod. It drags itself forward on tree-trunk thick tentacles. Being near it feels like standing under a crushing weight.

attacks.name: Crushing Limb
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Aura of Madness
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 feet of the Titan must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Dazed for 1 round (mind reeling from the wrongness of its presence).

abilities.name: Engulf (Absorb)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Prone or Grappled target. Effect: The Titan moves into the target's space. The target is Restrained and takes automatic 2d8+5 Acid Damage at the start of the Titan's turns.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Titan rips the fabric of the world. A 20ft Radius zone becomes zero-gravity. Effect: Creatures float helplessly. They have Disadvantage on DEX checks and Attacks unless they can fly or grab a solid object.

name: The Dimensional Shambler
description: A hunched, rugose figure that seems to shimmer and fade at the edges. It hunts by stepping through invisible angles in the air, appearing behind its prey with claws raised.

attacks.name: Warping Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (reality warping/rusting).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Shambler has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Shambler exists partially in another dimension. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Spatial Warp
abilities.effect: The Shambler twists space. It teleports itself to any point within 60 feet. If it teleports into a location with Cover/Obscurity, it can make a Stealth Check to become Hidden as part of the action.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Shambler rips a hole in the world. A 20ft Radius zone becomes Zero-Gravity. Creatures float helplessly. They have Disadvantage on DEX checks and Attacks unless they can fly or grab a solid object.

name: The Dire Cougar
description: A sleek, tawny mountain cat the size of a horse. It moves with absolute silence, stalking the party for miles, waiting for a moment of weakness to crush a windpipe.

attacks.name: Rending Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the Cougar moves 5 feet (no counter-attacks), repositioning to maintain the flank.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Cougar has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.effect: The Cougar has +2 Attack DC (Total 20) against any target that is Bleeding or below 50% HP.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.effect: The Cougar leaps 20ft and attacks. On Hit: Half Damage. Effect: The player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.effect: The Cougar makes a vicious bite attack against a target that is Prone or Grappled. Effect: This attack deals Double Damage and heals the Cougar for half the amount dealt.

loot: Pristine Pelt (100g), Eye of the Hunter (50g, Alchemical Reagent).

name: The Dire Rhinoceros
description: A prehistoric tank of muscle and leather. It paws the ground, lowering a horn the size of a spear. It claims this territory, and it will not move for anything less than a landslide.

attacks.name: Massive Horn
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.effect: If the Rhino moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a target, its Attack DC increases by +1 (Total 19) for that turn.

abilities.name: Terrifying Roar
abilities.effect: The Rhino bellows. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.effect: Trigger: Reduced to 30 HP or less. The Rhino clears all negative conditions (Stunned, Blinded, etc.) and immediately takes an extra Standard Action.

name: The Displacer Beast
description: A sleek, six-legged panther with blue-black fur. Two tentacles ending in spined pads sprout from its shoulders. It appears to be standing several feet away from its actual location, shimmering like a mirage.

attacks.name: Tentacle Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Bludgeoning/Piercing Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is pulled 5 feet closer (into bite range).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Displacement
abilities.effect: Attack Checks against the Beast have Disadvantage. If the Beast takes damage, this trait is suppressed until the start of its next turn.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: The Beast strikes with both tentacles. It makes Two Attacks. If both hit the same target, the target is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.effect: Trigger: When targeted by an attack. The Beast teleports 15 feet to an unoccupied space, leaving an illusion behind. The incoming attack misses automatically.

name: The Dread Observer
description: A massive sphere of chiseled stone and black iron, resembling a floating fortress more than a creature. It projects a cone of silence and crushing force. It guards the deepest vaults of the Underdark.

attacks.name: Telekinetic Slam
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). The Observer slams a target into a wall. Player rolls Defense DC 19. On Fail: 2d8+5 Force Damage and Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Panopticon
