abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Cone
abilities.effect: The Observer's central eye emits a 30 ft cone of suppression. Inside this cone, no magic functions. It aims this cone at the end of its turn to cover the party's spellcasters.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Observer spins, firing beams in every direction. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.effect: The Observer focuses all its eye-stalks into a single beam. Target one creature. Effect: Target takes 6d10 Force Damage (Ignores Armor). Save: Dodge (Defense Check) vs DC 19 for Half Damage. Lethal: If reduced to 0 HP, the target turns to dust.

name: The Drop-Slime
description: A patch of translucent green goo that clings to the dungeon ceiling, looking exactly like harmless mold or condensation. It waits for body heat before detaching with a wet plop onto a victim's head.

attacks.name: Acid Sucker
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Acid Damage. On a Critical Hit, the targets Armor Score is reduced by 1 (helmet melting).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Slime has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Ceiling), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Sticky Climber
abilities.effect: The Slime can move on ceilings without checking. It has Advantage on Stealth checks to remain unnoticed above.

abilities.name: Suffocate
abilities.effect: The Slime drops onto a target's head. Target rolls Defense DC 14. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Silenced). They take 1d6+2 Acid Damage at the start of the Slime's turn.

abilities.name: Liquid Form (Slip)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When missed by an attack. The Slime liquefies and moves 15 feet along the wall or ceiling to a new hiding spot. It becomes Hidden.

name: The Dust Mephit
description: A small, winged creature made of crumbling earth and grave dust. They chatter incessantly and delight in tormenting adventurers. They tend to explode into blinding clouds when destroyed.

attacks.name: Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Body (Earth)
abilities.effect: The Mephit is made of loose dirt. It has Resistance to Piercing damage.

abilities.name: Blind
abilities.effect: Instead of attacking, the Mephit throws a handful of itself at a player's eyes. The target must make a Reflex Save (DC 11) or be Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Nova (Death Burst)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Mephit explodes in a cloud of dust. All creatures within 5 feet are Blinded for 1 round (No Save).

name: The Earth Drake
description: A wingless, badger-like dragon with stone-gray scales and massive digging claws. It burrows out of the walls to intercept intruders, using its bulk to block tunnels.

attacks.name: Crushing Jaws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Acid)
abilities.effect: Immune to Acid. Vulnerable to Lightning.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Drakes scales are like granite. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (included in stats).

abilities.name: Tail Sweep
abilities.effect: The Drake spins. All enemies in a 10ft rear arc must make a Defense Check (Dodge) vs DC 16. Fail: They take 1d8+3 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: The Drake exhales a spray of caustic sludge. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures take 4d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save DC 13 for half).

name: The Earth Myrmidon
description: A hulking suit of crude plate armor that contains no body, only a swirling vortex of sand and gravity. It hits with the force of a landslide and is nearly impossible to move.

attacks.name: Stone Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Thunder damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Myrmidon has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Tremor Stomp
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage, and the target must make a Reflex Save (DC 13) or be knocked Prone and pushed 10 feet back.

abilities.name: Nova (Eruption)
abilities.effect: The Myrmidon slams the ground. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save for half) as the earth buckles violently.

name: The Elder Earth Elemental
description: A walking hill of granite and raw iron ore, bound by a glowing rune on its chest. It does not speak; it only grinds. It is an engine of siege warfare, unstoppable and unfeeling.

attacks.name: Granite Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (shields shatter, plate crumples).

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Thunder damage.

abilities.name: Earth Glide
abilities.effect: The Elemental moves through earth/stone as if it were air (Burrow). It ignores ground-based difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Crush)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Ignores Armor Score). On Hit: The target takes 2d8+5 Damage and is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Nova (Earthquake)
abilities.effect: The Elemental slams the ground. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save for half) and are knocked Prone. The area becomes Difficult Terrain (rubble).

name: The Elder Ooze
description: A colossal, transparent mountain of gelatin that fills an entire cavern chamber. Suspended inside are the skeletons of giants and the rusted remains of siege engines. It is ancient, slow, and unstoppable.

attacks.name: Titanic Pseudopod
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning/Acid Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Magic Absorbent
abilities.effect: The Elder Ooze is immune to Force Damage and Magic Missiles. If hit by these, it Heals for the amount rolled.

abilities.name: Engulf (Mass)
abilities.effect: The Ooze moves up to its speed. It can move over Large or smaller creatures. Creatures in its path must roll Defense DC 19. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating). Takes 2d8+5 Acid at start of turn.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Ooze constricts all targets it currently has Engulfed. Targets take Double Damage (Automatic, no roll). The Ooze heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

loot: A floating +2 Shield, a skeleton of a dragon (bones worth 200g), 1000g in acid-pitted coins.

name: The Elven Sniper
description: Clad in a cloak of shifting leaves, this archer holds a position on the high ground. They don't panic when approached; they just smile and notch another arrow.

attacks.name: Composite Longbow
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Physical Damage. Effect: If the Sniper has not moved this turn, their Attack DC increases to 19 (making them much harder to Dodge).

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Sniper gains +1 Attack DC if an ally is adjacent to their target (they coordinate fire with their frontline).

abilities.name: Volley Fire
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. Target a 10ft Radius area. All players in the area must roll Defense vs. DC 17. On a fail, they take weapon damage.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Sniper marks a player. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

loot: 10 gold pieces, a quiver of high-quality arrows, and a silken handkerchief.

name: The Ember-Heart
description: A swirling cyclone of fire and ash, anchored by a burning obsidian core in its chest. It does not walk; it burns a path across the ground. It seeks only to consume fuel and grow.

attacks.name: Flame Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Fire Damage. Can attack targets up to 10ft away. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold/Water.

abilities.name: Elemental Body
abilities.effect: Intense heat. Any creature Grappling the Ember-Heart or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Scorch)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Tag: Ignores Armor Score. On Hit: Deals 1d10+4 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Nova (Heat Wave)
abilities.effect: The Ember-Heart pulses. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

name: The Ember-Maw
description: A small, red-scaled dragon with an oversized throat sack that glows like a furnace. It clings to stalactites or ruins, hawking globs of sticky magma at intruders.

attacks.name: Magma Glob
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d6+2 Fire Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Pass, they take half damage. On a Fail, they take full damage and gain the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Ember-Maw does not Move on its turn, its Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage (aiming/building pressure).

abilities.name: Wingover
abilities.effect: The Ember-Maw beats its wings. All adjacent creatures are pushed 10 feet away. It then moves up to 20 feet (Fly) without provoking counter-attacks.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: The Ember-Maw exhales a cone of fire. 15ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area take 2d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save DC 17 for half).

name: The Executioner
description: Clad in black plate mail, face hidden by a heavy hood. They move with a slow, inevitable ponderousness, dragging a massive sword that has ended a hundred lives.

attacks.name: Headsman's Greatsword
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Physical Damage. If the player rolls a Natural 1 on their Defense Check, they are automatically knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Aura of Menace
abilities.effect: Players have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against the Executioner's abilities while within 10 feet.

abilities.name: Execute
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Critical Damage (4d8+10). Requirement: Can only be used on a player that is already Prone or Stunned.

abilities.name: Wall of Steel
abilities.effect: The Executioner raises their blade in a perfect defensive stance. Until the start of their next turn, they gain Resistance (Half Damage) to all Physical Damage.

loot: 50 gold pieces, a vial of Paralytic Toxin (75g), and a ruby-studded belt buckle (50g).

name: The Eye Tyrant
description: The classic nightmare. A floating orb of chiseled flesh and chitin, with a massive central eye and ten writhing stalks. It hovers in the center of a vertical shaft, dictating the terms of the battle. It hates you. It hates everything.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Damage. Target is Grappled (Jaw-lock).

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Cone
abilities.effect: The Tyrant's central eye creates a 60ft Cone of anti-magic. Inside, no spells function. The Tyrant chooses where this points at the start of each of its turns. It cannot fire Rays into the cone.

abilities.name: Ray Volley
abilities.effect: The Tyrant fires 3 Random Rays (Roll d8). It cannot target the same creature twice in one volley.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.effect: The Tyrant focuses all power on one target. Effect: Target takes 6d10 Force Damage (Ignores Armor). Dodge (Defense) for Half. If reduced to 0 HP, target turns to dust.

abilities.name: Reality Shift
abilities.effect: The Tyrant alters the dungeon layout. It creates a Wall of Stone or turns the floor into a Pit (Reflex Save or fall 20ft).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

name: The Eye-Guard
description: A beach-ball-sized sphere of calloused flesh encased in crude iron bands. It hovers at head-height, its single central eye unblinking. It acts as a heavy drone, intercepting intruders with a low-grade thermal beam.

attacks.name: Focused Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Player rolls Defense DC 15. On Fail: 1d8+2 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Distracting Gaze
abilities.effect: Enemies within 10 ft have Disadvantage on all Attack Checks. The Eye-Guard's erratic movements and unblinking stare make it hard to focus on hitting it.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Deals 1d4 damage and Grapples the target.

abilities.name: Paranoid Snap
abilities.effect: Trigger: When the Eye-Guard takes damage. The Eye-Guard immediately fires its Searing Ray at the attacker as a Free Action.

name: The Feral Vampire
description: A starving lesser vampire, stripped of nobility and reduced to a beast. It moves with blurring speed, claws extended, eyes burning with red hunger.

attacks.name: Razor Talons
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Life Sense
abilities.effect: The Vampire automatically detects living creatures within 60 feet, even if they are Hidden or Invisible.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Necrotic Damage. Effect: The Vampire regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Horde Instinct
abilities.effect: The Vampire screeches. All Unliving Minions (e.g., Bats, Rats, Thralls) within 30 feet immediately move their full speed toward the nearest player. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks.

loot: Vampire Fang (50g), Vial of Cursed Blood (25g).

name: The Fire Giant Legionnaire
description: A tower of black iron and burning beard. It wears plate armor forged in a volcano and wields a greatsword that glows with internal heat. It fights with military precision, barking orders in Giantish.

attacks.name: Magma Greatsword
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Fire/Slashing Damage. Reach 10ft. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Fire Born
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Thick Skull
abilities.effect: The Giant is disciplined. It has Advantage on Saves against Psychic damage and the Stunned condition.

abilities.name: Bellow
abilities.effect: The Giant shouts a war cry. All allies (e.g., Hellhounds or other Giants) within 30 feet gain Advantage on their next Attack Check.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.effect: The Giant's beard flares white-hot. For 1 minute, it deals an additional +1d6 Fire Damage on all attacks, but its Defense DC is reduced to 13.

loot: A blackened steel shield (Scrap), a ruby the size of a fist (100g).

name: The Flesh-Mound
description: A rolling, wet heap of muscle, mismatched limbs, and gnashing mouths. It smells of copper and ozone. It doesn't dodge; it just absorbs blows into its jelly-like bulk.

attacks.name: Gnashing Maws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player takes damage plus Bleeding (1d4/turn) as jagged teeth tear flesh.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Flesh-Mound regains 5 HP at the start of its turn unless it took Fire or Acid damage in the previous round.

abilities.name: Gibbering
abilities.effect: The Mound wails from a dozen mouths. All enemies within 20 feet must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: They become Confused for 1 round (Must attack the nearest creature).

abilities.name: Fission
abilities.effect: Trigger: When the Mound takes Slashing or Lightning damage. The Mound splits. It loses half its current HP, and a duplicate Flesh-Mound appears in an adjacent space with the same amount of HP.

name: The Flesh-Tick
description: A pale, pulsating sack of fluid the size of a dog, scuttling on too many spindly legs. It drops from ceilings to drain fluids, growing redder and larger as it feeds.

attacks.name: Needle Proboscis
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) as the tick latches on.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Tick has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Ceiling), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.effect: The Tick can squeeze through 1-inch gaps. It is Immune to the Prone condition.

abilities.name: Engulf (Drain)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Grappled target. Effect: The Tick deals Automatic Damage (1d6+2). It heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Fission (Pop)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Tick bursts violently. All creatures within 5 feet take 2d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Floor-Trapper
description: A flat, wide creature that perfectly mimics a stone floor or a dungeon rug. It waits for the party to walk into its center before snapping shut like a bear trap made of meat.

attacks.name: Smothering Fold
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the target is Silenced (wrapped in flesh, cannot speak/cast) until the start of their next turn.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from the floor. It has Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Engulf (The Trap)
abilities.effect: The Trapper folds upward. It targets up to Two creatures standing on it. Targets roll Defense DC 18. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating). They take 2d6+3 Acid Damage at the start of the Trapper's turn.

abilities.name: Sudden Surge (Roll Up)
abilities.effect: The Trapper rapidly contracts. It moves up to 60 feet (carrying any Engulfed victims with it) to a safer location, like a ceiling or a pit edge.

name: The Flying Blade
description: A rusted sword, axe, or spear levitating under its own power. It spins and weaves through the air, striking with mechanical precision.

attacks.name: Spinning Slice
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Slashing Damage.

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The construct is a whirling blade. Any creature that tries to Grapple it or hits it with an Unarmed Strike automatically takes 1 Damage.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.effect: The blade launches itself at a target. It makes an attack that Ignores 1 point of Armor Score.

abilities.name: Overcharge (Flurry)
abilities.effect: All Flying Blades within 30 feet immediately take an Extra Attack Action.

name: The Fog Giant
description: A 15-foot tall giant with skin the color of rainclouds and armor made of condensed vapor. They are silent assassins of the sky castles, using clouds to separate and eliminate targets.

attacks.name: Vapor Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Cold/Physical Damage. Reach 10ft. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed (Levitation)
abilities.effect: The Giant floats silently. It cannot be knocked Prone or tracked by sound (Advantage on Stealth).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Giant has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris (Fog Bomb)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Creates a 20ft Radius cloud of fog. The area is Heavily Obscured (Blindness). The Giant can see through this fog.

abilities.name: Batter (Gust)
abilities.effect: The Giant swings its hand, creating a hurricane-force wind. Target makes a Reflex Save (DC 17). Fail: Take Double Weapon Damage and be pushed 30 feet away (potentially off a cliff/cloud).

abilities.name: War Cry (Silence)
abilities.effect: The Giant sucks the sound out of the air. All creatures within 60 feet are Silenced for 1 round.

loot: A necklace of pearls (200g), Boots of Elvenkind (taken from a victim), Bottle of Captured Lightning.

name: The Fomorian Slaver
description: A hideously deformed giant from the Underdark, with one oversized, milky eye and a hunchback bursting with muscle. It drags a massive chain hook and hates anything beautiful.

attacks.name: Iron Chain
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning Damage. Reach 15ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled and pulled adjacent to the Fomorian.

abilities.name: Wide Swing
abilities.effect: If the Fomorian hits a target with its chain, the massive links sweep the area. One other enemy adjacent to the target takes half damage.

abilities.name: Fling Victim
abilities.effect: The Fomorian grabs a creature (Grapple check or auto-success if already Grappled). Effect: It throws them 30 feet. The victim takes 3d6 Damage and lands Prone.

abilities.name: War Cry (Evil Eye)
abilities.effect: The Fomorian fixes its magical eye on the party. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round as their bodies warp with temporary pain.

loot: Manacles of dimensional steel (Magical restraint), a sack of 'pretty rocks' (uncut gems worth 200g).

name: The Frost Giant Raider
description: A vanguard of the frost jarls, wearing white wolf pelts and wielding a massive, rusted chain with a hook on the end. It slides across the ice, hooking enemies and dragging them out of formation.

attacks.name: Ice-Hook Chain
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Cold/Physical Damage. Reach 15ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled and pulled adjacent to the Giant.

abilities.name: Ice Born
abilities.effect: Immune to Cold. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Trampling Charge
abilities.effect: If the Giant moves at least 20 ft straight towards a creature and hits it, the target must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Sweep
abilities.effect: The Giant swings the chain in a wide arc. All enemies in a 10 ft semi-circle must roll Defense vs DC 19. Fail: They take 2d6+4 Damage and are pushed 10 ft back.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Ice Shatter)
abilities.effect: The Giant slams the ground. The ground in a 15 ft radius shatters. Creatures inside take 4d10 Bludgeoning/Cold Damage (Reflex Save for half). The area becomes Difficult Terrain (sharp ice shards).

loot: Huge Rusted Chain (Scrap), White Wolf Pelt (50g), Runed armband (50g).

name: The Frost Jarl
description: A towering warrior with skin like blue ice and a beard of white frost. He wears armor made from dragon bones and plate. He does not fight like a beast; he fights like a king, demanding single combat.

attacks.name: Glacial Greataxe
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Cold/Slashing Damage. Reach 10ft. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS) (shatters metal with cold).

abilities.name: Ice Born
abilities.effect: Immune to Cold. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Trampling Charge
abilities.effect: If the Jarl moves at least 20 ft straight towards a creature and hits it, the target must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Bellow (War Cry)
abilities.effect: The Jarl shouts a challenge. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Avalanche)
abilities.effect: The Jarl slams his axe into the ground. Ice shards and rocks rain down in a 20 ft radius. Creatures inside take 4d10 Cold/Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save for half) and are Restrained (buried in ice).

abilities.name: Batter
abilities.effect: The Jarl punts a target. Target makes a Reflex Save. Fail: Take Double Weapon Damage and be pushed 30 feet away.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: White Dragon Scale (50g), Masterwork Greataxe, 500 Gold Pieces (frozen in a block of ice).

name: The Frost-Bound Siren
description: A figure composed of drifting snow and pale blue light, hovering above the ground. Her song promises warmth and sleep, luring adventurers into a grave of ice.

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d6+3 Cold Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron/Fire.

abilities.name: Elemental Body (Cold)
abilities.effect: The air around her is absolute zero. Any creature Grappling the Siren or hitting her with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Cold Damage.

abilities.name: Flash Freeze
abilities.effect: The Siren targets a creature within 30ft. The target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). On a fail, they take 2d6 Cold Damage and their Speed is reduced to 0 (Frozen in place) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Nova (Winter's Wail)
abilities.effect: The Siren screams. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Cold Damage (Reflex Save for half). The ground in the area becomes slippery ice (Difficult Terrain).

name: The Frost-Weaver
description: A sleek, white dragon with translucent wings that look like snowflakes. It hovers just out of reach, exhaling a mist that freezes armor brittle before shattering it with a sonic screech.

attacks.name: Ice Lance
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d6+3 Cold Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Cold)
abilities.effect: Immune to Cold. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Frost-Weaver has tougher scales than most artillery. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (Total AS 1).

abilities.name: Elemental Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Ignores Armor Score. Damage: 2d6+3 Cold Damage.

abilities.name: Incinerate (Flash Freeze)
abilities.effect: The Frost-Weaver targets a single creature with a concentrated beam of cold. Effect: The target takes 2d6 Cold Damage automatically. They also suffer a permanent -1 to Dexterity (frostbitten nerves) until cured by magic.

name: The Fungus Hulk
description: A lumbering, ape-like shape composed of violet shelf-fungus and dense, rubbery mycelium. It releases clouds of choking dust with every heavy footfall. It guards damp caves and deep underdark tunnels.

attacks.name: Mycelium Fist
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores
abilities.effect: Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the Hulk must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Poisoned for 1 round (coughing/choking).

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: 1d10+3 Damage. Effect: Simple, crushing force. If the target is Poisoned, this attack deals +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Pollen Nova
abilities.effect: The Hulk rips open its own chest cavity. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until damaged.

name: The Furnace Golem
description: A walking iron stove, glowing cherry-red with internal heat. Smoke belches from its 'mouth,' and its fists are searing hammers.

attacks.name: Red-Hot Fists
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Fire/Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The Golem is intensely hot. Any creature grappling the Golem or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Vent Steam
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: Take 2d6 Fire Damage and be Blinded for 1 round by the steam.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: The Golem stokes its internal fire. It immediately takes an Extra Standard Action. Cost: At the end of this extra action, the Golem takes 1d10 Damage as it melts its own slag.

name: The Galvanic Sentinel
description: A blue, wingless drake that coils around high pillars or towers. Its horn acts as a lightning rod, gathering storm energy which it discharges with deafening cracks of thunder.

attacks.name: Thunder-Cannon
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Lightning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (magnetized/shattered).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Acid.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Sentinel's scales act as grounded plating. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (Total AS 1).

abilities.name: Tail Sweep
abilities.effect: The Sentinel spins. All enemies in a 10ft rear arc must make a Defense Check (Dodge) vs DC 20. Fail: They take 2d8+4 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Roar of the Ancients
abilities.effect: The Sentinel unleashes a sonic boom. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: They drop whatever they are holding (weapons/shields) and are Frightened for 1 round.

name: The Gazer
description: A skull-sized sphere of green flesh with four spindly eye-stalks. It behaves like a feral cathissing, spitting, and darting away when threatened. It serves as a pet or pest in deep dungeons.

attacks.name: Minor Ray
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Elemental Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes Double Damage.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Distracting Gaze
abilities.effect: Enemies within 10 ft have Disadvantage on all Attack Checks. The Gazer bobs and weaves, its eyes tracking every movement.

abilities.name: Ray Volley
abilities.effect: The Gazer fires 2 Random Rays (Roll d8 on Ray Table). It cannot target the same creature twice with this action.

abilities.name: Reality Shift (Blink)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When targeted by an attack. The Gazer teleports 15 feet to an unoccupied space, causing the attack to miss automatically.

name: The Gazer Lord
description: A bloated, pulsating sphere the size of a wagon, surrounded by a halo of twitching, smaller gazers that act as extra eyes. It is a petty tyrant, demanding tribute from goblins and kobolds, vaporizing any who kneel too slowly.

attacks.name: Focused Beam (Searing)
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Player rolls Defense DC 16. On Fail: 2d6+4 Fire Damage and Burning.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Lord, the spell bounces back at the caster. The caster must roll Defense against their own Spell DC.

abilities.name: Ray Volley
abilities.effect: The Lord fires 2 Random Rays (Roll d8 on Ray Table).

abilities.name: Tyrant's Command
abilities.effect: The Lord shrieks telepathically. Target player must make a Will Save (DC 14). Fail: Target is Dominated for 1 round. They immediately use their Reaction to attack their nearest ally.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

name: The Gazer-Hulk
description: A swollen, bloodshot sphere the size of an ogre. It lacks the grace of true beholders; it simply drifts forward, drooling caustic fluid, while its four erratic eye-stalks fire wildly.

attacks.name: Crushing Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is Grappled (Jaw-lock).

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Distracting Gaze
abilities.effect: Enemies within 10 ft have Disadvantage on all Attack Checks. The Hulk floats uncomfortably close, its eyes twitching and staring.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Hulk spins. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8 on Ray Table).

abilities.name: Paranoid Snap
abilities.effect: Trigger: When damaged. The Hulk immediately fires one Random Ray at the attacker as a Free Action.

name: The Gelatinous Cube
description: A ten-foot cube of transparent, quivering ooze. It fills a hallway completely, sliding silently over stone. Floating inside are the suspended skeletons and gear of those who failed to run.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Acid Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be Stunned (Paralyzed) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Transparent
abilities.effect: The Cube is nearly invisible. It has Advantage on Stealth checks to Ambush. Creatures that run into it are automatically Engulfed.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: The Cube moves up to its speed. It can move over Large or smaller creatures. Creatures in its path must roll Defense DC 15. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating). They take 2d6+4 Acid Damage at the start of the Cube's turn.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption (Acid Spray)
abilities.effect: The Cube shudders and ejects excess mass. All creatures within 15 feet take 3d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save DC 14 for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 200 gold pieces (pitted), a +1 Sword (Acid resistant), and a skeleton wearing a Ring of Water Walking.

name: The Ghost-Eye
description: An undead beholder-kin that exists partially in the Ethereal Plane. It looks like a floating, translucent skull with a spectral eye. It passes through walls to flank enemies, firing rays that rot flesh instantly.

attacks.name: Death Ray
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Ghost-Eye has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Ghost-Eye can move through solid objects and creatures. It has Resistance (Half Damage) to non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Fear Ray
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Target must make a Will Save (DC 17). On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Disintegrate (Ambush)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When attacking from a wall/floor. The Ghost-Eye emerges from solid stone to fire. The target takes 6d10 Force Damage (Dodge for Half). If reduced to 0 HP, the target turns to dust.

name: The Giant Centipede
description: A six-foot-long ribbon of chitin and twitching legs. It clings to the ceiling in the dark, waiting for a torchbearer to pass underneath before dropping on their neck.

attacks.name: Mandibles
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. This attack ignores 1 point of Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Centipede has Advantage on the attack (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Ceiling), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Spider Climb
abilities.effect: The Centipede can climb walls and ceilings at full speed without checking.

abilities.name: Venomous Strike
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14) or gain the Poisoned condition (1d6 damage/turn) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Pounce (Drop)
abilities.effect: The Centipede drops from above. It leaps up to 30 feet at a target. The player must make a Reflex Save (DC 14). Fail: They take normal damage and are knocked Prone.

name: The Giant Crocodile
description: A prehistoric reptile the size of a wagon, covered in moss and algae. It bursts from the water with terrifying speed, jaws snapping like a steel trap.

attacks.name: Massive Jaws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Strength Save (DC 18). On a fail, they are Grappled (Speed 0) and dragged into the water.

abilities.name: Amphibious
abilities.effect: The Crocodile can breathe water and swims at full speed.

abilities.name: Latch On
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player is Grappled. If the player starts their turn Grappled by the Crocodile, they automatically take 4 Damage from the grinding teeth.

abilities.name: Death Roll (Maul)
abilities.effect: The Crocodile spins violently while holding a victim. It makes a special attack against a Grappled target. This deals Double Damage and heals the Crocodile for half the amount dealt.

name: The Giant Flytrap
description: A massive, leafy stalk ending in a set of jaws wide enough to swallow a horse. It camouflages itself as a tropical bush or a hanging vine cluster until it snaps shut.

attacks.name: Snap-Jaws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Piercing Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Thorny Skin
abilities.effect: The Flytrap is covered in digestive spines. Any creature Grappling it or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: Target must be Grappled. The Flytrap swallows them. Effect: The target is Restrained, Blinded, and Suffocating inside the plant. They take 2d8+4 Acid Damage at the start of the Flytrap's turn. Escape: The target must deal 15 Damage to the interior (AC 10) to cut their way out.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Flytrap constricts a target it has Engulfed. Effect: The target takes Double Damage (Automatic). The Flytrap heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

name: The Giant Soldier Ant
description: A chitinous nightmare the size of a pony. It clicks its mandibles in a rhythmic, terrifying code. It does not fear death; it only fears failure to protect the hive.

attacks.name: Crushing Mandibles
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (Armor cracked).

abilities.name: Spider Climb
abilities.effect: The Ant can climb walls and ceilings at full speed without checking.

abilities.name: Acid Spit
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: The target takes 1d6 Acid Damage and their Armor Score is reduced by 1 until repaired/washed.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.effect: The Ant spins violently. All creatures adjacent to it must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). Fail: They take 3 Damage and are pushed 10 feet away.

name: The Giant Viper
description: A ten-foot-long serpent with emerald scales and a rattling tail. It coils and strikes faster than the eye can follow, darting away before a sword can land.

attacks.name: Fangs
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. If the attack hits, the Viper immediately moves 5 feet (this movement does not provoke counter-attacks).

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Viper has Advantage on Attack DC against Hidden enemies (smell/heat). It cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Venomous Strike
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage, and the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or gain the Poisoned condition (1d6 damage/turn) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.effect: The Viper coils and launches itself. It leaps up to 30 feet at a target. The player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or take normal damage and be knocked Prone.

name: The Giant Web-Spinner
description: A bloated, bulbous spider with a skull-like pattern on its abdomen. It hangs out of reach, firing sticky strands to isolate victims for its brood.

attacks.name: Chitinous Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Spider Climb
abilities.effect: The Spider can climb walls and ceilings at full speed without checking.

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: The player takes no damage but is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Attacks). Escape: STR Check (DC 13).

abilities.name: Call of the Wild
abilities.effect: The Spider vibrates its web. 1d4 Minions (Spider Swarms) drop from the ceiling at the end of the round.

name: The Gibbering Mass
description: A rolling hill of liquefied flesh, adorned with hundreds of weeping eyes and gnashing mouths. It bubbles and shrieks in a cacophony that drives listeners mad.

attacks.name: Many-Mouths
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage and gains the Bleeding condition (1d4/turn) as chunks of flesh are torn away.

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.effect: The Mass can squeeze through 1-inch gaps without slowing. It is Immune to the Grappled and Prone conditions.

abilities.name: Gibbering (Aura)
abilities.effect: All enemies within 20 feet must make a Will Save (DC 14). Fail: They become Confused for 1 round (Must use Action to attack the nearest creature, determined randomly).

abilities.name: Acid Spittle
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: 1d8+2 Acid Damage. Effect: The target's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: The Mass moves into an adjacent player's space. The player is Restrained (Speed 0). At the start of the Mass's next turn, the engulfed player takes 2d8+4 Acid Damage (no save). Escape requires an Action and a Strength Check (DC 14).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 200 gold pieces worth of indigestible jewelry inside the mass, plus a Mutagenic Gland (50g).

name: The Gibbering Mote
description: A bouncing, rolling ball of red meat, eyes, and teeth. It makes a sound like weeping children mixed with wet slaps.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.effect: The Mote can squeeze through 1-inch gaps. It is Immune to Grappled and Prone.

abilities.name: Gibbering (Aura)
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Motes are adjacent to a player, that player is Dazed (1 Action or Move only) due to the cacophony.

abilities.name: Fission (Pop)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Mote bursts. It deals 2 Acid Damage to anyone adjacent to it.

name: The Glass Assassin
description: A mannequin made of reinforced, enchanted glass. It is nearly invisible when still and moves with a terrifying, silent grace. It was built to kill nobles in their beds.

attacks.name: Glass Dagger
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Piercing Damage. On a Critical Hit, roll one additional damage die.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Assassin has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Immutable Form
abilities.effect: Critical Hits against the Assassin are treated as Normal Hits (Players gain no Bonus Effect or Luck).

abilities.name: Vent (Flashbulb)
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the cone must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be Blinded for 1 round. The Assassin uses this distraction to Hide (Bonus Action) or flee.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: The Assassin moves with a burst of speed. It immediately takes an Extra Standard Action (usually to Dash away or attack again). Cost: It takes 1d10 Damage at the end of the turn (cracks appearing in the glass).

name: The Gloom-Gazer
description: A dark, matte-black sphere that absorbs light. It floats silently in the upper corners of dungeon rooms, its single eye closed until it is ready to fire a withering beam at an exposed back.

attacks.name: Wither Ray
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Necrotic Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is Weakened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Gloom-Gazer has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
abilities.effect: The Gloom-Gazer can attempt to Hide even when observed, provided it is in Dim Light or Darkness.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. 1d4 Damage.

abilities.name: Reality Shift (Blink)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When targeted. The Gloom-Gazer teleports 15 feet into a shadow, causing the incoming attack to miss automatically.

name: The Grand Inquisitor
description: Draped in crimson vestments over mirror-polished steel. They hold a silver greatsword inscribed with curses against magic. Their eyes burn with fanaticism. They are here to purge the party.

attacks.name: Mage-Slayer Greatsword
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Physical Damage. If the player rolls a Natural 1 on their Defense Check, they are automatically knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Arcane Ward
abilities.effect: The Inquisitor glows with a faint abjuration field. They gain +2 Armor Score (AS) against damage from Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Hold Person
abilities.effect: The Inquisitor points at a player and recites a scripture. The player must make a Will Save (DC 18). On Fail: The player is Paralyzed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Mass Dispel
abilities.effect: The Inquisitor slams their sword into the ground. All active player buffs (e.g., Shield, Bless, Haste) and ongoing spell effects within 60 feet are instantly ended.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 500 gold pieces, a Scroll of Banishment, and the Mage-Slayer Greatsword (Masterwork, worth 300g).

name: The Grave Knight
description: A towering suit of black armor animated by a vengeful spirit. Cold blue fire burns behind its visor. It wields a blade made of permafrost and shadow.

attacks.name: Frostblade
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Cold/Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Knight has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Touch
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (off-hand gauntlet). On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Grave-Bind
abilities.effect: Spectral chains burst from the ground in a 20ft Radius. The area is Difficult Terrain. Any creature standing there is Restrained (Strength Save DC 13 to escape).

name: The Gray Ooze
description: A fast-moving puddle of wet stone-colored sludge. It slides across floors and walls with alarming speed, seeking to dissolve metal weapons before digesting the wielder.

attacks.name: Corrosive Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (permanent until repaired).

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a wet patch of stone. It has Advantage on its first attack (Ambush).

abilities.name: Slime Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: No damage, but the target is Slowed (Speed halved) and cannot Dash until they take an Action to scrape the goo off.

abilities.name: Sudden Surge
abilities.effect: The Ooze flows like water. It moves up to 80 feet (Double Speed). It can move through enemy spaces without provoking counter-attacks. Any enemy it moves through takes 1d6 Acid Damage.

name: The Great Quill-Beast
description: A hulking, badger-like creature covered in spear-length spines. It shakes its body violently, launching volleys of barbs that can pin a knight to a tree.

attacks.name: Spine Volley
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. Can target Any/All visible players within a 10ft Radius area.

abilities.name: Spined Defense
abilities.effect: If a player hits this beast with a melee attack, they take 1d4 Physical Damage as they strike the quills.

abilities.name: Pin Down
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack against one target. The target takes no damage but is Pinned. If the target moves on their next turn, they automatically take 2d8+4 Damage as they rip the quills free.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.effect: The beast spins, firing quills in every direction. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 20). Fail: They take 3d6 Damage and are Bleeding (1d4/turn).

loot: Bundle of Giant Quills (50g), Heavy Pelt (40g).

name: The Grimlock
description: Degenerate, eyeless humanoids with grey skin that looks like stone. They were once human, but centuries in the deep and the influence of mind-flayers have stripped them of sight and humanity.

attacks.name: Bone Club
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Blindsight
abilities.effect: The Grimlock is immune to Invisibility and darkness penalties. It navigates by smell and echolocation.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.effect: While motionless near stone, it is invisible. Advantage on Ambush attacks.

abilities.name: Pile On
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Grimlocks attack the same target, the target is Prone and Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Feral Rage
abilities.effect: Trigger: When an ally dies. The Grimlock shrieks. All Grimlocks within 30 feet make an immediate Melee Attack as a Free Action.

name: The Guild Assassin
description: A shadow in a midnight-blue cloak. They hold a curved blade in each hand. They move like water and strike like a viper.

attacks.name: Twin Shortswords
attacks.effect: The Assassin attacks with blinding speed. They make Two Attacks per round (targeting one or two players). Each hit deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. While wielding these, the Assassin has +1 Defense DC (Total 20) vs. Melee.

abilities.name: Evasive Footwork
abilities.effect: This enemy does not provoke Counter-Attacks when moving out of a player's reach.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage (1d6+2), and the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or be Blinded (poison mist/sand) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Desperate Fury
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The Assassin does not die immediately. They remain at 1 HP, take an immediate Standard Action (likely a Dirty Fighting attack to blind their killer), and then die.

loot: 40 gold pieces, a vial of Spider Venom (worth 50g), and a letter of contract with a PC's name on it.

name: The Gynosphinx
description: A majestic creature with the body of a lion, the wings of a falcon, and the face of a human scholar. She guards ancient knowledge and enjoys testing mortals with riddles... or destroying them with magic if they bore her.

attacks.name: Lion's Paw
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage and gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses (Truesight)
abilities.effect: The Sphinx sees through Invisibility and Illusions automatically. She cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Sonic Screech (Roar)
abilities.effect: The Sphinx roars a magical challenge. 30ft Cone. All creatures take 3d6 Thunder Damage and are Deafened. Spellcasters in the area lose any spell they are concentrating on.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: The Sphinx makes Two Attacks with her claws.

abilities.name: Time Shift (Riddle)
abilities.effect: The Sphinx rewinds time slightly. She forces a player to Re-roll a successful Attack or Save. They must use the new result.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Time-Gale)
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. Creatures take 3d6 Force Damage (Reflex Save for half). Those who fail are Slowed (Speed halved, no Reactions) for 1 minute as they age rapidly.

loot: Sphinx Feather (100g), Vial of Time-Lost Sand (100g).

name: The Harpy Matriarch
description: A hideous fusion of vulture and woman, with rusted iron talons and a bow made of bone. Her voice is a weapon, capable of shattering glass and resolve alike. She circles high above, picking off the weak.

attacks.name: Screaming Arrow
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d6+3 Thunder Damage. On a hit, the target is Deafened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Flyer
abilities.effect: The Harpy stays airborne. Melee attackers cannot reach her without flight or magic.

abilities.name: Luring Song (Charm)
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Target must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: Target is Charmed and must use their movement to walk toward the Harpy (often into a pit or hazard).

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.effect: The Harpy drops from the sky onto a target. Effect: The target takes 2d6+3 Weapon Damage + 2d6 Falling Damage and is knocked Prone (Reflex Save DC 19 for half damage/no prone).

name: The Hellfire Bombardier
description: A floating devil wreathed in green flames, chanting dark rituals. It does not carry a weapon; it simply points, and the ground explodes.

attacks.name: Hellfire Orb
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Fire/Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Holy Water.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Bombardier has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Elemental Blast (Brimstone)
abilities.effect: Range 60ft. Target a 10ft Radius area. All players in the area must roll Defense vs. DC 20. Fail: They take 3d6 Fire Damage and are Poisoned (choking fumes) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Nova (Hellfire Eruption)
abilities.effect: The Bombardier overcharges. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d6 Fire/Necrotic Damage (Reflex Save for half). Effect: Any creature reduced to 0 HP by this damage turns to ash.

name: The High Fey Duelist
description: A lord or lady of the Feywild, dressed in impossible finery woven from moonbeams. They wield a thin blade of shadow and view combat as a performance art.

attacks.name: Shadow Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Necrotic/Psychic Damage. While wielding this, the Duelist has +1 Defense DC (Total 20) vs. Melee attacks.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron.

abilities.name: Glamour
abilities.effect: The Duelist appears shifting and beautiful. Players have Disadvantage on Attack Checks against them unless they succeed on a Will Save (DC 19) at the start of the encounter.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.effect: Ranged Action (30ft). The Duelist blows a kiss. Effect: Target must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Charmed (Friendly/non-hostile) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.effect: The Duelist laughs and snaps their fingers. Target player must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They are turned into a harmless critter (frog, rat, sheep) for 1 round. While transformed, they are Stunned and have 1 HP and 0 Armor Score.

name: The High Priest
description: Draped in heavy vestments of gold and velvet, wielding a heavy mace that they rarely use. They act as the spiritual anchor for their soldiers, commanding them with a voice that demands obedience.

attacks.name: Ceremonial Mace
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or be Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Commander
abilities.effect: All allies within 30 feet gain +1 to their Save DC (making it harder for players to resist their abilities).

abilities.name: Command
abilities.effect: The Priest shouts an order to a subordinate. One ally within 30 feet makes a single attack as a Free Action. (The player rolls Defense against that ally's Attack DC).

abilities.name: Hold Person
abilities.effect: The Priest targets a player. The player must make a Will Save (DC 19). On Fail: The player is Paralyzed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Priest marks a player with a halo of divine judgment. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

loot: 100 gold pieces, a golden holy symbol (worth 150g), and a ring of protection (+1 Defense DC).

name: The Highwayman Sniper
description: A bandit in a green cloak perched in a tree or atop a ruined wall. They hold a longbow with a steady hand, picking off anyone who tries to rush their brute allies.

attacks.name: Yew Longbow
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. Effect: If the Highwayman hasn't moved this turn, their Attack DC increases to 19 (making it very hard to Dodge).

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If this enemy does not Move on their turn, their Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Volley Fire
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. Target a 10ft Radius area. All players in the area must roll Defense vs. DC 17. On a fail, they take weapon damage.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.effect: The Highwayman drops a ceramic pot. All players within 20 ft must make a Reflex Save (DC 17) or be Stunned for 1 round.

loot: 2d10 silver pieces, a quiver of arrows, and a hooded cloak.

name: The Hill Giant Hurler
description: A squat, pot-bellied giant sitting atop a ridge or pile of rubble. It has a collection of 'throwing stones' (boulders the size of beer barrels) stacked neatly beside it. It giggles as it rains destruction.

attacks.name: Boulder
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60/120ft). Deals 1d8+2 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the target takes damage. All adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save (DC 17) or take Half Damage from shrapnel.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Hurler ignores difficult terrain caused by rubble/rocks. It cannot be knocked Prone by creatures smaller than it.

abilities.name: Bite/Eat
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: 1d8+2 Damage. Effect: The Hurler regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Landslide)
abilities.effect: The Hurler dislodges a massive pile of rocks. Debris falls on a 15 ft radius. Effect: Creatures inside take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save DC 12 for half) and the area becomes Difficult Terrain.

loot: A sack containing a confused goblin (alive) and a stolen church bell (Bronze, 10g).

name: The Hill Giant Lout
description: To a novice adventurer, this 10-foot tall giant is a boss. To a Level 7 hero, it is merely an obstacle. Fat, lazy, and carrying a tree trunk, it acts as a meat-shield for smarter Fire or Frost Giants.

attacks.name: Tree Trunk
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Reach
abilities.effect: The Lout has 10ft Reach. It can attack players who cannot reach it with standard weapons.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris (Boulder)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 4 Damage and knocks the target Prone unless they pass a Reflex Save (DC 16).

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Fall)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Giant topples over like a felled tree. All creatures in a 10ft line must make a Reflex Save (DC 15). Fail: They take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and are Pinned (Restrained) under the corpse.

loot: A sack containing a whole wheel of cheese and a rusted shield (Scrap).

name: The Hill Giant Runt
description: Standing 10 feet tall with a potbelly and a smell like a slaughterhouse. It drags a tree trunk studded with rocks. It isn't fighting for honor; it's fighting because it's hungry.

attacks.name: Tree Trunk Club
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Bludgeoning Damage. Reach 10ft. On a Critical Hit (Player rolls Nat 1 Defense), the player is knocked Prone and pushed 5 feet into the ground.

abilities.name: Thick Skull
abilities.effect: The Giant is too stupid to trick. It has Advantage on Saves against Psychic damage and the Stunned condition.

abilities.name: Smash
abilities.effect: The Giant brings the club down in a vertical arc. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is automatically knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). It throws a rock or a cart. Deals 1d10+3 Damage.

abilities.name: Grab & Squeeze
abilities.effect: The Giant scoops up a target within reach (No Check). Effect: The target is Grappled (Speed 0) and takes 4 Bludgeoning Damage (STR Mod) as their ribs creak.

loot: A sack containing three dead chickens, a wheel of cheese, and 500 copper pieces.

name: The Hive Mother
description: A colossal, flesh-ship of a monster. It does not just have eye-stalks; it has mouths that spawn lesser watchers. It is the queen of a subterranean empire, a psionic singularity that bends the minds of entire armies.

attacks.name: Telekinetic Grip
attacks.effect: Ranged (60ft). Effect: Target must make a Strength Save (DC 20). Fail: Restrained in the air and takes 4d8+6 Force Damage.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Cone
abilities.effect: 60ft Cone. Suppresses all magic.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.effect: (1/Combat). If the Mother fails a Save, she can choose to Succeed.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Mother spins. All creatures within 30 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 20). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm
abilities.effect: The Mother fires 4 Random Rays at random targets.

abilities.name: Summon Kin (Spawn)
abilities.effect: The Mother retches. 1d4 Minions (Watcher-Spawn) appear in unoccupied spaces adjacent to her. They act immediately at the end of the round.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: The Eye of the Tyrant (Artifact), 3,000 Gold.

name: The Hive Overseer
description: A fleshy, tree-like creature composed of stacked spheres and eyes, rooted to the ceiling or hovering over a slave pit. It acts as a psionic hub, coordinating the movements of lesser minions with ruthless efficiency.

attacks.name: Telekinetic Grip
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Effect: Target must make a Strength Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Restrained (held in the air) and moved up to 20 feet in any direction (often over a pit).

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Cone
abilities.effect: The Overseer's central eye emits a 30 ft cone of suppression. Inside this cone, no magic functions. It aims this cone at the start of its turn to neutralize the party's biggest threat.

abilities.name: Ray Volley
abilities.effect: The Overseer fires 2 Random Rays (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm
abilities.effect: The Overseer unleashes a barrage. It fires 4 Random Rays at random targets within 60 feet. (Roll d8 for each ray). It cannot target the same creature twice.

name: The Hive Queen
description: A throbbing, immobile mass of insectoid carapace and egg sacs, guarded by soldiers. She does not fight; she commands the swarm with chemical signals.

attacks.name: Ovipositor Sting
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. Ignores 1 point of Armor Score.

abilities.name: Hive Mind
abilities.effect: The Queen has +1 Attack DC if an ally (a Drone) is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Venomous Spit
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: The target takes 1d6 Acid Damage immediately. The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or gain the Poisoned condition (1d6 damage/turn) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild (Birth)
abilities.effect: The Queen pulses. 1d4 Minions (Soldier Ants/Bees) emerge from the surrounding tunnels (or her own egg sacs) at the end of the round.

name: The Hook Horror
description: A hulking biped with the head of a vulture and an exoskeleton of rock-hard chitin. Its arms end in massive, serrated hooks. It communicates by clacking its exoskeleton in the dark tunnels it guards.

attacks.name: Serrated Hook
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Slashing Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (ripped plate).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Horror uses echolocation. It cannot be Surprised and detects Hidden enemies automatically within 60ft.

abilities.name: Bear Hug (Impale)
abilities.effect: Target must be Grappled (or the Horror initiates a Grapple check). The Horror pulls the target onto its hooks. Deals automatic 1d8+3 Damage at the start of the Horror's turn.

abilities.name: Terrifying Screech
abilities.effect: The Horror clacks and screams. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 13). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round.

name: The Hooked Ravager
description: A hulking biped with a vultures beak and massive, bone-carved hooks for hands. Its carapace is thick and covered in weeping sores that spray acid when cut.

attacks.name: Bone Hooks
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (plate ripped open).

abilities.name: Caustic Blood
abilities.effect: Whenever a creature hits the Ravager with a Melee Attack, that creature takes 1d4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Hook Snatch (Lash)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). On Hit: Normal Damage, and the target is Grappled (Speed 0) and pulled adjacent to the Ravager.

abilities.name: Mind Blast
abilities.effect: The Ravager clicks its beak, emitting a sonic/psychic pulse. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: 3d6 Psychic Damage and Stunned for 1 round.

name: The Hooked Stalker
description: A lanky, bipedal horror with no eyes, only a mouth full of needle teeth and arms that end in massive, serrated bone hooks. It clatters along walls, hunting by sound.

attacks.name: Bone Hooks
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage plus Bleeding (1d4/turn) from jagged wounds.

abilities.name: Caustic Blood
abilities.effect: Whenever a creature hits the Stalker with a Melee Attack, that creature takes 1d4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Tentacle Lash (Reach)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). On Hit: Normal Damage, and the target is Grappled (Speed 0). This allows the Stalker to grapple from a safe distance.

abilities.name: Fission
abilities.effect: Trigger: When the Stalker takes Slashing or Lightning damage. The Stalker splits. It loses half its current HP, and a duplicate Stalker appears in an adjacent space with the same amount of HP.

name: The Hungry Ghoul
description: Pale, hairless, and scampering on all fours. They are driven by a contagious hunger, swarming over the wounded to drag them down.

attacks.name: Filthy Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: Living creatures adjacent to 2 or more Ghouls are Weakened (Damage halved) due to the overwhelming rot.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Pile-On
abilities.effect: If a player is hit by a Ghoul while already Grappled or Prone, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 14) or be Paralyzed (Stunned) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Horde Instinct
abilities.effect: All Ghouls within 30 feet immediately move their full speed toward the nearest player who is Bleeding or below 50% HP.

name: The Imp Trickster
description: A tiny, red-skinned winged creature that is rarely seen until it giggles. It delights in chaos, setting fires and turning the party's warrior into a toad.

attacks.name: Hellfire Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Fire Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or gain the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Silver/Holy Water.

abilities.name: Invisibility (Glamour)
abilities.effect: The Imp is naturally invisible. Players have Disadvantage on Attack Checks against it. This breaks if the Imp attacks, but re-applies at the start of its next turn.

abilities.name: Trickery (Charm)
abilities.effect: Ranged (30ft). The Imp whispers a magical suggestion. Target must make a Will Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Charmed (Friendly) and will defend the Imp for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.effect: The Imp snaps its fingers. Target player must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: They are turned into a harmless critter (rat, frog, chicken) for 1 round. While transformed, they are Stunned and have 1 HP and 0 Armor Score.

name: The Imperial Battle-Mage
description: A uniformed caster trained in the war colleges. They hold a staff of blackened oak and survey the battlefield with cold, analytical precision. They don't panic; they execute protocols.

attacks.name: Iron-Shod Staff
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+3 Physical Damage. Alternatively, can fire an Arcane Bolt (Ranged, 1d10 Force Damage, Ignores Armor).

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.effect: If this enemy takes damage, they do not lose any held spells or concentration effects unless the damage exceeds 10 points in a single hit.

abilities.name: Scorching Ray
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell Attack. On Hit: The target takes 2d6 Fire Damage and gains the Burning condition (1d6 damage/turn) until extinguished.

abilities.name: Mass Dispel
abilities.effect: The Battle-Mage crushes a runestone. All active player buffs and ongoing spell effects within 60 feet are instantly ended.

loot: 25 gold pieces, a scroll case containing tactical maps, and a Potion of Mana (Regain 1d4 MP).

name: The Infernal Strategist
description: A tall, horned devil in immaculate robes, holding a rod of iron. It does not dirty its hands with melee; it hovers above the fray, issuing commands that warp the minds of its enemies and strengthen its allies.

attacks.name: Rod of Command
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Psychic Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Will Save (DC 19) or be Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Silver/Holy Water.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Strategist has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Possession (Dominate)
abilities.effect: The Strategist locks eyes with a warrior. The target must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Dominated for 1 round. The Strategist immediately forces them to use their Reaction to make a melee attack against their nearest ally.

abilities.name: Summon Kin (The Legion)
abilities.effect: The Strategist opens a portal. 1d4 Minions (Legion Devils or Hellhounds) appear at the end of the round to serve their master.

name: The Invisible Stalker
description: An entity of pure, condensed air. It is naturally invisible, identifiable only by the shimmering of light or the disturbance of dust. It is a relentless hunter that never gives up a quarry.

attacks.name: Wind Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (armor buffeted/loosened).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Stalker has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.effect: The Stalker is naturally Invisible. It has Advantage on all Attack Checks, and players have Disadvantage to attack it. Counter: See Invisibility, Flour, or AoE attacks negate this benefit.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Suffocate)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Ignores Armor Score). On Hit: 1d8+3 Damage and the target is Silenced (cannot breathe/speak) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Nova (Vacuum)
abilities.effect: The Stalker collapses. All creatures within 20 feet are pulled 10 feet toward the Stalker and take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Iron Gorgon
description: A massive bull covered in overlapping iron plates that seem to grow naturally from its skin. Its nostrils fume with green vapor. It stands immovable, blocking the path to the inner sanctum.

attacks.name: Iron Hooves
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Spiked Hide (Metal)
abilities.effect: Any creature hitting the Gorgon with a melee attack feels the jar of hitting solid iron.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze (Breath)
abilities.effect: The Gorgon exhales a puff of green gas at an adjacent target. Target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15). On a failure, they are Restrained (turning to stone) for 1 minute. They must repeat the save at the end of their turn to avoid permanent Petrification.

abilities.name: Stone Glare (Nova)
abilities.effect: The Gorgon unleashes a massive cloud. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15) or be instantly Stunned (Petrified) until cured.

name: The Iron-Oak Archer
description: A twisted treant that has grown around a ballista, or perhaps evolved to mimic one. Its branches are tension springs; its ammunition is spears made of ironwood. It strikes with the force of a siege engine.

attacks.name: Wood-Stake
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Piercing Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (shield shattered/plate pierced).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Photosynthesis
abilities.effect: If in bright sunlight, the Archer has +1 Attack DC (Total 21) and +1 Defense DC (Total 15).

abilities.name: Needle Volley (Splinter Shot)
abilities.effect: The Archer fires a bundle of jagged wood that explodes. It makes attack rolls against up to Three targets within a 15ft area.

abilities.name: Wall of Thorns
abilities.effect: The Archer fires a special seed into the ground. A wall of brambles springs up (20ft long, 5ft thick). Effect: Blocks line of sight and movement. Any creature passing through takes 2d6 Piercing Damage.

name: The Iron-Root Treant
description: A tree that has stood since the age of myths. Its bark is grey ironwood, harder than steel. It hates civilization. It moves with a slow, earth-shaking gait, swinging limbs like siege weapons.

attacks.name: Great-Bough Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

attacks.name: Rock Throw
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 2d6+5 Damage. Adjacent creatures take half damage.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Siege Monster
abilities.effect: The Treant deals Double Damage to objects and structures.

abilities.name: Animate Trees (Seed Bomb)
abilities.effect: The Treant roars. 1d4 Minions (Needle Blights or smaller trees) animate from the surrounding terrain to fight for it.

abilities.name: Entangle (Roots)
abilities.effect: The Treant slams its foot. Roots erupt in a 30 ft radius. Effect: All creatures on the ground must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be Restrained. The area becomes Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Wall of Thorns
abilities.effect: A massive hedge of briars (30ft long) springs up, blocking movement and line of sight.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: Heart-Wood Gem (500g), Ironwood Branch (Can be crafted into a Masterwork Shield).

name: The Ironwood Sentinel
description: A towering figure carved from the hardest wood in the forest. It resembles a tree shorn of branches, shaped into a warrior. Blades bounce off its bark as if it were steel. It guards sacred groves and druidic ruins.

attacks.name: Great-Bough Club
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 15) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Deep Roots
abilities.effect: The Sentinel cannot be knocked Prone or moved against its will while standing on natural ground.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: 1d10+4 Damage. Effect: Simple, crushing force. If the target is Prone, this attack deals +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Wall of Thorns
abilities.effect: The Sentinel slams the ground. A wall of brambles springs up (20ft long, 5ft thick). Effect: Blocks line of sight and movement. Any creature passing through takes 2d6 Piercing Damage.

name: The Kobold Dragon-Shield
description: A small, reptilian humanoid carrying a shield made from a single, large dragon scale. It fights with fanatical discipline, barking orders in Draconic and forming a wall to protect the nest.

attacks.name: Jagged Spear
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Kobold has exceptionally tough scales for its size. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (included in stats).

abilities.name: Bite & Claw
abilities.effect: The Kobold makes Two Attacks against one target. Roll twice vs Defense DC. Each hit deals 1d4+1 Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Aura (Nova)
abilities.effect: The Kobold smashes a fire-pot or vents heat. All creatures within 15 feet take 2d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Kobold Hatchling
description: Barely three feet tall, yapping in high-pitched Draconic. They wield sharpened femurs or stolen daggers. They are cowardly alone but fearless when the 'Master' is watching.

attacks.name: Shiv
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Kobold has +1 Attack DC (Total 14) if an ally is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Mob (Dogpile)
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Kobolds attack the same target, that target is Grappled (Speed 0) unless they succeed on a Strength Save (DC 13).

abilities.name: Nova (Fire Pot)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed or ordered. The Kobold smashes a clay pot of oil and embers. All creatures within 5 feet take 2 Fire Damage (No Save).

name: The Legion Devil
description: A humanoid devil with skin like red clay, horns, and a rigid, military posture. It wields a barbed spear and marches in perfect synchronization with its kin. They do not fear death, for they will simply reform in Hell.

attacks.name: Barbed Spear
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical/Fire Damage. Can attack targets up to 10ft away.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance (Half Damage) to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable (Double Damage) to Holy Water and Silver.

abilities.name: Infernal Formation
abilities.effect: The Devil gains +2 Defense DC while adjacent to an ally.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Hellfire)
abilities.effect: Melee Spell Attack. On Hit: The target takes 1d6 Fire Damage and is Grappled (Speed 0) by the devil's burning grip.

abilities.name: Summon Kin
abilities.effect: A tear in reality opens. 1d4 Minions (Imps) arrive at the end of the round to flank the players.

name: The Lens-Drone
description: A floating crystal shard surrounded by brass rings. It hums with anti-magic static. It does not have a personality; it is a bio-mechanical tool used to suppress spellcasters.

attacks.name: Focus Beam
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Fire Damage. Range 60ft.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Drone has +2 Armor Score against Spells.

abilities.name: Interference
abilities.effect: The Drone attaches itself to a spellcaster (Move into space). While attached, the caster has Disadvantage on Casting Checks. The caster can shove the drone away (Attack vs Defense 11) to end this.

abilities.name: Reality Shift (Swap)
