abilities.effect: Trigger: When targeted. The Drone teleports, swapping places with another Minion within 30 feet, effectively saving the more valuable unit (or itself).

name: The Lens-Sentinel
description: A geometric entity made of floating glass panes and brass fittings. It guards libraries and arcane laboratories. It is designed to counter spellcasters, reflecting their magic back at them.

attacks.name: Ray Volley
attacks.effect: The Sentinel fires 2 Random Rays (Roll d8 on Ray Table). Standard damage applies.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Sentinel, the spell bounces back. The caster must roll a Defense Check against their own Spell DC or be hit by their own spell.

abilities.name: Focused Beam (Force)
abilities.effect: Instead of a random volley, the Sentinel fires a single beam of solid force. Effect: Target rolls Strength Save (DC 16). On Fail: 1d8+3 Force Damage and knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Pulse
abilities.effect: The Sentinel chimes loudly. All active magical effects (Buffs, Summoned creatures, Walls) within 60 feet are instantly Dispelled.

name: The Lich Lord
description: A floating skeleton wreathed in green flame and tattered vestments. It does not carry a weapon; its hands crackle with the power to unmake reality. It treats the battle as a magical experiment.

attacks.name: Necrotic Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell Attack (60ft). Deals 3d6+6 Force/Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Lich has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Touch
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage (Cold). Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20) or be Stunned (Paralyzed) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Curse of Ages
abilities.effect: The Lich points a withered finger at a player. Effect: The player must make a Will Save (DC 20). On a fail, they are Cursed. They cannot regain Hit Points or Luck Points until the curse is removed.

abilities.name: Corpse Explosion
abilities.effect: The Lich detonates a nearby minion or corpse. All creatures within 15 feet of the corpse take 6d6 Necrotic Damage (Reflex Save for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 gold pieces, a Staff of Power, and the Lich's Phylactery (Quest Item).

name: The Living Oil
description: A fast-moving puddle of black, iridescent fluid. It smells of tar and ancient chemicals. It is highly flammable and seeks to coat its victims before a larger monster ignites them.

attacks.name: Suffocating Pseudopod
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Combustible
abilities.effect: If the Living Oil takes Fire Damage, it explodes (see Danger Ability).

abilities.name: Slick
abilities.effect: The Oil spreads out. Its space and all adjacent spaces become Difficult Terrain (Grease). Any creature entering must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or fall Prone.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption (Ignite)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed or burned. The Oil bursts into flame. All creatures within 10 feet take 4 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half). The ground burns for 1 minute.

name: The Living Wall
description: A massive slab of rolling, brown sludge mixed with rocks, masonry, and the skulls of previous victims. It fills the entire width of a hallway, pushing forward like a slow-motion wave of destruction.

attacks.name: Dense Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Magic Absorbent
abilities.effect: The Wall is immune to Force Damage (e.g., Magic Missile). If hit by Force damage, it Heals for the amount rolled.

abilities.name: Engulf (Mass)
abilities.effect: The Wall moves into a target's space (or multiple targets if they are adjacent). Targets roll Defense DC 18. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating).

abilities.name: Violent Eruption
abilities.effect: The Wall pulses. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 15). Fail: Take 4d6 Acid/Bludgeoning Damage and be pushed 10 feet back.

loot: A skeleton embedded in the wall wearing a Ring of Protection (+1 Defense), and 500 gold pieces (pitted).

name: The Mage-Hunter
description: A sleek, four-legged hound made of cold iron and copper wiring. It tracks magical resonance. It creeps along ceilings to drop onto spellcasters, clamping their mouths shut.

attacks.name: Iron Jaws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Hunter has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Hunter has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Vent (Anti-Magic Gas)
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. Players in the area must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). On a fail, they are Silenced (cannot cast spells) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Analyze Pattern
abilities.effect: The Hunter scans a specific player (usually the Wizard). For the rest of the combat, the Hunter has Advantage on all Attack Checks against that player (triggering Sneak Attack every turn).

name: The Magma Beast
description: A lumbering mound of cooling obsidian and molten core. It leaves charred footprints and the air ripples with heat around it. It does not have a face, only a glowing fissure where a mouth should be.

attacks.name: Molten Fist
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Fire/Bludgeoning Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage and is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable (Double Damage) to Cold/Water.

abilities.name: Elemental Body
abilities.effect: Intense heat. Any creature Grappling the Beast or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Touch (Melt)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Deals 1d10+3 Fire Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score. If the target is wearing metal armor, they take an additional 1d4 Fire Damage at the start of their next turn.

abilities.name: Nova (Eruption)
abilities.effect: The Beast pulses violently. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half) as lava sprays outward.

name: The Magma Jelly
description: A sentient pool of lava from the elemental chaos. It does not just burn; it sticks. It hurls globs of molten rock that cling to flesh and metal, cooking the target alive.

attacks.name: Molten Lob
attacks.effect: Range 60ft. Deals 2d8+4 Fire Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 20). On a Pass, half damage. On a Fail, full damage and the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Heat Body
abilities.effect: Any creature touching the Jelly takes 1d6 Fire Damage. Non-magical weapons hitting it may melt (-1 Penalty).

abilities.name: Tar Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: Target is coated in cooling obsidian tar. They are Restrained (Speed 0). If they take Fire damage while Restrained, they take an extra 2d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Pyroclastic Flow
abilities.effect: The Jelly surges forward as a wave of lava. It moves up to 60 feet. Any creature it moves through takes 4d6 Fire Damage (No Save). The ground behind it becomes hazardous fire terrain.

name: The Magma Spitter
description: A squat, floating rock formation with a molten core. It drifts near the ceiling or across lava pools, heaving globs of burning slag at intruders.

attacks.name: Lava Glob
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Fire Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Pass, they take half damage. On a Fail, they take full damage and gain the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Spitter does not Move on its turn, its Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Blast (Eruption)
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). Fail: Take 2d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Wall
abilities.effect: The Spitter vomits a line of lava. It creates a 20ft long wall of Fire. Any creature passing through it takes 2d6 Fire Damage. Lasts 1 minute.

name: The Mana-Eater (Gauth)
description: A pulsating purple sphere with six eye stalks. It does not crave gold; it craves magic. It congregates near ley lines or powerful artifacts, draining the energy from spellcasters to fuel its own metabolism.

attacks.name: Focused Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Effect: Target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). Fail: Take 3d6 Necrotic Damage and be Weakened (Half Damage dealt) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 20 feet of the Mana-Eater loses 1d4 Mana Points (MP). If a creature has no MP, they take 1d6 Psychic Damage instead.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: The Mana-Eater spins wildly. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: They are hit by a Random Ray (Roll d8).

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Pulse
abilities.effect: The Mana-Eater burps a wave of disruption. All active magical effects (Buffs, Summoned creatures, Walls) within 60 feet are instantly Dispelled. The Mana-Eater heals 5 HP for every effect dispelled.

name: The Manes
description: A pathetic, bloat-bellied wretch of pale flesh and rot. They are the lowest form of demon, used as cannon fodder in the Blood War. They swarm over enemies, biting and clawing with desperate hunger.

attacks.name: Filthy Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical/Necrotic Damage.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Holy Water.

abilities.name: Mob (Drag Down)
abilities.effect: If 2 or more Manes are adjacent to a target, that target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Nova (Acid Cloud)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The demon dissolves into a puddle of steaming acidic sludge. All creatures within 5 feet take 2 Acid Damage (No Save).

name: The Manticore
description: A lion with leathery wings and a humanoid face distorted by cruelty. Its tail ends in a swollen cluster of iron-hard spikes. It circles overhead, firing volleys of spines before landing to eat the wounded.

attacks.name: Lions Claws
attacks.effect: The Manticore makes Two Attacks. Damage: 1d10+4 Slashing Damage each.

attacks.name: Tail Spikes
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+4 Piercing Damage. On a hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Flyer
abilities.effect: The Manticore stays airborne, forcing melee fighters to use ranged weapons or ready actions.

abilities.name: Spine Barrage
abilities.effect: The Manticore whips its tail. All creatures in a 15ft Cone must make a Reflex Save (DC 14). Fail: Take 2d6+4 Damage.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.effect: The Manticore drops from the sky onto a target. Effect: The target takes 2d6 Impact Damage + Claw Damage and is knocked Prone. The Manticore lands adjacent to them.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 200 gold pieces, a Pouch of Diamonds (100g), and a Bundle of Manticore Spikes (20 arrows).

name: The Memory Ooze (Oblex)
description: A towering mass of red, sulfurous jelly. Faces of its previous victims float to the surface, screaming silently. It attacks the mind as well as the body, stealing memories to fuel its psionic power.

attacks.name: Synapse Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Psychic Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or be Dazed (Numb/Shocked) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Magic Absorbent
abilities.effect: The Ooze is immune to Force Damage and Psychic Damage. It Heals for the amount rolled if hit by these types.

abilities.name: Shapechange (Impersonate)
abilities.effect: The Ooze creates a duplicate of a humanoid it has eaten, connected by a tether of slime. It can cast spells through this duplicate.

abilities.name: Devour (Mind Wipe)
abilities.effect: The Ooze targets a creature it has Grappled or Engulfed. The target takes Double Damage (Psychic). They lose 1 Spell Slot or 1 Luck Point (drained by the Ooze).

abilities.name: Acid Spray (Psychic Static)
abilities.effect: 20ft Cone. Creatures take 3d6 Psychic Damage (Will Save for half). Those who fail forget the last round of combat (Tactical confusion: GM can move them 5ft in a random direction).

name: The Mercury Slime
description: A glob of sentient liquid metal. It moves with jerky, fluid grace, forming blades and spikes from its own body. It is heavy, shiny, and conducts electricity.

attacks.name: Quicksilver Scythe
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Corrosive Body (Shred)
abilities.effect: The Slime is a whirlwind of micro-blades. Any creature touching it or hitting it with a Melee Attack takes 1d4 Slashing Damage.

abilities.name: Adhesive Strike
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. The player's weapon sticks to the Slime. The player must drop the weapon or be Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Mitosis (Fracture)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When damaged. The Mercury Slime shatters into droplets and reforms into two smaller slimes. Both have half the original's HP.

name: The Mimic (Chest)
description: The classic predator. It looks exactly like a wooden chest, a door, or a weapon rack. It relies entirely on the element of surprise, lashing out with a pseudopod tongue to adhere to prey before biting them in half.

attacks.name: Toothy Maw
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Piercing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.effect: If the Mimic attacks a Surprised target, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from an object. It has Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Adhesive Strike
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. The target is Grappled (Speed 0) as they stick to the Mimic. The Mimic has Advantage on attacks against Grappled targets.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Mimic chews on a Grappled target. Effect: Deals Double Damage (Automatic, no roll). The Mimic heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

loot: Mimic Adhesive (25g), Mimic Tongue (10g), Wood Scraps.

name: The Mimic King
description: A massive, shambling humanoid shape composed entirely of sticky coins, shields, chests, and swords. It IS the treasure room. It forms mouths from piles of gold and limbs from tapestries.

attacks.name: Treasure Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) as they stick to the Mimic's body.

attacks.name: Coin Spray
attacks.effect: Range 30ft. The Mimic fires a blast of gold coins like buckshot. Deals 2d6+5 Damage.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a large pile of loot.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Mimic King constricts a Grappled target. Deals Automatic Double Damage (2d6+5 x2). The Mimic heals HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Sudden Surge (Collapse)
abilities.effect: The Mimic loses its form, becoming a wave of gold and glue. It moves up to 60 feet without provoking counter-attacks. Any creature it moves through must make a Reflex Save (DC 17) or be knocked Prone and Grappled.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 Gold Pieces (sticky), a Suit of Plate Armor, and a Mimic Tongue (Rare Reagent).

name: The Mimic Knight
description: What looks like a suit of full plate armor standing guard in an alcove is actually a predator. The 'metal' is grey flesh, and the 'sword' is a jagged extension of its own bone. It fights with silent, sticky determination.

attacks.name: Shaped Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a suit of armor. It has Advantage on its first attack (Ambush).

abilities.name: Adhesive Strike
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: 1d8+3 Damage. The target is Grappled (Speed 0) as the 'sword' sticks to their armor or flesh. The Mimic has Advantage on attacks against Grappled targets.

abilities.name: Liquid Form
abilities.effect: Trigger: When Stunned or Restrained. The Mimic collapses into a puddle of grey goo and reforms instantly 5 feet away, ending all negative conditions.

name: The Mimic Spawn
description: A tiny shapechanger that has not yet grown large enough to be a chest or door. Instead, it mimics a gold coin, a dagger, or a tankard. It waits to be picked up before biting the hand.

attacks.name: Razor Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, indistinguishable from a small object. Advantage on its first attack (Ambush).

abilities.name: Adhesive
abilities.effect: If a player hits the Mimic with a melee weapon, the weapon sticks to the Mimic. The player must use an Action to pull it free (Strength DC 10).

abilities.name: Sudden Surge (Swarm)
abilities.effect: All Mimic Spawn within 30 feet immediately move their full speed toward the nearest player.

name: The Mind-Killer
description: A humanoid shape composed of writhing purple muscle and exposed nerves, wearing a mask of smooth porcelain. It feeds on panic. It does not speak; it projects a constant, low-frequency hum that causes nosebleeds.

attacks.name: Psychic Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Psychic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Mind-Killer has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Aura of Madness
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 feet must make a Will Save (DC 17). On a failure, they are Dazed for 1 round. Dazed targets cannot take Reactions, allowing the Mind-Killer to move away safely.

abilities.name: Gaze of Entropy
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 17). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage dealt is halved) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Mind Blast
abilities.effect: The Mind-Killer projects a cone of force. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 17). Fail: 3d6 Psychic Damage and Stunned for 1 round.

name: The Mind-Witness
description: A psychic predator corrupted by aberrant influence. Its skin is wet and purple, and its eye-stalks end in crab-like claws. It communicates via telepathic screaming. It targets the minds of its prey, staying just out of reach.

attacks.name: Neural Jolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d6+3 Psychic Damage. On a hit, the target must make a Will Save (DC 17) or be Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Witness, the spell is reflected back at the caster. The caster must roll Defense against their own Spell DC.

abilities.name: Telekinetic Grip (Fling)
abilities.effect: The Witness grabs a creature mentally. Target must make a Strength Save (DC 17). Fail: They are thrown 20 feet through the air, taking 2d6 Damage and landing Prone.

abilities.name: Paranoid Snap
abilities.effect: Trigger: When damaged. The Witness immediately fires one Random Ray (Roll d8) at the attacker as a Free Action.

name: The Mirror Queen
description: A tall, imperious fey noble whose skin is made of cracked porcelain and whose eyes are shards of mirror. She moves with a jagged, stop-motion grace, surrounded by illusory duplicates. To look at her is to doubt your own senses.

attacks.name: Glass Rapier
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Psychic/Piercing Damage. On a hit, the Queen instantly teleports 10 feet to an unoccupied space.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron.

abilities.name: Glamour
abilities.effect: The Queen appears shifting and indistinct. Players have Disadvantage on Attack Checks against her unless they succeed on a Will Save (DC 18) at the start of the encounter.

abilities.name: Charm Person
abilities.effect: Ranged Action (30ft). The Queen whispers to a player. Effect: Target must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Charmed (cannot attack her) and must use their movement to block attacks meant for her.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.effect: The Queen snaps a mirror. Target player must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They are turned into a porcelain doll (Construct type) for 1 round. While transformed, they are Stunned, have 1 HP, and 0 Armor Score.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: Mirror Shard Dagger (Magic Weapon), Fairy Dust (100g worth).

name: The Mist-Wing
description: A pale, serpentine dragon with translucent wings. It dwells in high mountain peaks or fog-shrouded moors. It generates its own mist, striking from the cloud and vanishing before retaliation.

attacks.name: Frost Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Cold Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Cold)
abilities.effect: Immune to Cold. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Mist-Wing has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: Armor Score increased by +1 (Total AS 2).

abilities.name: Wingover (Vanish)
abilities.effect: The Mist-Wing beats its wings, creating a burst of fog. All adjacent creatures are pushed 10 feet away. It then moves up to 20 feet and becomes Hidden (Stealth Check vs Passive Perception).

abilities.name: Flyby Snatch
abilities.effect: The Mist-Wing moves up to its Fly Speed. It does not provoke counter-attacks. Effect: It makes a Grapple attack against one target. If successful, it carries them into the air and drops them (2d6 Falling Damage + Prone).

name: The Mongrel-Thrall
description: A pathetic but dangerous humanoid stitched together from the parts of goblins, wolves, and lizards. It serves its master with fanatical devotion, wielding a club made of petrified bone.

attacks.name: Bone Club
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage and gains the Bleeding condition (splintering bone).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed. Cannot be distracted by food/survival checks.

abilities.name: Spiked Hide
abilities.effect: The Thrall is covered in bone spurs. Any creature Grappling it or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: The Thrall attacks wildly with club and claw. It makes Two Attacks against one target. If both hit, deal an extra +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Feral Rage
abilities.effect: The Thrall howls. For 1 minute, it has Advantage on all Attack Checks (and attacks against it have Advantage).

name: The Moss-Back Troll
description: A lean troll covered in symbiotic moss and swamp muck. It lies submerged in bog water, breathing through a reed, waiting for prey to step on its chest.

attacks.name: Drowning Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Slashing Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Troll regains 10 HP at the start of its turn. Weakness: Stops if it took Fire or Acid damage.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack (Ambush)
abilities.effect: If the Troll attacks a target that hasn't acted yet or is Surprised, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Fling Victim (Mud Toss)
abilities.effect: The Troll grabs a creature. Effect: Throws them 30 feet into deep mud. Target takes 2d6 Damage and is Restrained (stuck in mud, Strength DC 13 to escape).

abilities.name: Structure Collapse (Bog Sink)
abilities.effect: The Troll slams the mud. A 15 ft radius area turns into quicksand. Effect: Creatures inside must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or sink. They are Restrained and begin drowning (suffocating) if not pulled out.

name: The Mummy Lord
description: A desiccated corpse wrapped in linen strips inscribed with curses. It moves with a stiff, jerky authority, commanding the dust and rot of its tomb.

attacks.name: Funerary Wrappings
attacks.effect: Reach (10ft). Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) and dragged adjacent to the Mummy Lord.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Mummy Lord has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Rotting Slam
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). On a fail, they contract Mummy Rot (Disease: Cannot regain HP from non-magical sources and Max HP reduces by 1 every hour until cured).

abilities.name: Curse of Ages
abilities.effect: The Mummy Lord points at a target. The target is Cursed. Effect: The target cannot regain Hit Points or Luck Points until the curse is removed.

loot: Ancient Linen (10g), Canopic Jar (50g), Emerald Eyes (100g).

name: The Myconid Phantom
description: A ghostly, pale mushroom-man that drifts silently through the Underdark. It glows with bio-luminescence. It doesn't fight with force; it fights with hallucinations and spores, dancing around befuddled foes.

attacks.name: Hallucinogenic Spore
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 2d6+4 Poison Damage. On a hit, the target gains the Poisoned condition.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores (Aura)
abilities.effect: Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the Phantom must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Poisoned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Pollen
abilities.effect: The Phantom releases a cloud of glittering dust. Target must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: Target is Dazed (hallucinating enemies that aren't there) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Pollen Nova (Slumber)
abilities.effect: The Phantom spins, releasing a massive cloud. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). Fail: They fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until damaged.

name: The Myconid Sovereign
description: A towering fungus-lord, glowing with bioluminescent purple veins. It sits upon a throne of compost. It communicates via telepathic spores, coordinating the hive mind of the colony.

attacks.name: Rot-Blast
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the Sovereign Heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Photosynthetic Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Sovereign regains 10 HP at the start of its turn if it is in dim light or darkness (Underdark adapted). Fire stops this.

abilities.name: Mind-Rot Spores
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the cone must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 2d8 Damage and become Confused (Attack nearest creature) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Pollen Nova (Pacification)
abilities.effect: The Sovereign releases a massive cloud. All creatures within 30 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19). Fail: They fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until damaged.

name: The Needle Blight
description: A hunched, humanoid shape composed of dead pine needles and dry brambles. It moves with a dry shuffling sound. It stands perfectly still in the tree line, waiting for intruders to pass before unleashing a hail of thorns.

attacks.name: Thorn Claws
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft) or Melee. Deals 1d8+2 Piercing Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Thorny Skin
abilities.effect: Any creature Grappling the Blight or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Needle Volley
abilities.effect: The Blight fires a burst of thorns. It makes attack rolls against up to Two targets that are within 5ft of each other.

abilities.name: Seed Bomb (Infest)
abilities.effect: The Blight shakes violently and releases a cloud of seeds. 1d4 Minions (Twig Blights) claw their way out of the ground at the end of the round.

name: The Needle-Fang Drake
description: A wingless, arboreal dragon the size of a jaguar. Its scales shift color to match the forest canopy. It hangs by its tail, waiting for prey to pass underneath before dropping silently.

attacks.name: Needle Fangs
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Poison/Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Poison)
abilities.effect: Immune to Poison. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Drake has Advantage on the attack (e.g., attacking from Hiding), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Drake's scales are deceptively tough. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (Total AS 2).

abilities.name: Snatched (Drag)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled and pulled 15 feet up a tree or into a bush (The Drake moves with them).

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Gas)
abilities.effect: The Drake exhales a cloud of toxic gas. 15ft Cone. Effect: All creatures in the area take 2d6 Poison Damage (Fortitude Save DC 14 for half).

name: The Needle-Runner
description: A ball of dry, rolling brambles that uncurls into a vaguely canine shape. It sprints across the battlefield, flinging spines as it passes. It is dry, brittle, and extremely fast.

attacks.name: Spine Shot
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Piercing Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of Armor Score.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Thorny Skin
abilities.effect: Any creature Grappling the Runner or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Needle Volley
abilities.effect: The Runner fires a burst of thorns while moving. It makes attack rolls against up to Two targets that are within 5ft of each other.

abilities.name: Seed Bomb (Explosive Growth)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Runner dies violently. It explodes into a patch of Briars. The space it occupied and all adjacent spaces become Difficult Terrain that deals 1d4 Damage for every 5ft moved through it.

name: The Obsidian Wyvern
description: A terrifying predator with scales like black glass and a tail ending in a massive, burning stinger. It stalks from the air, diving silently to impale its prey before banking away.

attacks.name: Magma Stinger
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Fire/Piercing Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Frightful Presence
abilities.effect: Any enemy starting its turn within 30 feet of the Wyvern must make a Will Save (DC 19). On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Bite & Claw
abilities.effect: The Wyvern makes Two Attacks against one target (Bite and Claws). Roll twice vs Defense DC. Each hit deals 1d8+2 Damage.

abilities.name: Flyby Snatch
abilities.effect: The Wyvern moves up to its Fly Speed (40ft). It does not provoke counter-attacks. During the move, it makes a Grapple attack against one target. If successful, it carries the target for the rest of the movement.

name: The Ochre Jelly
description: A heap of mustard-yellow slime that quivers with hunger. It slides under doors and drops from ceilings, seeking to dissolve organic matter. It splits when slashed, making it a nightmare for blade-wielding warriors.

attacks.name: Pseudopod Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (melting leather/straps).

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Sticky Climber
abilities.effect: The Jelly has Spider Climb. It has Advantage on checks to hold onto a Grappled target or resist being moved.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: The Jelly moves into a target's space. Target rolls Defense DC 16. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded). They take 1d10+3 Acid Damage at the start of the Jelly's turns.

abilities.name: Mitosis (Split)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When slashed or struck by lightning. The Jelly splits in two. A new Jelly appears adjacent. Both share the remaining HP of the original.

loot: Undigested bones, a glass vial of Alchemical Fire (inside the jelly).

name: The Ocular Hive
description: A repulsive floating sphere resembling a fleshy honeycomb. Hundreds of independent eyeballs squirm within the cells. It launches these living eyes as seeking projectiles that latch onto prey and detonate on command.

attacks.name: Eye-Missile
attacks.effect: Range 60ft. Deals 2d6+3 Acid Damage. On a hit, adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save or be Blinded by viscous fluid.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Hive, it bounces back. The caster must roll Defense vs their own Spell DC or be hit.

abilities.name: Latch-On
abilities.effect: Ranged (60ft). The Hive fires a living eye at a target. Hit: 1d6 Damage. The eye attaches to the victim. While attached, the victim cannot Hide or turn Invisible, and all attacks against them have Advantage. Spend an Action to remove.

abilities.name: Cluster Detonation
abilities.effect: The Hive commands all attached or fired eyes to explode. All creatures within 10 feet of the Hive or a Latch-On victim take 3d6 Force Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Ocular Mote
description: A baseball-sized eyeball with bat-like wings or tiny levitation runes. They swarm through corridors, acting as spies. They act as a screen, blocking line of sight to the more dangerous Beholders behind them.

attacks.name: Minor Zap
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Force Damage. Range 30ft.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Hover
abilities.effect: Ignores ground-based difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Designate Target
abilities.effect: Instead of attacking, the Mote marks a player with a laser dot. The next attack against that player has Advantage.

abilities.name: Nova (Flash)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Mote bursts in a flash of light. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 11) or be Blinded for 1 round.

name: The Ogre Mercenary
description: A 9-foot-tall slab of muscle squeezed into a patchwork of chainmail and barrel staves. It isn't smart, but it knows how to follow orders and swing a tree trunk.

attacks.name: Iron-Bound Club
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Bludgeoning Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 15) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Large
abilities.effect: Reach 10ft. Double damage to objects.

abilities.name: Wide Swing
abilities.effect: If the Ogre hits with a melee attack, it deals half damage to one other enemy adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). On Hit: Deals 1d8+2 Damage. The Ogre rips a stone or crate from the environment to throw.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.effect: The Ogre slams a foot down. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 15). Fail: They take 2 Damage (STR Mod) and their Speed is halved for 1 round (crushed toes).

loot: A sack containing a stolen pig (alive) and 200 copper pieces.

name: The Ogre Shaman
description: A bloated ogre draped in furs and bone fetishes. It creates crude magic by crushing runes stones or sacrificing small animals. It stays back, bellowing orders to its dumber kin.

attacks.name: Bone Staff
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. Reach 10ft.

abilities.name: Thick Skull
abilities.effect: The Shaman has Advantage on Saves against Psychic damage and the Stunned condition.

abilities.name: Bellow (Command)
abilities.effect: The Shaman roars at an ally (e.g., an Ogre Mercenary). That ally gains Advantage on its next Attack Check.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris (Magic Stone)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). The Shaman throws a rune-inscribed rock. On Hit: Deals 1d8+2 Force Damage. Effect: The target is Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.effect: The Shaman unleashes a guttural scream. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round (ringing ears/fear).

loot: Ogre Mage Horn (10g), Pouch of Rune Stones.

name: The Ogrillon (Ogre Kin)
description: A hulking, half-breed brute, standing 7 feet tall with mottled grey skin. They lack the sheer size of true ogres but make up for it with vicious tempers and club-like fists. They serve as fodder for larger giant clans.

attacks.name: Meat Fist
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Ogrillon ignores difficult terrain caused by rubble or rocks.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The Ogrillon throws a heavy rock or crate. Deals 2 Damage.

abilities.name: Grab & Squeeze
abilities.effect: Trigger: When attacking. Instead of dealing damage, the Ogrillon Grapples the target (Speed 0). Effect: While Grappled, the target takes 2 Automatic Damage at the start of their turns.

loot: A necklace of teeth, 1d4 copper pieces.

name: The Omega Colossus
description: A towering war-machine from a lost age, hovering slightly off the ground on a hum of anti-gravity magic. Its single eye glows with a disintegrating red light.

attacks.name: Gravity Hammer
attacks.effect: Deals 3d8+6 Force Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20) or be knocked Prone and pushed 15 feet.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Colossus has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects (Total AS 7 vs. Magic).

abilities.name: Capture (Tractor Beam)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). On Hit: No damage. The target is Restrained (suspended in the air). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 20) to escape.

abilities.name: Vent Coolant (Radiation)
abilities.effect: The Colossus purges its core. A 30ft Radius around it becomes Heavily Obscured. Any creature starting its turn there takes 2d10 Necrotic Damage.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Colossus goes critical. All creatures within 60 feet take 10d6 Force Damage (Reflex Save for half).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 gold pieces worth of Adamantine Scrap, a Power Core (500g), and a Laser Pistol.

name: The Owlbear
description: The classic wizard's mistake. A hulking mass of bear muscle and feathers, topped with a manic owl's head. It screeches with the sound of tearing metal. It attacks without fear or hesitation.

attacks.name: Crushing Beak
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (punctured mail).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Owlbear has Advantage on Perception. It cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Bear Hug
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled (Speed 0). At the start of the Owlbear's next turn, a Grappled target takes automatic 1d10+3 Damage.

abilities.name: Terrifying Screech
abilities.effect: The Owlbear unleashes a sonic roar. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round and drop whatever they are holding.

name: The Pack Raptor
description: Man-sized, bipedal lizards with sickle claws. They chirp to coordinate, moving with a terrifying, jerky speed. They are smart enough to open doors.

attacks.name: Sickle Claw
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.effect: The Raptor deals +2 Damage (Total 6) against any target that is Bleeding or below 50% HP.

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.effect: If the Raptor hits a player, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or gain the Bleeding condition (1d4 damage/turn).

name: The Peryton
description: A terrifying creature with the body of a giant eagle and the head of a stag. Its feathers are dark green, and it casts the shadow of a humanoid. It dives from the sky to rip out hearts, obsessed with consuming them.

attacks.name: Goring Antlers
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Piercing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (deep puncture).

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Flyer
abilities.effect: The Peryton flies at full speed.

abilities.name: Heart Rip
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target's Armor Score is reduced by 1 as the Peryton tears at chest-plates and straps.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.effect: The Peryton drops from the sky onto a target. Effect: The target takes 1d6+3 Weapon Damage + 2d6 Falling Damage and is knocked Prone (Reflex Save DC 17 for half damage/no prone).

name: The Phase Hunter
description: A floating, tentacled predator that looks like a deep-sea squid made of starlight and smoke. It drifts through walls and floors, attacking minds rather than bodies.

attacks.name: Mind-Whip
attacks.effect: Reach 15ft. Deals 2d6+4 Psychic Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Will Save (DC 19) or be Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Hunter's biology rejects terrestrial magic. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects (Total AS 3 vs Magic).

abilities.name: Psychic Bore
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell Attack (60ft). On Hit: Deals 2d6+4 Psychic Damage (Ignores Armor). Effect: If the target is concentrating on a spell or holding a prepared Action/Reaction, they lose it.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Hunter rips a hole in the world. A 20ft Radius zone becomes zero-gravity. Effect: All creatures in the zone float. They have Disadvantage on DEX checks and Attacks unless they can fly or grab a solid object.

name: The Phase Spider
description: A translucent, chitinous arachnid that seems to flicker in and out of reality. It waits on the ceiling, dropping onto prey with a shrill chitter.

attacks.name: Mandibles
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) unless they succeed on a Strength Save (DC 17).

abilities.name: Spider Climb
abilities.effect: The Spider can climb walls and ceilings at full speed without checking.

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). On Hit: The player takes no damage but is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Attacks). Escape requires an Action and a STR Check (DC 13).

abilities.name: Call of the Wild
abilities.effect: The Spider chitters a frequency that summons its brood. 1d4 Minions (Giant Spiderlings, 1 HP) drop from the ceiling at the end of the round.

name: The Phasm
description: A terrifying, intelligent ooze that can mold its surface to resemble a humanoidoften an injured adventurer or a lost child. When revealed, it strikes with a blade formed from its own body before dissolving into a puddle to escape.

attacks.name: Bone-Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical/Acid Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes Double Damage and is Weakened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Phasm has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: The Phasm looks like a generic humanoid. A Scrutiny Check (DC 17) is required to notice its skin shifting or rippling.

abilities.name: Face Steal
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: The Phasm wraps around the target's head. Target is Silenced and Blinded.

abilities.name: Liquefy
abilities.effect: Trigger: When damaged. The Phasm loses cohesion, becoming a puddle. It moves up to 80 feet without provoking counter-attacks, sliding under doors or into cracks, before reforming.

name: The Pit Tyrant
description: A massive demon of red muscle and shadow, wreathed in flames. It wields a whip of fire and a sword of lightning. It commands legions, but enjoys doing the killing itself.

attacks.name: Lightning Sword
attacks.effect: Deals 3d6+6 Lightning/Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20) or be Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Immune to Fire/Poison. Vulnerable to Holy Water/Radiant.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Tyrant has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Flame Whip (Control)
abilities.effect: Reach 15ft. Melee Attack. On Hit: 2d8 Fire Damage. The target is Grappled and pulled adjacent to the Tyrant.

abilities.name: Summon Kin
abilities.effect: The Tyrant roars. 1d4 Soldiers (Level 4 Demons) tear their way out of the ground at the end of the round.

abilities.name: Planar Shift (Abduct)
abilities.effect: The Tyrant grabs an adjacent creature. It teleports itself and the victim to a location up to 60 feet away (e.g., dropping them from the sky). Resist: An unwilling creature can make a Will Save (DC 20) to resist.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: Demon Heart (Artifact Component), Flaming Whip (Magic Weapon), 2,000 Gold.

name: The Plague Bloat
description: A corpse swollen with gases and fluids, skin stretched tight and green. It shambles forward, leaking infectious ichor. It doesn't care about defense; it wants to get close enough to pop.

attacks.name: Heavy Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: Any living creature starting its turn within 10 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage halved) for 1 round due to the nausea.

abilities.name: Rotting Slam
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or contract a Disease (Cannot regain HP from non-magical sources until cured).

abilities.name: Corpse Explosion
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The Bloat ruptures violently. All creatures within 10 feet take 4d6 Necrotic/Poison Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Plague Rat Swarm
description: A carpet of mangy fur, yellow teeth, and chattering noise. They flow over obstacles like water, biting anything warm.

attacks.name: Gnashing Teeth
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Swarm has +1 Attack DC (Total 14) if an ally (another Rat or a Wererat controller) is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Latch On
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Rats attack the same target, the target is Grappled (Speed 0) and takes 2 automatic damage at the start of their turn until they shake them off (Strength Save DC 13).

name: The Primordial Shoggoth
description: A rolling mountain of iridescent black slime, covered in thousands of forming and dissolving eyes. It pipes a whistle that tears at the sanity of those who hear it. It flows over the battlefield like a sentient oil spill.

attacks.name: Crushing Wave
attacks.effect: Deals 3d8+6 Bludgeoning/Acid Damage. On a hit, the player is knocked Prone and pushed 20 feet.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Magic Absorbent
abilities.effect: The Shoggoth is immune to Force, Psychic, and Cold damage. It Heals for the amount rolled if hit by these types.

abilities.name: Tekeli-li! (Sonic)
abilities.effect: The Shoggoth emits a piping shriek. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: They take 2d8 Psychic Damage and are Confused for 1 round.

abilities.name: Engulf (Mass)
abilities.effect: The Shoggoth moves up to its speed. It can move over Huge or smaller creatures. Creatures in its path roll Defense DC 20. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded). Take 3d8+6 Acid Damage at the start of the Shoggoth's turn.

abilities.name: Mitosis (Spawn)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When damaged. The Shoggoth rips off a chunk of itself. A Black Pudding (Brute 5) appears in an adjacent space. (This costs the Shoggoth 20 HP).

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: A Holy Avenger (Artifact), Alien Gem (500g), and Primordial Ichor (Legendary Reagent).

name: The Prism-Stalker
description: A crystalline entity that bends light around itself, rendering it nearly invisible. It stalks adventurers by floating directly above them, waiting for them to engage another foe before firing a laser of concentrated heat.

attacks.name: Focus Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+3 Fire/Radiant Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Stalker has Advantage (e.g., attacking from Invisibility), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Reflective Camouflage
abilities.effect: The Stalker is naturally Invisible. It becomes visible only after it attacks. It has Advantage on its first attack. Attacks against it have Disadvantage until it reveals itself.

abilities.name: Telekinetic Grip (Shove)
abilities.effect: The Stalker pushes a creature. Target must make a Strength Save (DC 16) or be pushed 10 feet (usually off a ledge or into a trap).

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm (Flash)
abilities.effect: The Stalker spins, refracting light wildly. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 15) or be Stunned for 1 round. The Stalker becomes Invisible again.

name: The Puff-Ball
description: A pulsating, spherical mushroom the size of a man, filled with pressurized gas. It heaves and coughs, launching globes of toxic sludge that explode on impact.

attacks.name: Rot-Bomb
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 2d6+3 Poison Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). On a Pass, half damage. On a Fail, full damage and the Poisoned condition.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores (Aura)
abilities.effect: Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the Puff-Ball must make a Fortitude Save (DC 19) or be Poisoned.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Pollen
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (30ft Cloud). Target must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: Target is Dazed (hallucinating) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Seed Bomb (Sporelings)
abilities.effect: The Puff-Ball launches a gestation pod. It lands and immediately 'hatches' into 1d4 Verdant Minions (Sporelings) that act at the end of the round.

name: The Purple Worm
description: A gargantuan, segmented worm covered in purple chitin. It bursts through solid rock, swallowing knights whole and stinging giants with its tail. It is not evil; it is simply the top of the food chain.

attacks.name: Maw of the Deep
attacks.effect: Deals 3d8+6 Bludgeoning. Target is Grappled (Restrained). If already Grappled, the target is Swallowed (Removed from board, 4d6 Acid/turn, Blinded).

attacks.name: Tail Stinger
attacks.effect: Reach 15ft. Deals 2d8+6 Piercing Damage.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Tremorsense
abilities.effect: The Worm can pinpoint any creature touching the ground within 100ft. Invisibility offers no protection.

abilities.name: Sting Injection
abilities.effect: If the Tail Stinger hits, the target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20). Fail: Take 6d6 Poison Damage and be Paralyzed for 1 round. Pass: Half damage, not paralyzed.

abilities.name: Breach (Dive Bomb)
abilities.effect: The Worm bursts from the earth and crashes down. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d10 Bludgeoning Damage and fall Prone (Reflex Save for half). The ground becomes Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Worm constricts/digests a Swallowed creature. They take Double Acid Damage immediately.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 gold pieces (melted), a Diamond (500g), a Legendary Weapon (indigestible), and Purple Worm Poison.

name: The Pyre-Walker
description: A bipedal tank carrying a reservoir of alchemical fuel on its back. Its arms are nozzles that drip liquid fire. It is used to clear trenches and burn out infestations.

attacks.name: Ignition Sprayer
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 2d6+3 Fire Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). On a Pass, half damage. On a Fail, full damage and the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The construct radiates heat. Any creature Grappling it or hitting it with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Suppressing Fire (Firewall)
abilities.effect: The Pyre-Walker sprays a line of burning liquid. It creates a 20ft long wall of fire. Any creature passing through it takes 2d6 Fire Damage (no save). The wall lasts for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct (Fuel Rupture)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed or at will. The fuel tank breaches. All creatures within 20 feet take 4d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half). The area continues to burn for 1d6 rounds.

name: The Pyro-Hydra
description: A reptilian nightmare with five writhing heads, each dripping with magma. If a head is severed, the wound cauterizes instantly, bubbling with new growth.

attacks.name: Many Fangs
attacks.effect: The Hydra makes Two Attacks per action (Bite: 2d8+4 / Claw: 1d8+2). On a Critical Hit, the target is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Multi-Headed
abilities.effect: The Hydra has Advantage on initiative and perception. It makes one extra attack per round (Total 3 attacks). If it takes 15+ damage in a single hit, one head 'dies' (Attack DC drops by 1).

abilities.name: Elemental Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Tag: Ignores Armor Score. Damage: 2d8+4 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: All active heads exhale at once. 30ft Cone. Effect: All creatures take 4d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save DC 18 for half).

loot: Regenerating Hydra Blood (50g), Several Fangs (5g each).

name: The Razor-Leaf
description: A humanoid figure composed of sharp, serrated green leaves and flexible vines. It moves with a fluid, whipping motion, slicing through armor like paper.

attacks.name: Serrated Limb
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target takes damage and gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless in foliage, it is indistinguishable from a bush. Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Vine Lash (Pull)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is pulled 5 feet closer to the Razor-Leaf (into melee range).

abilities.name: Wall of Thorns (Instant Hedge)
abilities.effect: The Razor-Leaf creates a barrier of sharp leaves. A 15ft long wall appears. It blocks line of sight. Creatures passing through take 2d6 Slashing Damage.

name: The Repair Drone
description: A hovering brass sphere with twitching manipulator arms and a dripping nozzle. It flits behind larger golems, welding plates back together and spraying acid at anyone who gets too close.

attacks.name: Acid Sprayer
attacks.effect: 15ft Cone. Players in the cone must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). Fail: They take 2d6 Acid Damage and their Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter. Pass: Half damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption (Lightning)
abilities.effect: The Drone is Immune to Lightning Damage. If hit by it, the Drone Heals for half the damage amount.

abilities.name: Field Repair
abilities.effect: The Drone touches an adjacent Construct (or itself). That Construct regains 1d8+2 HP.

abilities.name: Vent Coolant
abilities.effect: The Drone releases a cloud of freezing fog. A 20ft Radius centered on the Drone becomes Heavily Obscured (Blindness) for 1 minute. Any creature starting its turn there takes 1d6 Cold Damage.

name: The River Troll
description: A lanky, moss-covered horror with rubbery green skin and claws that drag on the ground. Wounds bubble and knit together seconds after they are inflicted. It lurks under bridges or in deep bogs.

attacks.name: Rending Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Slashing Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Troll regains 10 HP at the start of its turn. Weakness: This trait does not function if the Troll took Fire or Acid damage since its last turn.

abilities.name: Bite/Eat
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a Grappled target. On Hit: Deals 2d8+4 Piercing Damage. Effect: The Troll regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.effect: The Troll roars in pain and fury. For 1 minute, it deals an additional +1d6 Damage on all attacks, but its Defense DC drops to 10.

loot: A heavy iron key (to a toll chest), rare moss (Herbalist Reagent).

name: The River-Dread
description: A flat, wide-bodied reptile with mossy scales and jaws like a steel trap. It lurks in murky water, looking like a floating log until it snaps a leg bone.

attacks.name: Snapping Jaws
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Acid)
abilities.effect: Immune to Acid/Poison. Vulnerable to Lightning.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Drake has incredibly thick hide. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (included in stats).

abilities.name: Snatched
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled. The Drake immediately moves 15 feet into deep water/mud, carrying the victim with it.

abilities.name: Elemental Aura (Death Roll)
abilities.effect: The Drake thrashes violently. All creatures within 15 feet take 2d6 Physical Damage and are knocked Prone (No Save).

name: The Rot-God (Fungal Sovereign)
description: A cavernous chamber filled with a single, throbbing fungal consciousness. The 'boss' is a central stalk the size of a tower, surrounded by a haze of golden spores. It controls the minds of those who breathe its air.

attacks.name: Vampiric Roots
attacks.effect: The Rot-God attacks up to 3 Targets anywhere in the room (Infinite Reach via ground). Deals 3d6+6 Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the Rot-God Heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Rot-God regains 20 HP at the start of its turn unless it took Fire damage.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Pollen (Dominate)
abilities.effect: The Rot-God releases a psychic spore cloud. Target must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: Target is Charmed. On their turn, they must attack their nearest ally. (Save ends).

abilities.name: Pollen Nova (Slumber)
abilities.effect: The Rot-God pulses. All creatures within 60 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20). Fail: They fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until damaged.

abilities.name: Rapid Growth
abilities.effect: The Rot-God surges. It instantly regains 50 HP and ends all negative conditions on itself.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: Golden Spore (Legendary Reagent, cures any disease/curse), Staff of the Woodlands, 2,000 Gold Pieces (buried in compost).

name: The Rot-Wing
description: A swamp-dwelling dragon with tattered wings and a throat sack pulsating with glowing green gas. It perches on dead trees, coughing clouds of virus and acid onto those below.

attacks.name: Caustic Phlegm
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 2d6+3 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 (melting).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Poison)
abilities.effect: Immune to Poison/Acid. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Frightful Presence
abilities.effect: Any enemy starting its turn within 30 feet of the Rot-Wing must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Tail Sweep
abilities.effect: The Rot-Wing spins. All enemies in a 10ft rear arc must make a Defense Check (Dodge) vs DC 18. Fail: They take 2d6+3 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Incinerate (Rot)
abilities.effect: The Rot-Wing targets a single creature with a concentrated stream of slime. Effect: The target takes 2d6 Acid Damage automatically. They also suffer a permanent -1 to Max Stamina (scarred lungs) until cured by magic.

name: The Rotting Guardian
description: A bloated, waterlogged corpse encased in barnacle-encrusted plate armor. It smells of brine and decay. It stands guard over flooded crypts, refusing to move.

attacks.name: Heavy Flail
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 16) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: Any living creature starting its turn within 10 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 13). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage halved) for 1 round due to the nausea.

abilities.name: Rotting Slam
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 13) or contract a Disease (Cannot regain HP from non-magical sources until cured).

abilities.name: Corpse Explosion
abilities.effect: The Guardian detonates. All creatures within 10 feet take 4d6 Necrotic Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Royal Honor Guard
description: A towering figure in polished, gilded plate armor, wielding a heavy halberd. They stand perfectly still until violence erupts, then move with terrifying, drilled precision.

attacks.name: Gilded Halberd
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Physical Damage. Can attack up to 10ft away. Brace: If a player charges (moves at least 20ft) to attack the Guard, the Guard makes an attack first (Player rolls Defense vs DC 18).

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.effect: If an ally within 30 feet is killed, players have Disadvantage on Defense Checks against this Guard's next attack.

abilities.name: Execute
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Critical Damage (2d10+8). Requirement: Can only be used on a player that is already Prone or Stunned.

abilities.name: Wall of Steel
abilities.effect: The Guard raises their weapon in perfect defense. Until the start of their next turn, they gain Resistance (Half Damage) to all Physical Damage.

loot: 100 gold pieces, a gold-embroidered cloak (50g), and a writ of authority.

name: The Royal Musketeer
description: A disciplined soldier wielding a heavy arbalest or black-powder rifle. They wear a breastplate and a plumed hat. They prioritize enemy casters, waiting for the perfect moment to put a bolt through a spellbook.

attacks.name: Heavy Crossbow/Musket
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. Effect: This attack ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.effect: If an ally within 30 feet is killed, players have Disadvantage on Defense Checks against the Musketeer's next attack.

abilities.name: Suppressing Fire
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. The target takes no damage but is Pinned. Effect: If the target moves on their next turn, they automatically take damage equal to the Musketeer's weapon damage (2d8+4).

abilities.name: Reinforcements
abilities.effect: The Musketeer fires a signal flare. 1d4 Soldiers (Level 4 Guards) arrive from a nearby entrance at the end of the round.

loot: 100 gold pieces, a masterwork firearm or crossbow (worth 150g), and a Spyglass (worth 20g).

name: The Royal Spy
description: Dressed in fine nobility's clothes that conceal a suit of supple, enchanted leather. They wield a rapier with elegant lethality, vanishing from sight the moment the tide turns.

attacks.name: Duelist's Rapier
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. Effect: While wielding this, the Spy has +1 Defense DC (Total 17) vs. Melee.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Spy has Advantage, they deal Double Damage.

abilities.name: Evasive Footwork
abilities.effect: This enemy does not provoke Counter-Attacks when moving out of a player's reach.

abilities.name: Invisibility Potion
abilities.effect: The Spy drinks a potion and becomes Invisible for 1 minute or until they attack.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Spy marks a player. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

loot: 100 gold pieces, a Potion of Invisibility, and a set of forged royal decrees.

name: The Scrap-Scuttler
description: A crab-like monstrosity built from rusted saws, bear traps, and wire. It buries itself in piles of junk, waiting for someone to step close enough to shred.

attacks.name: Buzzsaw Limb
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Slashing Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Scuttler has Advantage on the attack (e.g., attacking from Hiding or Flanking), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Hazardous Body
abilities.effect: The construct is covered in jagged metal. Any creature that tries to Grapple it or hits it with an Unarmed Strike automatically takes 1 Damage.

abilities.name: Capture (Bear Trap)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: No damage, but the target is Grappled (Speed 0) and takes 2 Damage at the start of every turn they remain grappled.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct (Shrapnel)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Scuttler explodes. All creatures within 10 feet take 2d6 Piercing Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Searing Eye
description: A grapefruit-sized eyeball wreathed in magical flame. It has no eyelids, only a constant, burning stare. It drifts near the ceiling, turning the air around it into shimmering heat.

attacks.name: Focused Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Fire Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Defense (Dodge) Check (DC 17). On a Pass, half damage. On a Fail, full damage and the Burning condition.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Searing Eye does not Move on its turn, its Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Flash (Daze)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The Eye flares brightly. Effect: Target takes no damage but must make a Reflex Save (DC 17) or be Dazed and Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Nova (Combust)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Eye explodes. All creatures within 10 feet take 2d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Serpent-Haired Archer
description: A humanoid figure with a nest of vipers for hair and skin with a subtle, green-scaled sheen. She keeps her distance, firing arrows and forcing enemies to look at heror look away and die.

attacks.name: Viper-Hair
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Poison Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of Armor Score.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Displacement (Avert Eyes)
abilities.effect: Players fighting the Medusa must choose: Look at her (Risk Petrification) or Avert Eyes. If they Avert Eyes, she gains the Displacement trait (Attacks against her have Disadvantage).

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The Medusa lowers her mask/cowl. Effect: Target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Restrained (turning to stone) for 1 minute. If they fail a second save while Restrained, they are Petrified permanently.

abilities.name: Terrifying Screech (Hiss)
abilities.effect: The snake-hair hisses in unison. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round and drop whatever they are holding.

name: The Shadow
description: A silhouette peeled from a wall, existing only as a two-dimensional void. It slides through the chaos of battle, reaching out to touch hearts with freezing fingers.

attacks.name: Void Touch
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Shadow can move through solid objects. It has Resistance (Half Damage) to all non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Terrifying Glare
abilities.effect: Ranged (30ft). The Shadow flares its eyes. Effect: Target player must make a Will Save (DC 17). On a fail, they take 1d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Grave-Bind
abilities.effect: Shadows elongate and grasp. Spectral hands burst from the ground in a 20ft Radius. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Any creature standing there is Restrained (Strength Save DC 13 to escape).

name: The Shadow Demon
description: A silhouette torn from the abyss, lacking any physical features save for long, glowing claws. It glides along walls and floors, becoming two-dimensional to slide under doors. It fears the light.

attacks.name: Void Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is Blind for 1 round (shadows cling to eyes).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Demon has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Demon can move through solid objects. It has Resistance to non-magical physical attacks. Weakness: In Bright Light (e.g., Daylight spell), it loses its Resistance and Disadvantage to hit.

abilities.name: Planar Shift (Shadow Jump)
abilities.effect: The Demon teleports itself to any point of Dim Light or Darkness within 60 feet. It immediately makes a Stealth Check to Hide.

abilities.name: Possession
abilities.effect: The Demon dives into a player's shadow. The player must make a Will Save (DC 17). Fail: The Demon disappears from the board and controls the player's next Action. The player takes 1d10 Psychic Damage internally.

name: The Shadow-Moss
description: A dark, violet fungus that grows on the shaded sides of trees and ruins. It can detach itself to glide silently through the air. It hunts by dropping onto faces and feeding on breath.

attacks.name: Suffocating Cling
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Acid Damage. On a hit, the target is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) until the start of the Moss's next turn.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Moss has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: Indistinguishable from normal moss.

abilities.name: Engulf (Smother)
abilities.effect: The Moss drops onto a target. Effect: Target rolls Defense DC 18. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Silenced). They take 2d8+4 Acid Damage at the start of the Moss's turn.

abilities.name: Pollen Nova (Slumber)
abilities.effect: The Moss releases a cloud of black spores. All creatures within 15 feet must make a Fortitude Save (DC 17). Fail: They fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until damaged.

name: The Shadow-Scale
description: A dragon corrupted by the gloom of the deep earth or the Shadowfell. Its scales absorb light, making it appear as a silhouette. It strikes not to eat, but to hoard the souls of its victims.

attacks.name: Void Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is Blinded (Shadows cling to eyes) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Necrotic)
abilities.effect: Immune to Necrotic/Acid. Vulnerable to Radiant.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Shadow-Scale has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: Armor Score increased by +1 (Total AS 3).

abilities.name: Tail Sweep (Shadow Trip)
abilities.effect: The Shadow-Scale spins. All enemies in a 10ft rear arc must make a Defense Check (Dodge) vs DC 18. Fail: They take 2d8+4 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Incinerate (Wither)
abilities.effect: The Shadow-Scale breathes a concentrated glob of entropy at a single target. Effect: The target takes 3d6 Necrotic Damage automatically. They also suffer a permanent -1 to Strength (muscle atrophy) until cured by magic.

name: The Shambling Mound
description: A walking hill of rotting vegetation, mud, and lightning-struck wood. It is a relentless force of nature that absorbs magic and crushes bones. It smells of ozone and wet compost.

attacks.name: Rotting Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning/Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the Mound Heals for half the damage dealt, and the target is Grappled.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Special Trait (Lightning Absorption): Unlike most plants, the Mound is Immune to Lightning. If hit by Lightning damage, it Heals for the amount rolled. (It is still Vulnerable to Fire).

abilities.name: Grasping Ground
abilities.effect: The ground within 10 ft of the Mound is Difficult Terrain (writhing roots).

abilities.name: Engulf (Mass)
abilities.effect: The Mound moves over Medium or smaller creatures. Targets in its path must roll Defense DC 19. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, Suffocating). They take 2d8+5 Bludgeoning Damage at the start of the Mound's turn.

abilities.name: Rapid Growth
abilities.effect: The Mound surges with vitality. It instantly regains 20 HP and ends one negative condition affecting it (e.g., Burning).

name: The Shield Guardian
description: A massive golem of wood, stone, and steel, built specifically to protect a master. It glows with abjuration runes.

attacks.name: Runed Fists
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Force Damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Guardian absorbs spells. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Vent Arcane Fire
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 15). Fail: Take 2d6 Fire Damage.

abilities.name: Analyze Pattern
abilities.effect: The Guardian scans a specific player who just attacked it. For the rest of the combat, the Guardian has Advantage on all Attack Checks against that player.

name: The Shrieking Terror
description: A bat the size of a man with oversized ears and a throat sac that pulses with infrasound. It doesn't just bite; it screams until your ears bleed and your knees buckle.

attacks.name: Sonic Snap
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+3 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Bat has Advantage on Attack DC against Hidden enemies (Echolocation). It cannot be Surprised.

abilities.name: Sonic Screech
abilities.effect: The Bat unleashes a blast of sound. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They are Frightened and Deafened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Pounce (Swoop)
abilities.effect: The Bat dives. It moves 30ft and targets a player. The player must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). Fail: They take normal damage and are knocked Prone.

name: The Siege Ballista
description: A massive, four-legged platform mounting a rail-gun or magical lance. It moves slowly, anchoring itself to the ground before firing shots that can punch through castle walls.

attacks.name: Iron Lance
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (shatters shields/dents plate).

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Ballista cannot be Knocked Prone or moved against its will. It ignores Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Volley (Bombardment)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. Target a 15ft Radius area. All players in the area must roll Defense (Dodge) vs. DC 20. Fail: They take 3d6 Bludgeoning Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.effect: The Ballista fires a specialized magnetic or net-tether bolt. Target one player. They are Restrained (Speed 0) by the heavy projectile pinning them to the ground. Escape: Strength Check (DC 20).

name: The Skeleton Arbalest
description: A bleached skeleton with a heavy, rusted crossbow bolted to its forearm. It takes a knee to fire with mechanical precision, ignoring the chaos of battle.

attacks.name: Heavy Crossbow
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Bone Pile
abilities.effect: The Skeleton can lie dormant as a heap of bones. It is indistinguishable from a dead body until it attacks (Ambush), granting Advantage on its first shot.

abilities.name: Necrotic Sludge (Bile)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). The Skeleton launches a glass globe of necrotic sludge. On Hit: No damage, but the player is Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The bones snap back together. The Skeleton returns with 9 HP (Half) and immediately reloads.

name: The Skeleton Archer
description: Bleached bones holding a shortbow that creaks as ominously as the skeleton's joints. They stand in formation, raining rusted arrows on intruders.

attacks.name: Rotted Arrow
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage. Range 60ft.

abilities.name: Bone Pile
