abilities.effect: The Skeleton can lie dormant as a heap of bones. It is indistinguishable from a dead body until it attacks (Ambush), granting Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.effect: If 3 or more Archers target the same player, that player takes 4 Damage automatically unless they succeed on a Dodge (DEX) Check (DC 13).

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The GM spends 1 DP. The bones snap back together, and the Minion stands up again with 1 HP.

name: The Skeleton Legionnaire
description: Cleaned bones wearing scraps of ancient, rusted chainmail. It marches in perfect lockstep with its kin, fighting with a mechanical lack of fear.

attacks.name: Rusted Shortsword
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 until the end of the encounter (Tetanus/Corrosion).

abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
abilities.effect: If damage reduces the Skeleton to 0 HP, the player must roll a Luck Check. On a success (or GM Roll DC 15), the Skeleton drops to 1 HP instead of dying. (Radiant damage bypasses this).

abilities.name: Grave Grasp
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Ignores Armor). On Hit: The target takes no damage but is Grappled (Speed 0) by the Skeleton's bony grip.

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Skeleton reassembles itself. It stands up immediately with 8 HP (Half).

name: The Skeleton Skulker
description: A skeleton wrapped in tattered grey rags, dual-wielding rusted jagged daggers. It moves on all fours like a spider, sticking to the shadows and ceiling.

attacks.name: Jagged Daggers
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (filthy wounds).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Skulker has Advantage on the attack (e.g., attacking from Hiding/Flanking), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Bone Pile
abilities.effect: The Skulker can lie dormant as a heap of bones. It is indistinguishable from a dead body until it attacks (Ambush), granting it Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Necrotic Damage. Effect: The Skulker regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The bones rattle and snap back together. The Skulker returns with 6 HP (Half).

name: The Sky-Terror
description: Leathery-winged reptiles with razor beaks. They act as the eyes and ears of larger dragons, or hunt in screeching flocks that blot out the sun.

attacks.name: Diving Peck
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Thunder.

abilities.name: Flyby (Wingover)
abilities.effect: The Sky-Terrors movement does not provoke counter-attacks. It dives, strikes, and retreats to the sky.

abilities.name: Snatched (Harass)
abilities.effect: Instead of dealing damage, the Sky-Terror grabs at a weapon or pack. The target must make a Reflex Save (DC 14) or drop one held item.

abilities.name: Flyby Snatch (Drop)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When attacking. The Sky-Terror grapples a Medium or smaller creature, lifts them 10 feet, and drops them. The target takes 1d6 Falling Damage and lands Prone.

name: The Slime Blob
description: A fist-sized glob of green jelly that bounces or rolls towards warmth. They are often found trailing behind larger cubes or puddings, cleaning up the scraps.

attacks.name: Acid Touch
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Sticky Climber
abilities.effect: The Blob can move on walls and ceilings.

abilities.name: Gunging
abilities.effect: Instead of attacking, the Blob throws itself at a creature's face. Target must make a Reflex Save (DC 13). Fail: Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Violent Eruption (Pop)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Blob bursts. All creatures within 5 feet take 2 Acid Damage (No Save).

name: The Slime Guard
description: A cube of translucent green jelly roughly the size and shape of a dwarf. It holds a suspension of half-digested bones in its center. It does not think; it simply blocks the corridor and waits for food to walk into it.

attacks.name: Pseudopod Lash
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Corrosive Body
abilities.effect: Any creature that touches the Slime or hits it with a Melee Attack takes 1d4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Engulf
abilities.effect: The Slime moves into a target's space. Target rolls Defense DC 15. Fail: Target is Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded, unable to breathe). They take 1d8+2 Acid Damage at the start of the Slime's turn.

abilities.name: Sudden Surge
abilities.effect: The Slime loses cohesion and floods forward. It moves up to 60 feet. It can move through enemy spaces without provoking counter-attacks.

loot: A floating, rusted dagger (Scrap) and 20 silver pieces suspended in the goo.

name: The Sludge Demon
description: A corpulent, toad-like mockery of life, dripping with stinking gray slime. It smells of centuries of rot. It wades through battle, ignoring wounds, driven by a hunger to consume souls.

attacks.name: Rotting Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic/Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is so disgusted by the wound they are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Holy Water/Radiant.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Demon has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects.

abilities.name: Life Drain (Feast)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack against a target within 5ft. On Hit: Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. Effect: The Demon regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Summon Kin
abilities.effect: The demon croaks a summons. 1d4 Minions (Dretches or Manes) claw their way out of the ground at the end of the round.

name: The Solar Coatl
description: A feathered serpent of radiant gold and rainbow hues. It does not hoard gold, but knowledge and sacred artifacts. It speaks directly into the minds of intruders, judging them with blinding light.

attacks.name: Radiant Fangs
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Radiant/Fire Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Fire)
abilities.effect: Immune to Fire/Radiant. Vulnerable to Cold/Necrotic.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.effect: (1/Combat). If the Coatl fails a Save against a player spell or effect, it can choose to Succeed instead.

abilities.name: Wingover
abilities.effect: The Coatl beats its wings violently. All adjacent creatures are pushed 10 feet away and blinded by light. The Coatl then moves up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

abilities.name: Roar of the Ancients (Truth)
abilities.effect: The Coatl speaks a word of power. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They drop whatever they are holding (weapons/shields) and are Frightened for 1 round.

loot: Coatl Feather (100g), Vial of Liquid Light (50g).

name: The Spark-Drake
description: A small, frantic dragon with scales the color of thunderclouds. It buzzes its wings like a hummingbird, generating a static field that makes hair stand on end. It flits out of reach, blasting foes with arcs of electricity.

attacks.name: Static Wings
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Lightning Damage. On a hit, the target is pushed 15 feet away (magnetic repulsion).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Earth/Acid.

abilities.name: Reactive Tail
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves into a space adjacent to the Drake, it can use its Reaction to make a melee attack immediately to push them back.

abilities.name: Elemental Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Ignores Armor Score. Damage: 1d6+2 Lightning Damage.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.effect: The Drake exhales a line of focused lightning. 60ft Line. Effect: All creatures in the line take 4d6 Lightning Damage (Reflex Save DC 16 for half).

name: The Spectator
description: A smaller, spherical watcher with four eye stalks and a single large central eye. It is often summoned to guard a specific treasure chest or door. It is grumpy, literal-minded, and telepathic.

attacks.name: Ray Volley
attacks.effect: The Spectator fires 2 Random Rays (Roll d8). Note: At Level 2, the Death Ray (#8) deals 3d6 Damage instead of 5d8 to prevent instant kills.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Reflective Cornea
abilities.effect: If a Ranged Spell Attack misses the Spectator (Player fails Casting Check), the spell bounces back. The caster must roll Defense against their own Spell DC or be hit by their own spell.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Deals 1d4 damage.

abilities.name: Tyrant's Command (Confusion)
abilities.effect: The Spectator shouts a telepathic order. Target must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: Target is Confused for 1 round (Attacks nearest creature).

name: The Specter Mage
description: A floating, translucent figure draped in shredded robes. It does not use weapons; it points a withered finger and unleashes bolts of pure entropy.

attacks.name: Necrotic Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (60ft). Deals 2d8+4 Force/Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Specter can move through solid objects. It has Resistance (Half Damage) to all non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Terrifying Glare
abilities.effect: Range 30ft. The Specter flares its eyes at a flanking player. The player must make a Will Save (DC 15). On a fail, they take 1d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Wail of the Damned
abilities.effect: The Specter unleashes a psychic shriek. All living enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 15). Fail: They take 3d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened.

name: The Spined Runt
description: A smaller, flightless cousin of the manticore. It resembles a mangy lion with a quiver of porcupine quills growing from its tail. It scuttles along ridges, whipping its tail to launch barbs at intruders.

attacks.name: Barbed Quill
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Piercing Damage. On a hit, the target takes damage. Adjacent creatures take Half Damage from shrapnel.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Runt does not Move on its turn, its Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Tail Spikes (Barrage)
abilities.effect: The Runt fires a volley. It targets up to 3 creatures in a 10ft area. Each target rolls Defense vs Attack DC 17. Hit: 1d8+2 Damage.

abilities.name: Feral Rage
abilities.effect: The Runt howls. For 1 minute, it has Advantage on all Attack Checks (turning it into a machine gun of spines), but attacks against it also have Advantage.

name: The Spitting Cobra
description: A ten-foot serpent with a flared hood. It rears up, swaying hypnotically before projecting a stream of neurotoxic venom with terrifying accuracy.

attacks.name: Venom Jet
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Acid/Poison Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Pass, they take half damage. On a Fail, they take full damage and the Burning (Acid) condition.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Cobra does not Move on its turn, its Venom Jet deals an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Eye Spray
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (15ft). On Hit: No damage, but the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 12) or be Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Cobra marks a player. Until the start of the next round, all ranged attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased by +2.

name: The Spitting Drake (Runt)
description: The size of a large dog, these wingless dragons are the 'hounds' of the Wyrm family. They have underdeveloped acid sacs that leak constantly, sizzling on the stone floor.

attacks.name: Acid Spit
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Acid Damage. Range 30ft.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Acid)
abilities.effect: Immune to Acid. Vulnerable to Cold.

abilities.name: Reactive Tail
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves into a space adjacent to the Drake, it can make a melee attack (Bite for 2 damage) as a Reaction.

abilities.name: Melting Volley
abilities.effect: If 2 or more Drakes attack the same target with Acid Spit, the target's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter.

abilities.name: Elemental Aura (Blood Splash)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Drake bursts. All adjacent creatures take 4 Acid Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Spitting Larva
description: A pulsating, pale grub the size of a barrel. It has no legs, dragging itself slowly, but its maw can launch globs of caustic slime with terrifying velocity.

attacks.name: Caustic Glob
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Fail, they take full damage and their Armor Score is reduced by 1 (melting). On a Pass, half damage.

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Larva does not Move on its turn, its Caustic Glob deals an additional +1d6 Damage.

abilities.name: Bio-Mortar (Volley)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. Target a 15ft Radius area. All players in the area must roll Defense vs. DC 17. Fail: They take 1d8+2 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct (Acid Burst)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Larva ruptures. All creatures within 10 feet take 2d6 Acid Damage (Reflex Save for half).

name: The Spore-Caller
description: A small, hunched mushroom-man carrying a staff made of a human femur. It stays behind the brutes, shaking its cap to release clouds of hallucinogenic dust.

attacks.name: Choking Dust
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Poison Damage. On a hit, the target gains the Poisoned condition (1d6/turn).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores (Aura)
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 ft of the Spore-Caller must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On a failure, they are Poisoned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Pollen
abilities.effect: Ranged Spell (Cloud). Target must make a Will Save (DC 16). Fail: Target is Dazed (hallucinating) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Seed Bomb (Sporelings)
abilities.effect: The Spore-Caller plants its staff. 1d4 Minions (Sporelings) burst from the ground at the end of the round.

name: The Sporeling
description: A waist-high, walking mushroom with a soft, spongy body and no distinct face. It waddles blindly toward movement, seeking to burst and spread its colony.

attacks.name: Soft Slam
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Bludgeoning Damage.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Toxic Spores
abilities.effect: If a player starts their turn Grappled by or adjacent to a Sporeling, they are Poisoned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Puff
abilities.effect: The Sporeling releases a small cloud. One adjacent target is Blinded for 1 round (Fortitude DC 14 negates).

abilities.name: Pollen Nova (Pop)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Sporeling explodes. All creatures within 10 feet take 3 Poison Damage (No Save).

name: The Star-Spawn Titan
description: A towering biped with wings that do not push air and a face of writhing tentacles. It steps through geometry rather than walking, its mere presence causing nosebleeds and migraines.

attacks.name: Eldritch Claw
attacks.effect: Deals 3d8+6 Physical/Psychic Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Will Save (DC 20) or be Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Titan regains 20 HP at the start of its turn. This trait stops functioning for 1 round if it takes Radiant damage.

abilities.name: Mind Blast
abilities.effect: 60ft Cone. All creatures in the area must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: They take 4d6 Psychic Damage (Ignores Armor) and are Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Titan rips a hole in the world. A 30ft Radius zone becomes Zero-Gravity. Effect: All creatures float. They have Disadvantage on DEX checks and Attacks unless they can fly.

abilities.name: Spatial Warp
abilities.effect: The Titan teleports itself and one player (Unwilling, Will Save DC 20 to resist) to any point within 100 feet. Tactical Use: It drops the Healer into a pit or isolates the Warrior on a high ledge.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 gold pieces, a Geometric Geode (500g), and a Blade of the Void (Unique Magic Weapon).

name: The Steam-Caster
description: A squat, tripod-mounted boiler with a pneumatic barrel. It hisses and rattles, tracking targets with a singular glass lens.

attacks.name: Pneumatic Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Sniper's Patience
abilities.effect: If the Steam-Caster does not Move on its turn, its Ranged Attacks deal an additional +1d6 Damage (pressure builds up).

abilities.name: Vent Scalding Steam
abilities.effect: 15ft Cone. Players in the area must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). On a Fail, they take 2d6 Fire Damage and are Blinded for 1 round.

abilities.name: Overcharge (Rapid Fire)
abilities.effect: The Construct acts with a burst of speed. It immediately takes an Extra Standard Action (firing another bolt). Cost: It takes 1d6 Damage at the end of the turn.

name: The Stirge
description: A horrific fusion of bat and mosquito, with four leathery wings and a needle-sharp proboscis. They hang in clusters like fruit, dropping to drain dry anything with a pulse.

attacks.name: Proboscis
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Hybrid Mind
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed.

abilities.name: Attach
abilities.effect: If the Stirge hits a player, it occupies the player's space. The player takes 2 Automatic Damage at the start of their turn until they use an Action to rip the Stirge off (Strength DC 10).

abilities.name: Blood Burst
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed while attached. The Stirge pops. The creature it was attached to is Blinded by blood for 1 round.

name: The Stitched Horror
description: A hulking monstrosity sewn together from the parts of ogres and horses. It smells of formaldehyde and old lightning. It feels no pain, only the compulsion to crush.

attacks.name: Iron Chains
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) and dragged 5 feet closer to the Horror.

abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
abilities.effect: If damage reduces the Horror to 0 HP, the player must roll a Luck Check. On a success (or GM Roll DC 10 + Dmg), the Horror drops to 1 HP instead of dying.

abilities.name: Grave Grasp
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Ignores Armor Score). On Hit: The target takes 1d8+4 Crushing Damage and is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Attacks/Dex Saves) as the Horror pins them against its bulk.

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The stitches pull tight, and the limbs reattach. The Horror stands up immediately with 35 HP (Half).

name: The Stone Clan Guardian
description: A 12-foot giant with skin like granite, blending perfectly into the cavern walls. It wields a massive stalactite as a spear. It stands perfectly still until an intruder crosses the threshold.

attacks.name: Stalactite Spear
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Piercing Damage. Reach 15ft. Can attack enemies two 'zones' away.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.effect: The Giant has Advantage on Stealth checks in rocky terrain.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Giant ignores difficult terrain caused by rubble or rocks. It cannot be knocked Prone by Medium or smaller creatures.

abilities.name: Sweep
abilities.effect: The Giant swings its spear in a wide arc. All enemies in a 10 ft semi-circle must roll Defense vs DC 16. Fail: They take 1d8+3 Damage and are pushed 10 ft back.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse
abilities.effect: The Giant smashes a support pillar. Debris falls on a 15 ft radius area. Effect: Creatures inside take 4d10 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save DC 13 for half) and are Restrained (buried).

loot: Stone Giant Skin (15g), perfectly round stones.

name: The Stone Giant Runecarver
description: A gaunt, hairless giant with skin like marble. Glowing runes are carved directly into its flesh. It manipulates the earth itself, shaping the battlefield to trap intruders.

attacks.name: Runic Slab
attacks.effect: Melee Attack. Deals 2d6+3 Force Damage. Tag: Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Runecarver ignores difficult terrain caused by rubble/stone. It cannot be pushed or knocked Prone by creatures smaller than it.

abilities.name: Stomp (Tremor)
abilities.effect: The Runecarver slams a foot down. Effect: All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 18). On a fail, they fall Prone. The ground becomes Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Wall of Stone
abilities.effect: The Runecarver raises a slab of rock (10ft high, 20ft long) to block a path or provide cover.

abilities.name: Structure Collapse
abilities.effect: The Runecarver activates a rune on the ceiling. Debris falls on a 15 ft radius. Effect: Creatures inside take 4d10 Bludgeoning Damage (Reflex Save for half) and are Restrained (buried).

loot: Living Stone Heart (25g), Chisel of Shaping (20g).

name: The Stone Juggernaut
description: A massive temple guardian carved from granite blocks. It doesn't just look like a statue; it looks like the whole temple stood up. It grinds forward with the inevitability of a landslide.

attacks.name: Stone Pillar
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (Shields shatter, plate dents).

abilities.name: Heavy Plating
abilities.effect: The Juggernaut's Armor Score is increased by +1 (Included in stats).

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.effect: The Juggernaut moves up to 25ft in a straight line through enemy spaces. Any enemy it moves through must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 2d8+5 Damage and are knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.effect: The Juggernaut slams the ground. A Wall of Stone (20 HP, AS 2) erupts, trapping one target in a corner or sealing a hallway exit.

name: The Storm Giant Oracle
description: A majestic, 20-foot titan with violet skin and eyes that flash with lightning. It floats slightly above the ground, surrounded by a localized tempest. It sees the future in the lightning arcs.

attacks.name: Lightning Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Lightning Damage. Tag: On a hit, the target takes damage. All adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or take Half Damage.

abilities.name: Wide Swing (Arcing)
abilities.effect: If the Oracle hits with a melee attack, lightning arcs to one adjacent enemy, dealing half damage.

abilities.name: Fling Victim (Telekinesis)
abilities.effect: The Oracle gestures at a creature. Effect: The target must make a Strength Save (DC 19). On a fail, they are thrown 30 feet through the air, taking 3d6 Damage and landing Prone.

abilities.name: Bellow (Thunder)
abilities.effect: 30ft Cone. All creatures take 2d8 Thunder Damage and are Deafened.

abilities.name: Earthquake (Storm Surge)
abilities.effect: The Oracle slams the ground. A shockwave knocks everyone within 60 feet Prone (Reflex Save DC 19). Environmental: All torches are extinguished by the wind.

loot: 500 gold pieces (in huge coins), a Pearl of Power (100g), and a map to a Cloud Castle.

name: The Storm Guardian
description: A towering humanoid covered in blue scales, crackling with static electricity. It wields a glaive made of non-conductive crystal. It guards the highest peaks, challenging all who approach to single combat.

attacks.name: Crystal Glaive
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Lightning Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Acid/Earth.

abilities.name: Reactive Tail
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves into a space adjacent to the Guardian, it can use its Reaction to make a melee attack immediately.

abilities.name: Wingover
abilities.effect: The Guardian beats its wings violently. All adjacent creatures are pushed 10 feet away. The Guardian then moves up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

abilities.name: Roar of the Ancients
abilities.effect: The Guardian unleashes a thunderous shout. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 15). Fail: They drop whatever they are holding (weapons/shields) and are Frightened for 1 round.

name: The Storm Monarch
description: A creature of legend, its scales sparking with lightning, its wings blotting out the sun. It does not fight mere mortals; it executes them. It commands the weather itself, turning the battlefield into a hurricane.

attacks.name: Thunderous Claws
attacks.effect: Deals 3d6+6 Physical/Lightning Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled. The Monarch immediately flies 30 feet straight up, carrying the victim.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Acid.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.effect: (1/Combat). If the Monarch fails a Save against a player spell or effect, it can choose to Succeed instead.

abilities.name: Frightful Presence
abilities.effect: Any enemy starting its turn within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 20). On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Wingover
abilities.effect: The Monarch beats its wings. All adjacent creatures are pushed 15 feet away and knocked Prone. The Monarch then moves up to 40 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon (Line)
abilities.effect: A focused beam of plasma. 60ft Line. Effect: All creatures in the line take 4d6 Lightning Damage (Reflex Save DC 20 for half).

abilities.name: Roar of the Ancients
abilities.effect: The Monarch speaks a word of power. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 20). Fail: They drop whatever they are holding and are Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: The Hoard: Roll 3 times on the Loot Tables. Includes a Legendary Artifact and Dragon Heart (500g).

name: The Storm Sylph
description: A being of translucent blue wind and crackling static. It moves faster than the eye can follow, riding lightning bolts across the room.

attacks.name: Lightning Arc
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Lightning Damage. On a hit, the target cannot use Reactions until the start of their next turn (shocked muscles).

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron.

abilities.name: Hover
abilities.effect: The Sylph floats. It ignores ground-based difficult terrain (grease, rubble) and cannot be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.effect: The Sylph teleports up to 15 feet immediately before making its attack, appearing behind the target to strike with Advantage.

abilities.name: Summon Kin
abilities.effect: The air pressure drops. 1d4 Minions (Dust Mephits or Lightning Sprites) materialize from thin air at the end of the round.

name: The Storm Titan
description: A god-like figure standing 25 feet tall, skin violet, hair crackling with static. They float above the ground on a cloud, looking down at the mortals with amusement. They wield the weather as a weapon.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt Greatsword
attacks.effect: Melee (15ft Reach): 3d8+6 Lightning/Slashing Damage. Ranged (120ft): The Titan throws a bolt of lightning. On Hit: Target takes damage. Adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save or take Half Damage.

abilities.name: Storm Born
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning/Thunder.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Titan cannot be Grappled, Prone, or moved against its will.

abilities.name: Fling Victim (Telekinesis)
abilities.effect: The Titan gestures. Target makes a Strength Save (DC 20). Fail: They are thrown 60 feet straight up. They fall immediately, taking 6d6 Falling Damage and landing Prone.

abilities.name: Earthquake (Thunderclap)
abilities.effect: The Titan claps its hands. All creatures within 60 feet take 4d6 Thunder Damage (Fortitude Save for half) and are Deafened.

abilities.name: Grab & Squeeze (Lightning Cage)
abilities.effect: The Titan grabs a target (No Check). The target is Restrained in a cage of electricity and takes 10 Lightning Damage at the start of their turn.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 2,000 Gold Pieces, A Chest of 'Small' Gems (Worth 500g), Blueprint: Belt of Storm Giant Strength.

name: The Storm-Wing
description: A lean, two-legged drake with massive wings that crackle with static. It never lands, preferring to snatch prey from the ground and drop them, or strike with a beak like a lightning bolt.

attacks.name: Thunder-Beak
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+3 Lightning/Piercing Damage. Tag: If the Storm-Wing moves 20ft before attacking, deal +1d8 Damage.

abilities.name: Draconic Blood (Lightning)
abilities.effect: Immune to Lightning. Vulnerable to Earth/Acid.

abilities.name: Hardened Scales
abilities.effect: The Storm-Wing has tougher hide than most skirmishers. Its Armor Score is increased by +1 (Total AS 2).

abilities.name: Snatched
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled. The Storm-Wing immediately moves 20 feet straight up (or away), carrying the victim.

abilities.name: Wingover
abilities.effect: The Storm-Wing beats its wings violently. All adjacent creatures are pushed 10 feet away and knocked Prone. It then moves up to 20 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

name: The Strangle-Weed
description: A patch of unassuming, wiry vines that dwell in riverbeds or dungeon puddles. When a boot steps on them, they snap tight like a wire garrote.

attacks.name: Choking Loop
attacks.effect: Deals 1d6+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Weed has Advantage (e.g., attacking from False Appearance), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from normal seaweed or vines. Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Vine Lash (Drag)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is pulled 10 feet into the water or mud (potentially drowning rules apply).

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: Roots erupt. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 14). Fail: They are Restrained (Speed 0).

name: The Strangler Vine
description: A thick, green vine that slithers like a snake. It has no eyes or mouth, only thorns and crushing strength. It drops from trees or bursts from the soil to bind adventurers.

attacks.name: Constrict
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Grasping Ground
abilities.effect: The space the Vine occupies is Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: If the Vine hits a target, the target is Grappled (Speed 0). Swarm: If 2 or more Vines grapple the same target, the target is Restrained (Disadvantage on Attacks/Dex Saves).

abilities.name: Rapid Growth (Replenish)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Vine is cut down, but another one immediately bursts from the ground in the same space, effectively healing the minion to full (1 HP).

loot: Strong Rope Fiber, Poison Ivy Sap.

name: The Street Enforcer
description: A slab of muscle squeezed into an ill-fitting leather vest. They smell of sour ale and dried blood. They don't bother guarding; they just lean against the door and crack their knuckles.

attacks.name: Spiked Club
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Dazed (can only take an Action or a Move) until the start of their next turn.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Enforcer gains +1 Attack DC (Total 17) if an ally is adjacent to their target.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage, and the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Blinded (pocket sand/spit) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Get Them!
abilities.effect: All allies within 30 ft immediately use their Reaction to move up to their Speed toward a specific player.

loot: 1d6 gold pieces, a pouch of chewing tobacco, and a brass knuckle trophy.

name: The Thorn-Spitter
description: A squat, barrel-shaped cactus with a single, flower-like aperture at the top. It hides among normal scrub brush until it fires a volley of needle-sharp spines.

attacks.name: Spine Shot
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 1d8+2 Piercing Damage. This attack Ignores 1 point of the player's Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: While motionless, indistinguishable from a normal cactus. Advantage on its first attack.

abilities.name: Needle Volley
abilities.effect: The Spitter fires a burst of thorns. It makes attack rolls against up to Two targets that are within 5ft of each other.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: Roots erupt from the ground. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 17). Fail: They are Restrained (Speed 0). The area becomes Difficult Terrain.

name: The Thunder-Foot Tyrant
description: A bipedal lizard of nightmare proportions. Its roar shakes the leaves off trees, and its teeth are the size of daggers. It is hunger made manifest.

attacks.name: Titanic Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player is Grappled (in the mouth) and takes double damage.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.effect: The Tyrant has +2 Attack DC against any target that is Bleeding or below 50% HP.

abilities.name: Terrifying Roar
abilities.effect: The Tyrant bellows. All enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save (DC 18). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.effect: The Tyrant makes a bite attack against a Grappled or Prone target. This deals Double Damage and heals the Tyrant for half the amount dealt.

loot: T-Rex Skull (Trophy, 200g), Stomach Contents (1d6 Undigested Gems).

name: The Timber Wolf
description: A lean, grey-furred hunter with intelligent yellow eyes. It circles its prey, waiting for a packmate to distract them before lunging for the throat.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) if they fail a Strength Save (DC 15).

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Wolf has +1 Attack DC (Total 16) if an ally (another Wolf) is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Knockdown
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Half Damage, and the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 15) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild
abilities.effect: The Wolf howls. 1d4 Minions (Juvenile Wolves, 1 HP) emerge from the shadows at the end of the round.

name: The Tomb Sentinel
description: A crude but massive statue of sandstone and bronze, tasked with guarding a specific door forever. It doesn't speak; it just grinds forward to crush intruders.

attacks.name: Stone Fist
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Bludgeoning Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (cracked ribs/dented shields).

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.effect: The Sentinel ignores Difficult Terrain and cannot be Slowed, Grappled, or Paralyzed by physical means.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.effect: The Sentinel rotates its torso 360 degrees. It makes one Attack Check against the Defense DC of every adjacent enemy.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.effect: The Sentinel slams the ground. A Wall of Stone (20 HP, AS 2) erupts from the floor, blocking a passage or trapping a player in a corner.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 200 gold pieces worth of gold leaf and turquoise (scraped off the body), plus a Golem Core (Quest Item).

name: The Trapdoor Spider
description: A hairy, bulkier arachnid that burrows just beneath the earth. It bursts from beneath a camouflaged lid of webbing and dirt to drag prey into its tunnel.

attacks.name: Grasping Fangs
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player is Grappled (Speed 0) unless they succeed on a Strength Save (DC 16).

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Spider has Advantage (e.g., attacking from its hole), it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.effect: The Spider has Tremorsense. It cannot be Surprised by creatures moving on the ground.

abilities.name: Latch On
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The Spider occupies the player's space and Grapples them. If the player starts their turn Grappled, they automatically take 3 Damage (STR Mod).

abilities.name: Enrage (Panic)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When the Spider takes damage. It clears all negative conditions and immediately takes an extra Standard Action (usually to Drag the grappled target into its burrow or flee).

name: The Triceratops
description: A living siege engine of bone and gristle. Its three horns are stained with gore, and its frill is flushed with bright, warning colors. It paws the earth, ready to flatten anything in its path.

attacks.name: Goring Horns
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+5 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Reflex Save (DC 19) or be knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.effect: If the Triceratops moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a target, its Attack DC increases by +1 (Total 20) for that turn.

abilities.name: Terrifying Roar
abilities.effect: The beast bellows. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save (DC 19). Fail: They are Frightened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.effect: The Triceratops swings its massive head wildly. All creatures adjacent to it must make a Reflex Save (DC 19). Fail: They take 5 Damage and are pushed 10 feet away.

name: The Troll Whelp
description: A stunted, regenerating horror severed from a larger troll. It scuttles on all fours, dragging knuckles that drip with acidic bile. It attacks with a mindless hunger.

attacks.name: Rending Claw
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Slashing Damage.

abilities.name: Wide Swing
abilities.effect: If the Whelp hits with a melee attack, it deals 1 Damage to one other enemy adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Bite/Eat
abilities.effect: If the Whelp hits a Prone target, it deals 4 Damage.

abilities.name: Regeneration (Rise Again)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. Unless the Whelp was killed by Fire or Acid, the GM spends 1 DP. The Whelp knits its flesh back together and stands up with 1 HP at the start of the next round.

name: The Two-Headed Mauler (Ettin)
description: A hulking, filthy giant with two squabbling heads. It wears a tunic of stitched leather shields and wields a morningstar in each hand. It is never surprised, and it never stops arguing with itself.

attacks.name: Twin Morningstars
attacks.effect: The Ettin makes Two Attacks (one with each arm). Damage: 1d10+4 Bludgeoning Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target is Frightened and knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Reach
abilities.effect: 10ft Reach.

abilities.name: Thick Skull (Two Heads)
abilities.effect: The Ettin has Advantage on Initiative checks and Saves against Psychic damage, Stunned, or Sleep.

abilities.name: Sweep
abilities.effect: The Ettin spins its weapons in a circle. All enemies in a 10ft radius must roll Defense vs DC 16. Fail: They take 1d10+4 Damage and are pushed 10 ft back.

abilities.name: Hurl Debris
abilities.effect: Ranged (60ft). Throws a rock or dead goblin. Deals 1d10+4 Damage.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.effect: The heads stop arguing and scream in unison. For 1 minute, the Ettin deals +1d6 Damage on all attacks, but its Defense DC drops to 12.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 1,000 Copper Pieces, a rusted suit of Chainmail (Scrap), and a Live Goat.

name: The Vampire Countess
description: Elegant, pale, and moving with a blurring speed that defies the eye. She wears a gown of red silk that seems to bleed. She toys with her food, using charm and terror before going for the throat.

attacks.name: Razor Talons
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+5 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (1d4/turn).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Countess regains 10 HP at the start of her turn unless she took Radiant damage in the previous round.

abilities.name: Terrifying Glare (Charm)
abilities.effect: The Countess locks eyes with a player. The player must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a fail, they are Charmed (cannot attack her) and must use their movement to move adjacent to her.

abilities.name: Horde Instinct (Bats)
abilities.effect: The Countess dissolves into a swarm of bats and reforms instantly up to 60 feet away. Effect: She heals 2d6 HP. Any players adjacent to her start or end point take 1d6 Slashing damage from the swarm.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 500 gold pieces, a Ring of Mind Shielding, and a vial of Royal Vampire Blood (Rare Reagent).

name: The Vampiric Mist
description: A cloud of roiling red vapor. It smells of copper and old blood. It flows through the air, seeking to force itself into the lungs of living creatures to drown them in their own fluids.

attacks.name: Choking Fog
attacks.effect: Deals 2d6+4 Acid/Necrotic Damage. On a hit, the target is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) until the start of the Mist's next turn.

abilities.name: Liquid Anatomy
abilities.effect: Immune to Flanking, Prone, Grappled, and Critical Hits.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.effect: It looks like natural fog until it attacks.

abilities.name: Engulf (Inhale)
abilities.effect: The Mist moves into a target's space. Target rolls Defense DC 19. On Fail: Engulfed (Restrained, Blinded). They take 2d6+4 Necrotic Damage at the start of the Mist's turn, and the Mist Heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Blood Nova
abilities.effect: The Mist turns solid red and explodes. All creatures within 20 feet take 3d6 Necrotic Damage (Reflex Save for half). The Mist reforms in an unoccupied space 15 feet away.

name: The Verbeeg Strider
description: A lanky, 9-foot giant with exaggerated limbs and a cunning, rat-like face. It carries a spear and a net, patrolling the perimeter of the clan's territory. It prefers to trap foes and poke them from a distance rather than brawl.

attacks.name: Weighted Net
attacks.effect: Ranged (30ft) or Melee (Reach 10ft). On a hit, no damage, but the target is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Defense). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 16) to escape.

abilities.name: Sure-Footed
abilities.effect: The Verbeeg ignores difficult terrain (underbrush/rubble). It cannot be knocked Prone by Medium or smaller creatures.

abilities.name: Spear Thrust (Reach)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. Deals 1d6+2 Piercing Damage. Effect: After attacking, the Verbeeg moves 10 feet away. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks.

abilities.name: Batter
abilities.effect: The Verbeeg swings its spear shaft like a bat. Target makes a Reflex Save. Fail: Take 2d6 Damage and be pushed 30 feet away (resetting the distance).

loot: A pouch of stolen silver (20s), a functional large hunting trap.

name: The Veteran Mercenary
description: A scarred professional in dirty chainmail. They don't shout or posture; they chew tobacco and look for the gap in your armor.

attacks.name: Bastard Sword
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Physical Damage. While wielding this, the Mercenary has +1 Defense DC (Total 14).

abilities.name: Phalanx
abilities.effect: The Mercenary cannot be Flanked while adjacent to an ally (Players cannot gain Advantage against them).

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage, and the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Blinded (sand in eyes) for 1 round.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.effect: The Mercenary marks a player. Until the start of the next round, all attacks against that player have their Attack DC increased to 18.

loot: 5 gold pieces, a silver tooth (5g), and a pouch of good pipeweed.

name: The Vine Knight
description: A suit of rusted plate armor held together not by a body, but by a thick, writhing mass of vines and roots. It fights with a grim, silent purpose, using its own body to lash out and drag enemies into the mud.

attacks.name: Green-Iron Flail
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+3 Bludgeoning Damage. Reach 10ft. On a hit, the target is pulled 5 feet closer to the Knight.

abilities.name: Botanical
abilities.effect: Immune to Charmed, Sleep, Confused. Vulnerable to Fire.

abilities.name: Grasping Ground
abilities.effect: The ground within 10 ft of the Knight is Difficult Terrain (writhing roots).

abilities.name: Vine Lash (Grapple)
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 15ft). On Hit: Normal Damage. Effect: The target is Grappled (Speed 0) and pulled adjacent to the Knight.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.effect: Roots erupt from the ground. All creatures within 20 feet must make a Reflex Save (DC 13). Fail: They are Restrained (Speed 0).

name: The Void Cannon
description: A quadrupedal beast made of black chitin and purple muscle. Its 'head' is simply a gaping organic cannon that draws power from the space between stars.

attacks.name: Entropy Beam
attacks.effect: Ranged Spell (120ft). Deals 2d8+4 Force Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter (disintegrating matter).

abilities.name: Caustic Blood
abilities.effect: Even though it is ranged, it punishes those who get close. Any creature hitting it with a Melee Attack takes 1d4 Acid Damage.

abilities.name: Suppressing Fire (Gravity Well)
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack. The target takes no damage but is Pinned. Effect: If the target moves on their next turn, they automatically take 2d8+4 Force Damage as gravity shears them.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: The Cannon rips a hole in the world. A 20ft Radius zone becomes Zero-Gravity. Effect: Creatures float helplessly. They have Disadvantage on DEX checks and Attacks unless they can fly or grab a solid object.

name: The Void Guardian
description: A floating suit of geometric armor made of obsidian and starlight, with no body insideonly a singularity. It silently intercepts attacks meant for its masters.

attacks.name: Null-Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Psychic/Force Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score (AS).

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Guardian acts as a sinkhole for mana. It has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells and Magical Effects (Total AS 4 vs. Magic).

abilities.name: Gaze of Entropy
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Effect: The target must make a Fortitude Save (DC 15). On a failure, they are Weakened (Damage dealt is halved) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Spatial Warp
abilities.effect: The Guardian twists space to protect a zone. It teleports itself and one adjacent creature (usually a player it is fighting) to any point within 60 feet.

name: The Void Leech
description: A floating, eel-like creature made of translucent purple jelly. It has no eyes, only a circular mouth filled with glass needles. It swims through the air, hunting magic.

attacks.name: Needle Mouth
attacks.effect: Deals 2 Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: The Leech has +2 Armor Score (AS) against Spells.

abilities.name: Attach
abilities.effect: The Leech attaches to a target. The target takes 2 Automatic Damage at the start of their turn. If the target casts a spell while a Leech is attached, the Leech explodes (dying) but the spell's Cost increases by +1 MP. Removing a Leech takes an Action.

abilities.name: Mind Blast (Feedback)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When a Leech is killed by a Spell. All creatures within 10 feet take 2 Psychic Damage (No Save).

name: The Void Scuttler
description: A creature the size of a dog, resembling a crab made of wet glass and exposed muscle. It moves with a flickering, strobe-light jerkiness, spitting acid.

attacks.name: Acid Spittle
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (30ft). Deals 1d6+2 Acid Damage. On a hit, the player's Armor Score is reduced by 1 for the encounter (melting).

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.effect: The Scuttler can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing. It is Immune to the Grappled and Prone conditions.

abilities.name: Flesh-Warp
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Normal Damage (1d6+2). Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16). On a failure, one of their limbs becomes rubbery and useless for 1 minute (drop item or fall prone).

abilities.name: Spatial Warp
abilities.effect: The Scuttler twists space. It teleports itself and one adjacent creature (willing or unwilling) to any point within 60 feet.

name: The Warlord of the Wastes
description: A conqueror who has united the tribes under a banner of flayed skin. They wield a pair of jagged axes that drip with venom. They move with a speed that belies their size.

attacks.name: Twin Venom-Axes
attacks.effect: The Warlord makes Two Attacks per action. Each hit deals 1d10+3 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 20) or be Poisoned (1d6 dmg/turn).

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.effect: If a Minion or Ally within 30 feet is killed, players have Disadvantage on Defense Checks against the Warlord's next attack.

abilities.name: Execute
abilities.effect: A brutal overhead chop. On Hit: Deals Critical Damage (2d10+6). Requirement: Can only be used on a player that is already Prone or Stunned.

abilities.name: Desperate Fury
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 0 HP. The Warlord refuses to die. They remain at 1 HP, take an immediate Standard Action (likely an Execute), and then die.

abilities.name: DP Trigger (50% HP)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When reduced to 50% HP. The GM gains 2 DP.

loot: 1,000 gold pieces, a Belt of Giant Strength, and a map to a conquered kingdom's vault.

name: The Warp-Priest
description: A humanoid whose robe is actually a fold of their own elongated skin. They hold a staff made of non-euclidean geometry. They speak in a tongue that causes nosebleeds.

attacks.name: Entropy Bolt
attacks.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). Deals 2d6+3 Force Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Aura of Madness
abilities.effect: Any creature starting its turn within 10 feet of the Priest must make a Will Save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Dazed for 1 round.

abilities.name: Flesh-Warp
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Touch). On Hit: 2d6 Damage. Effect: The player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 18). On a failure, one of their limbs becomes rubbery and useless for 1 minute (Arm: drop item / Leg: fall Prone and Speed halved).

abilities.name: Spatial Warp
abilities.effect: The Priest twists space. They teleport themselves and one adjacent creature (willing or unwilling) to any point within 60 feet.

name: The Warped Grunt
description: A humanoid figure twisted by exposure to the Far Realm. One arm is a massive, fleshy club of bone and gristle; the other is a writhing tentacle. It regenerates wounds visibly as it fights.

attacks.name: Bone-Club Arm
attacks.effect: Deals 1d8+2 Physical Damage. On a Critical Hit, the player is knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: The Grunt regains 5 HP at the start of its turn unless it took Fire or Acid damage in the previous round.

abilities.name: Tentacle Lash
abilities.effect: Melee Attack (Reach 10ft). On Hit: Normal Damage, and the target is Grappled (Speed 0).

abilities.name: Fission
abilities.effect: Trigger: When the Grunt takes damage. The Grunt splits in two. The original remains, and a second Grunt appears in an adjacent space. Both have Half the current HP of the original.

name: The Watcher-Spawn
description: A mini-beholder, the size of a human head, with four twitching eye stalks. They are the immature offspring of a Hive Mother, hungry for magic and flesh. They fire wildly and inaccurately.

attacks.name: Random Ray
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Force Damage. Range 30ft.

abilities.name: Panopticon
abilities.effect: Cannot be Flanked or Surprised.

abilities.name: Paranoid Vigilance
abilities.effect: The Spawn has Advantage on Initiative rolls.

abilities.name: Spinning Fusillade
abilities.effect: If 2 or more Spawn attack the same target, the target must make a Reflex Save (DC 16). On a Fail, they take 4 Damage and are Confused for 1 round.

abilities.name: Prismatic Storm (Chain Reaction)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When destroyed. The Spawn's magical energies overload. It fires one final Random Ray (Roll d8) at the nearest creature (Ally or Enemy) before dissolving.

name: The Web-Spinner Matriarch
description: A spider the size of a carriage, with a bulbous abdomen pulsating with eggs. She does not hunt; she waits in the center of a cathedral of webs for food to come to her.

attacks.name: Venomous Mandibles
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Physical Damage. On a hit, the player must make a Fortitude Save (DC 16) or be Poisoned (1d6 dmg/turn) for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Spider Climb
abilities.effect: The Matriarch can climb walls and ceilings at full speed without checking. She is immune to the Grappled condition from webs.

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.effect: Ranged Attack (60ft). On Hit: The player takes no damage but is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on Attacks). Escape requires an Action and a STR Check (DC 13).

abilities.name: Call of the Wild (Hatch)
abilities.effect: The Matriarchs abdomen pulses. 1d4 Minions (Spider Swarms, 1 HP) burst forth to defend her at the end of the round.

loot: Pristine Silk Gland (50g), Matriarch Venom (50g), Chitin Plates (20g).

name: The Wild Hunt Hound
description: A dog made of moonlight and shadows, with eyes that burn cold green. They run through trees and walls alike, baying for the blood of mortals who trespass in the Feywild.

attacks.name: Spectral Bite
attacks.effect: Deals 4 Psychic Damage. Tag: Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Hound can move through solid objects and creatures. It has Resistance to non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: The Hound has Advantage on Attack Checks if an ally is adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Planar Shift (Blink)
abilities.effect: Trigger: When attacked. Before the attack roll is resolved, the Hound teleports 10 feet away, causing the attack to miss automatically.

name: The Winter Court Knight
description: An elven-like figure of terrible beauty, clad in armor made of unmelting ice. It moves with a silent, predatory grace. The air around it drops to freezing temperatures.

attacks.name: Frost-Blade
attacks.effect: Deals 1d10+4 Cold Damage. On a hit, the player's Speed is halved until the end of their next turn (frozen joints).

abilities.name: Planar Essence
abilities.effect: Resistance to Non-Magic weapons. Vulnerable to Cold Iron.

abilities.name: Glamour
abilities.effect: The Knight appears to be slightly displaced from reality. Players have Disadvantage on Attack Checks against it unless they succeed on a Will Save (DC 15) at the start of the encounter.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.effect: The Knight teleports 15 feet to an unoccupied space adjacent to a player and immediately makes a melee attack.

abilities.name: Planar Shift
abilities.effect: The Knight grabs a target. It teleports itself and one adjacent creature to a location up to 60 feet away. An unwilling creature can make a Will Save (DC 15) to avoid being taken.

name: The Wraith
description: A being of pure shadow and hate. It has no physical form, only a silhouette of tattered robes and burning red eyes. It passes through walls to strike at the most vulnerable party member.

attacks.name: Life-Drain Touch
attacks.effect: Deals 2d8+4 Necrotic Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.effect: If the Wraith has Advantage, it deals Double Damage.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: The Wraith can move through solid objects and creatures. It has Resistance (Half Damage) to all non-magical physical attacks.

abilities.name: Life Siphon
abilities.effect: Melee Attack. On Hit: Necrotic Damage. Effect: The Wraith heals for half the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Grave-Bind (Shadow Pin)
abilities.effect: The Wraith's shadow elongates. All creatures within a 20ft Radius must make a Strength Save (DC 17) or be Restrained by their own shadows. The area becomes Difficult Terrain.
